bsgrubs nas snyan de las langs te/ sems can rnams la rab tu bstan nas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dun sems can su mkhas shing shes pa de dag kyang de lta bu'i
sgyu mos 'dun par byas te/ de dag gi sems dang 'gro ba drug tu skye ba dang/ 'gror kho bos ma shes so// gang dag de la skyabs su dod pa de dag gi sbya'i khung bu gcig tsam yang
sngongs pa dang 'khrugs par kho bos byed ma nusan/ de las slu ba'am bskyod par lta ga la nus/ dung kho bos g.yog mo lnga brgya dang bu 'khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas te dge
sbyong go'u tam 'bangs de la skyabs su dong nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun na 'khod de/ kho bos de dag de dang dbral ma nus so// de'i phyir stobs dang ldan pa/ bsod nams
dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ dwabang phyug dang ldan dwang ldan pa khyed kho bo'i grogs gyis shig/ shAkya'i bu dngangs te srog dang dbral lo// de la sems
can gang dag skyabs su dang bde dag thams cad kyang rnam par gzhag par bya'o// dge sbyong g.yo sgyu can nag pa'i phyogs pham par byas te/ bdud kyi phyogs dkar pa snang bar byas la/ de phyin
drad bde ba la gnas par bya'o// de nas bdud me 'od ces bya bas// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa lakhaltas pa dang/ de nas bdud me 'od
kyis bam ldan 'das kyi sku mthong/ sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa spros so// thos nas de sku zing zhes byed cing sngangs par gyur te/ de nas des bdud sdig rdzun de la 'di skad
ces smras so/// ma lus zhing na 'di ni gzugs bzang mchog/ bsod nams shes dus ring nas gnas gtsang ste/ nyon mongs rnam grol lam ldan yun ring len/ srid pa kun zad mya
ngan rnames las thar/ khyod yang mi rigs khro ba'i dbang ma 'gro// gtso mchog 'di ni srid pa gsum na skyabs// 'di la zhe sdang cung zad su bskyed pa// de ni rmongs shing bdeng
nyams par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bdud mu khyud bzang po zhes bya bas// bdud sdigacan de la 'di skad ces smras so// den 'phrul chen bsod nams rab kyi mtshan// ma/
mtsha gnas 'gro ba kun las rab tu thar// sdug bsngal ma lus zad pa'i lam ston pa// bdud rgya kun gyis gtse bar bya ma nus// sdig can gyis smras pa/ nga yi skye ba dag la dbang
byas te// khyed kyi skye bo 'ad yang de dbang 'go// de las ring por ma thogs tshul stongs byed// yu bu cagakyang gang du 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas bdud nags kyi rgyal po zhes khyab
des 'di skad ces smras sa// khyedana'i da tu 'byor par gyur pa'i tshe// de nas khyod kyis rang gi dpa' ba bstan// den rab tu dpung nyamasAre chadan// de ring ci phyir thams cad mkhyen
la ste bdud ral gi zla ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// de ni sula'ang yid kyi khro ba med/ ma gnas de na bsam pa nyid kyis gtsang// khams gsum dag las
thar cing 'gro bar rgyu// de la gzhan gyis gsad par mi nus so// stag na gyis smras pa/ 'dodo khams 'di nasems can gAng 'khod pa// 'dod la chags shing nga rgyal dregs bas
myos// de dgu nga phyir rtag 'brang phyag boran te// de dag tshogs pas ci phyir de ma sod// de nas bdud sa chu zhes bya ba des 'di skadabus smras so// sId po med cing sgyu ma smig rgyu 'jur/
dngos po kun shes sred pa rnam par brtul// srid par m chags nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// de la bgegs byed nus par ga la 'gyur// sdig can gyis smras pa[7u0f7c]mi yi 'jig rten
kha @#// 'dren yang yod// bzu'i btung zhim po sman dang gos bsnyen cing// chor ba gsum yang de yi sems la yod// ci phyir de la brlags par bya mi nus// bdud/
sred spong zhes bya ba des 'ad skad ces smras so// sdig can lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi ni// rdzu 'phrul bdag cag yu lan ci yod pa// don grub 'phrul la cha shasamirig na/ de la ji
ltar brlag par bya bar nus// sdig can gyis smras pa/ ngas ni dal zan nga cad byas/ de la rdo ba dag kyang 'phangs// de bzhin mi snyan tshig smras nas// gnas d gnas kyang rab tu bskyod//
/ bdud shes mig ces bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// khyod kyis gang tshe de la bgegs byas te// de na khros pas nyung zad tshig pa 'am// khyod la khro gnyer bzhin mang bstan byas sam//
sgyu de las khyod kyis tshig ngan mngon shes sam// sngagacan gyis smras pa/ de ni sa sor brtags pas rtag tu bzod// 'dod chags spangs shing zhesdang gti mug bral// den sems
na kun la byams sems ldan// 'dre bar spyod pa la yang de brtag go/ bdud thub dka' zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ kun sbyor gsum gyi zhags pas gang bsrings pa//
de la bdag cag nan tan bgegs bya mod// des na skyon dang gtamug zhag sa pa spangs// de la ji ltar brtag par bya ba'i nus// sdig can gyis smras pa/ stobs thob khyed cag nga yi
grogs yin te// khyed rnams bag yod byas la de bu ring chos// thams cad phyogs su ra yi 'phreng ba dang// sa 'di ma lus byin gyis chur brlab bo// mkha' las mi bzad skyug
pa'i zag char dang// lcags kyi phye ma'i phung po rab tu dbab// lcags mda' mdung thung spu gri mda' bon// de lus phye mar rlags cung dbab par bya// kun nas rab tu rno ba'i ro//
dang mdung thung ral gra tho ba rnams phab la// 'bar ba mngon 'pha dras sbyor ba de dug gas/ shAkya'i bu de thal bar brlag par bya// de bzhi n du bdud bye ba'i bar du thams cad kyis
tshogs su bcad pa smras so// de nas bdud de dag thams cad kyis mogran gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ de bzhin du 'dong bar bgyi'o// dang rang gi gnas nas go bgos la/
ste dang g.yog tu bcase tu 'dong ngo// bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul dang/ stobs kyi yul de dag thams cad bstan par ni khyen/ dge sbyong ga'u tam de rtsa la ci 'dra ba de'i mod la rab tu ston te/
khyod rang gis rig par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud bye ba rang rang gi gnas su deng nas/ go bgos te bdud bya bar ra zhing yang galog stong stong yulod rnam pa mang po gyon/ lag cha stsatshogs
thogs pa/ go rnam ba sna tshogs bgos pa dag dang chus te/ de'i nub mo 'das nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir byon te/ yul ang gamang gad+ha'i drang thad kyi steng ga nam mkha' la 'khod nas//
gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri zad ng/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye
chen po dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum gang dag bcom ldan 'das la sems ma dad cing gus par bya bar yid la byed pa med par 'gyur la/ chos dang dge 'dun la'ang
sems ma dad pa yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das bkrongs su bcug nas de dag kyang lag cha dang/ go cha sna tshogs dang chas ted nyidan 'khod do// bdud
sdig can ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugasasu bsgyur nas/ drang srong skar ma la dga' po zhes bya ba dbang phyug chen po la dad pa/ rig pa'i gnas khacobargyud kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdza'aphrul
gyi yul gyi pha rol tu son pa/ g.yog lnga brgya yod pa/ gangs kyi ra'o des la gnas pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste// 'di skadaches skyas sa/ go'u ta ma'irigs las skyes pa'i drang srong ma tshog
mkhas shing mngon par shes pa dag la gnas// ang gamaM ga d+han de 'dug de ringani// rgyal po'i khab tu nges par bsod snyoms spyod// bstan par sna tshogs gsal ba'i gtam rnams kyis//
de dang khyod du lhan cig sna bar byos// der khyod mngon shes dbang po lnga po yang// gdon mi za bar rab tu thob par 'gyur// de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshigasasu bcad pa 'di dag smras te/
da shed du mi snang bar gyur nas/ rang gi gnas su song ste/ rang gi 'khor gyi bdud rnams la bsgo ba/ ngas dengaye mtshungs blo bsams ci 'dra nga las khyed don cig/ bdud kyi drags chen
'joms pa'irgyu de ma ston par// rdzu 'phrul mthu dang ldan de bAkya'i bu la rang dgar smra// de rtag tshig 'jam slob ma dag la bu lam byams bzhin// de yi slob ma rgyugs spangs gdon
mi za bar snga dro na// grong khyer dag tug yeng ba med par mthur gyis rgyu ban// dedag klu gar snyan mchog tshul gyis rang dgar myur du bzung/ de thos shAkya'i khyu mchog tsanas yodi sngo med
bar bya// bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ glang chen me seng ge ma ho stag ga la sgra grags dbyar dus kyi// 'brug sgra 'byin pa lta bu du ma grong de'i phyi rol myur sprul te// bdag cag lag
cha mtshon thogs ga dug ba ngo mtshar mngon sum des mthong na// bslad cing mi dran rdzu 'phrul ston pa de nas tha dad phyogs su 'gro// bdud ga zhan zhig gis smras pa/ lam srang bzhimado
kha bas dag na mi sdug gdong mangs 'khor/ snatshogs mtshon rnon mda' chen mda' zhig sa bdag dgas ral gri glegs// nam mkha' las kyang mtshon cha'i sgra grags sngon las lce yang 'di//
de nas sa g.yos 'jigs pas dbang med myur du ma rung 'gyur// bdud de dag gis bdud kyi yul gyi stobs dang rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad rgya cher byas so// bcom ldan
'das kyis kyang thams cad dud ldan pa'i steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdzong byan gyis brlabs nas// bdud kyi sgra yang ma 'byin/ phyogs
bzhiname dang ri'ang med/ sngonanag po'ang med/ dus ma yin pa brlung yang med de/ sangs rgyas kyi stebs dang/ byin gyis klu gang yang byan chur thigs pa gcig tsam yang mi 'bab
sa ya nga de'i tshe nyan thos chen po bzhi snga dro chos gos dang bsham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te

denas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ grong khyer gyi sgo da na bdud gzhonanu shin tu
dar la bab pa/ rgyud bzhin bzang ba/ btsun pa'i bu'am byad 'dra ba lnga banu glu len gar byed cing shin tu rgyug ste/ de dag gi lag pa gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bzung
nas srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de/ shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong klu long zhig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ grogs pa dag khyed kyis
sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos par byas nyon cig/ bdud gzhonanude dag thamasacad kyis gtsam bskyangs ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyugatsang klu dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so//
[t, ]skye mched dag gis shin tu chog/ skye mched dag gis bdag cag bslus// skye mched dag ni gsod ba ste// skye mched bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo// phung po byas pas shin tu chog/ phung po byas/
pas bdag cag bslus// phung po byas pas gsod pa ste// phung bo byas pas ngas mthar dbyung// 'di lta ste/ kha ho ra/ ba ta ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ha/ mar tsA ba da/ sa skya ba ha/ A ma ba ha sU tA/hU~M/
gnas brtan sA ri'i bu rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang/ de nas bdud gzhan nu ldabcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste//
yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces smras so// mgon po bdag cag da ring bzod nga ra kha gsol// 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig ston pa'i mchog khyod de// phung po khyod kyis ji ltar 'jigs bcas
bshad bdag gde ltar rtag tu de mngon sum// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu bo de dag thams cad kyis/ srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/ de nas mo'u 'gal gyi bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyomasakyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ de nas
yang bdud gzhan nu lnga banu nas/ glu dbyangs kyi bar du ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// khams nyid dag gis shani tu chog/ khams nyid dag gis bdag cag bslus// khams nyid dag ni gsod
la mi 'ag/ pa ste khams nyid bad ga gsa mthar dbyung ngo// tshor ba dag gis shin tu chog/ tshor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus// tshor ba dag ni gsod pa ste/ tshor
ba bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo// sems pa dag gis shin tu chog/ sems pa dag gis bdag dug bskus// sems pa dag ni gsod dang ste// sems pa bdag gis na 'dabyung ngo//
'du shes byas bas shin tu chog/ 'du shes byas khas badrag cig bslus// 'du shes byas pas gsod pa ste// 'du shes byas dras ngas da bar dbyung// 'a khor ba dag gis shan tu chog/
'khor ba dag gis bdag rug bsus// 'khor ba dug gis gsod pa ste/ dwakhor ba bdag gas mthar dbyung ngo// 'di lta ste/ A ma ba A ma ba/ A ra dza/ ra na dzag/ sham mya
thA sham mya thA sham mya thA/ ga gan ba sU t+tA ka tshe dang ldan pa ma'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gcung glu'i dbyangs kyis// tshigs su bcad pa 'ad dag dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag
snas pa dang/ de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu bo de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yad rab tu dad nas 'di skad ces skyas sa// 'phrul ldan sbas pa 'phags lam thub dngang gras// 'khor ba'i
nyes la mnyam ltatshes kyi sgron// sdig spangs bdagacugar ma gus pa skyes// sangs rgyas chos mchog dge 'dun dang skyabs song// bdud gzhan nu lnga banu po de dgathams cad kyis srang gi
dbus der/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i dra ba la mgo bos phyag 'tshalato/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/ de nas tshe dban pa byams ma'i bu gang pa grong
khyer byang phyogs kyi sgo nas/ rgyal nge 'a khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyan s kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga banu nas/ glu'i dbyangs kyi bar du ste/ 'di
skad ces smras so/ rig pa byas bas shin tu chog/ reg pa byas pas bdag cag bslas// reg pa byas khas gsed pa ste/ reg pa bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo// bdag po dag
gis shin tu chog/ bdag po dag gis bdag lcag bslus// bad ga pa dgan gsod pa ste// bdag po bdag gis mdzur dbyung ngo// 'khor ba drag gis shin tu chog/ 'khodrab
dgags bdag cag bslus// 'khor ba dag na gsod pa ste// 'khor ba bdag gas mthur dbyung ngo// srid pa kun gyis shin tu tsheg/ srid pa gyis ni bdag dug bskus// srid
pa kun na gsod pa ste/ srid pa kun n ngas mthar dbyung// 'dod pa'i dga' bas shin tu chog/ 'dod pa'i dag 'bras bdagatsug bsus// 'dod pa'i dga' bas gsod pa ste//
'a dod pa'i dga' ba ngas mthar dbyung// grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chudrag mgyogs 'dra na// byas pa'i skye bos mi shes te// ma mkhas gzugs kyi dregs pasaskyes
de bzhin du sbyar te/ mi mkhas sgra yi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas dri pa gas bas myos// mi mkhras ro yi rtogs pas myos// mi mkhas reg gi dregs/
pa'i dregs pas myos// mi mkhas khamasakyi drags pas myos// mi mkhas longs spyod dregs pas myos// mi mkhas bde ba'i dregs pas myos// mi mkhas rigs kyi drags pas
skyes mi ma khas 'dod pa'i dregs pas myos// grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi mkhas kun gyi drag sa pas
myos 'di lta ste/ kha ba/ khan ba/ kharlab/ mud ki ni/ A ba/ ba ba// kha ba/ pra mA/ myo ta ra ba sInA/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po rgyug cing glu'ade byang
kyis bdud kyi bu rnams lo tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dad/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang/ de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga nu bo de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dad nas 'di skad
ces smras so// khams rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang// tshor ba'i 'jig rten rtog pas bskyed pa dang// zhi ba'i lam yang khyod kyis legs par bstan// mchog sbyin dkon mchog gsum
la skyabs su mchi// bdud gzhon nu lnga banu po de dag thams cad kyis srang ga dbus der/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyi'i
de'i mdun du 'dug go/ yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nub phyogs kyi sgenas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ grong khyer kyi sgo den
bdud gzhon nu shin tu ral bab pa/ byad bzhin bzang ba/ btsun pa 'a bu'i chu byed 'chang ba lnga bcu glu len gar byed cida kun tu rgyug pa de dag gi lag pa gnyis kyis tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor la
bzung nas srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed du rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong glu long zhig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig/ rab 'byor gyis smyos pa/ grogs po dag khyed
kyis sngon ma thos pa'i glu bas par byas nyon cig/ de dag gis gcomabaskyungs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan ba rab 'byor rgyug cung grub dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so// dngos po thams cad
mi rtag sgyu ma chu bur bzhin// 'dus byas g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gang la'ang rtag pa med// smagargyu mthong nas zhig bzhin ri lather zug med// chos kun myur du 'jig par blo dang ldan ra sa shes//
sdug bsnga'i chos gzir byis ba thams cad gar chags pa// regakun sdug bsngal khur ya na tshor ba dag kyang nad// ji ltar dad pa byang chub lam bsgom sten byed pa// de ltar sdug bsngal kun thar byed
sha@#// grogs gang yang med// chos kun mtshan khrid gcig ste 'du shes spangs pa dag/ bdag med ldan pas spyod kun rdzas kyi mtshan nyid bdag/ srog dang gso ba
gang zag dngan byed pa med// bdudakyi g.yo dag thong la sems na byang chub bsngos// nam mkha' glog khazhin dbang po dag la rnam shes 'byung// reg dang tshor dang sems pa thams na
bdag medade// tshul bzhin brtags na rdzasani ni ya nga yod ma yin// byis nga ba bde rnams bsdus pas 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'jug/ phung po thams cad tshul bzhin brtags na byed pa med//
yang dag ma 'a na stod zhing mtha' rnams kun dang bral// byang chub lam spyod des ni 'dran pa'i byang chub pa res// rmongs byed chos nyid 'di na chos su skyob ngas gsungs// 'di lta ste/ su
mun de/ ba mun de/ sun da dza ha/ sal/ sAli/ sa la/ a ba hA sa la/ ta thA tAs li/ b+hU ta ka Ni/ sa li/ sAhA/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing/ glu'i dbyangs kyis tshugs su
bcad pa 'di dag dang/ gsang sngagasakya tshig 'di dag pas pa dang/ de nas bdud gnonu lta banu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yang rab tu dadanas 'di skad ces smras so// sdig pa'i grogs
kyi dbang song 'di 'dra'i chos ma thos// gti mug mi shes rmongs pas sdig las ni bgyis pa// rgyal ba'i sras la bdag cag na ngon sum deng bshags nas// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas/
nyid du smon dge 'debs// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos ma nyan pa phyi
re'i mdun du 'dug ga/ yang de'i tshon sangs rgyas kyi mthus srang de dpag tshad brgya tsam du go skabs yangs par snang ste/ srang de'i dbus na gnas brtan shA ri'i bu ni khyad phyogs su
bltas te 'dug/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po nanub phyogs su bltas te 'dul// gang ban lho phyogs su bltas te 'dug/ rab 'byor ni shar phyogs su bltas te ' gnas gcig nas gcig
tu dpag tshad phyed phyedatsaman 'khod do// hran thos chen po bzhi pa de dag gi dbus kyi sa'i phyogasan/ khrulnga bcas 'khor ba'i kharnachu ba ni 'dzam bu'i chu dro'i gser/ 'dab ma ni ba zurma
sngon po/ ze bani dpal kyi snang bo/ snying po ni mu tig/ dri ni lha'i sos las lhag pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa zhig byung ste/ brgya de las snang ba
phyud do// snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur te 'a srangaden pad+ma de 'bang du ma gsum gyi khrun tsam du snangango// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i

bar dun pad+made 'khang du lha'i dpag tshad lngapar snang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du ni pad+mado'i 'phang dpag tshod brgya par snang/ 'og min rgyalha'i bar dun pad+ma de'i 'ang nga dbagatshad
bya bar snang ngo// bad+ma de'i 'dab ma dag las tshig dang/ don dang/ tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs byung ste// sems can gang dag sa 'di la gnas pa de dag/
gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sadas rgyas zhid 'di'i gdubrag stag pa med pa gcig skyes pa// gcig bus bdud kyi sde nadabung dang bzhon par bcas pa bcom// sangs
rgyas dpa' bo gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// nyag gcig 'gro ba dag la phan phyir byon par the tshom med// mkhas pa bstan daces tshul mad rig pa chos don thar 'dod pa//
tsa tshul shes pang nas skyes dang nye rgyal mchog 'dIr ston pas btul// 'gro ba kun la phan don rig mkhas dam chos gsungs pa che// thub pa sma ra chog 'jig rten kun gyis mdo ba de rang
gshags// dus su gshegs ka ston bla dge sbyong rgyal po bslab gsum 'chang// tshad medachos don rig pa lhadang mar bcas 'gro ba skyob// 'jig rten donadadra phan spyod mkhas pa la
pa sbyongs darang 'daa// sdug bsngal thas pa snag mda' 'am shes chen po'i sgron// dam pa gsung pa dwam gsam la da// dam pa'i chos kyi mig ni ji ltar rab tu sbyin/
gzigs pa gzugs bzang mchog mang ba la// stobs dang ldan zhing mchog dang mchog ma yin mkhyen pa// smra ba'i seng ge ring por mi thogs 'dir gshegs so// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rgya
mtshor gnas ba gzigs nas ni// dbang po drug gi sdom pa'i mchog la rab gnas shing// mngon par shes pa drug mkhyen drug gi rjes 'brang ba// de ni chos kyi rnga chen rdung du yod dgag shig
dbang po drug gi grong khyer gnas rnams rab 'dzoms pa// don mchog dran pa drug gi kha la sbyar dbang po/ pa lo chos drug mchog rnams rang tu bshad pa'i phyir// drug gi sa ban sna
ba'i seng ge 'dir gshegs so// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug gi bar du pad+ma de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag khyudago/ khyed cag tshogs 'du long dga' bar spyod// bag med
sems pa srid dang rgyags pas bsgribs// rtag tu rmongs shing dga' ba'i skom gyis myos// khagamed gyur pas bder gshegs mchod mi byed// 'dod pa mi rtag tshuyazla ba
ba zhin// skye dgu'i 'khor ba'i zhags pa shin tu sa// dga' ba dag la bgramed ma thar pa// nams kyango mya ngan 'da' bar ma 'gyur ro// rtag tu bag med zha ba'i phyir mi
'gyur// dag dngam dge sngon byas ma mthong ngam// rgad ngan 'chi 'jigs pas kun zinacing// khyed cag ngan songs la rab tu zhugs// sbyin dang rul dang kun sgom bag/
yod la= rten cig sngon gyi legs byas rnams kyang srungs// 'dod pa mi gtsang mtha' med kun grongs la// bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs su nye bar deng/
[A ]song ste de yi bka' la rab tu nyon// legs bshad de ni khyod kyi don chen te// shes rab rnam grol rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu// dam pa'i chos ldan ma nyam nga don chen no// gzugasan sbyod pa'i
ris bcu drugagibar du pad+ma'i 'dab ma las tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'adi dag ngang// mnyam gzhag bsam gtan dga' ba nyon mongs med// rab tu bsgrims te chos la rnam par bsgoms//
ma 'khrul sims dang rnam par thar 'dod pas// zhe sdang rab tu spangs ba'i blo gyis shig/ rnam nga bcu gsum mtshan ma bstan pa yi// bzod pa mchog la rnam par bsgom pa gyis// des ni
na dang rgya las thar pa yi// shin tu rnam thar myur du thob par 'gyur// gang rnams gzugasakyi rnam rtog sogs la chags// ther zug rtag nga bdag brtan dngos de ra lta// de dag gi ni skye ba'i
rgyun mi 'chad// de rnams ngan songs la shin tu 'ong// rtag tu khams gsum bdag mod rdzasamed cing/ 'byed med rang dbang med par rnam bltas nas// rjes su 'thun pa'i brjod pa gang
bsgom pa// de dag 'gro ba kun las thar par 'gyur// skye dang 'jags 'grol chos 'di thams cad la// nam mkha' 'dra bar gang rnams sgom byed pa// de dag 'chi me dag med na ba'ang
med ngan 'gro med cing mi sdug phrad ba'ang med// gang rnams dang nga ro dag la ma da ma chugs/// lamade mchog ste shin tu dag pa yin// da ltar shAkya seng ge 'di bzhin du// bdud rnams bzhi
ba rnam par bcom par 'gyur// gang dag g.yo ba btulanas gnyis spyang phyir// ci yang med cing mtshan n na sngangs pa// tshul gcig rnam par sgom par byed pa rnams// de dag la ni'ami mchog
'di bshad do// bdag po mad cad byed pa medagyur pa// chos 'thams cad stong par bsgoms nas su// sbyin pa sbyang san bla na med pa yi// byang chub nam mkha'irang bzhin regang ra
'gyur de lta bu'i don gyi tshig chos kyi sgra de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ma dang/ mi ma yin pa de dag tshogs te/ 'bad cid 'khod do// la lani tshangs nga 'i cha byad du/ la
la ni dbang phyug gi cha byad du/ la la ni dbang phyug chen po'i cha byad du/ lal ni sred med kyi bu'am byad du/ la la ni dga' ldan pa'i cha byad du/ la lan 'thab bral ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni rgya
byin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i cha byad du/ 'al ni gzhon nu'i cha byad du la la ni rnam thos kyi khu'i cha byad du/ la la ni 'phags skyes pa'i chu byadadu/ la la na mig mi bzang

gir byed du/ la la ni yul 'khor srung gi cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa 'i phal pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni nyi ma'i cha byad du/ la la ni zla ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni skar ma'i cha byad du/ la ni
[ ]@#// lha ma yin gyi chu bya du/ la la ni nam mkha' lding gi cha byad du/ la la ni ma 'am ci'i cha byad du/ la la ni lto 'phye chen pa'i cha byad du/ lawani rin pa che'i cha byad du/ la la ni/

gser gyi rgyan gyi cha byad du/ la la ni rin pe che sna tshogs kyi cha byed du/ la la ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal rigs kyi cha byad du/ la la ni gzhan mu stegs can gyi cha byad du/

la la na 'khor lo rin pa che'i cha byad du/ la la ni nor bu rin pa che'i cha byad du/ la lan glang po rin po che sa srungs kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni rta'i rgyal ngo sprin gyi shugs ldan gyi cha byad du/ la
la na bud med rin pa che'i cha byad du/ la la ni tshong dpon btsun pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni blon po rin pa mi'i cha byad du bdag nyid ma ngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
'khod de// la la na ste zhing kha drog sngo la phyang phrul dang rgyan dkar pos brgyan par bdag nyidra mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang
ba dan dmar po dang/ mu tig 'phreng ba thogs shing 'phang du ta la'i srid tsam gyi nam mkha'i dkyilan 'khod do// la la na dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ spyang phrul dang/ spyad pa kha dog la
brkan te/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshunadang/ ba don ser po dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs shing 'khod do// la la ni le brgan/ kha dog le brgan/ gser gyi gos dang/ phyang phyal dang/
lhab lhub ste/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan mthang ka bregs shing 'khod do// la la ni dmar zhing kha dog dmar la/ mu tig dkar po 'char 'bebs so// la la ni dkar zhing kha reg dkar/
la rmu tig dmar po'i char 'bebs so// la la ni lha'i drang srong gi kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ nam ma kha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs so// la la ni
bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyis gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las lha'i sgros sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs so// la la ni dri za'i kha dog gis lha'i sil snyan snatshogs
rdung ngo// la la ni lha'i bu mo'i kha dog gis rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod du spyos chu bregs te/ sa la chagachog 'dengs so// la la ni mchang bu nag po lta bu'i kha dog ste/ sngos sna tshogs
kyis rab tu bdug par byed do// la la ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing klu'i dbyangs 'byin to// la lan kha dog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/
bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de logs su mngon par phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir

rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs thogs sa// la la ni srang dang/ khang pa dang/ khyim dang/ skar khung dang/ rta babs dang/ bsal khang dang/ lam gyi bzhi ma dodang/ sum ma de dang/ khang pa brtsegs dang/
tsa glabya// dang sgo khang dang/ shing khang dang/ gzhal med khang rnams na 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig
can gyis gang gi ri/ bdud de dag thams cad g.yo ga dang bcas pa dge sbyang ga'u ta ma la skyabs su deng bar na grong bde'i tshe rab tu 'khrugs te/ skrag cing srang gi dbus na nga d+ma de 'khor bar
'dug go/ 'og man gyi lha grangs med dpag tu med pa 'i bar du 'og min nIs babs nas so ma nyan pa'i phyir pad+made'i khor yug tu 'khod de// bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa de

dag thos nas kun tu bltas na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen nge 'i srang gi dbus na pad+ma de las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa dag byung ste/ chos mnyan pa 'i phyir na bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
grangs med dpag tu med pa dang/ gas pad+ma de 'khor bar 'khod nga ra mthon ngo// de nas bdud sdig can gyis steng du ngaltas na/ 'dod pa na spyod nga 'i lha drug gi gnas thams cad na adu chos
mnyan pa'i tshur lta bye ba phrag brgya stod grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis pad+ma de dag 'khor bar 'khod par mabrong ngo// de nas bdud sdig can rab tu sdug bsngal zhing yod ma ngade nas
yid la gcags te/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur cing lus rdul te/ lus 'dar nas nam mkha' la rgyug cing skad chen pos bos te/ bdud gzhan zhig la 'di skad ces smras so// mi 'gyur/
yid kyis nga yi tshig la nyon// nga la stobs med bdag la 'dir dbang med// thub stobs yon tan shin tu dri med de// skye khe bstan phyir 'jig rten 'dir 'jug ga/ lha mi dga'
ba'i khar 'di'i byung ste// 'gro mchog ma lus nges par 'bar dong// bde gshegs rig la skam zhing rab tu dga'// yon tan rab mchog zhi ba'i lam du 'gro// 'di ni 'jig rtenagasum
bo slu ba dge sbyong skya yan te// lha min nga po thams cad yid gcig pad+ma 'khor bar 'dug/ dan 'jigs pa'i skad byunga myur du ra yi char phab ste// can s bdud kyi sde tshan mtshon gyis der
bcom 'dir brlag gyis// de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gi 'an khyad tshig 'di nyon cig khyod kyis chos rig no// bdag sde brlag pa
mthong yang zhi bar ra ya phyir mi 'gro// bder gshegs gzi brjid sku dang dang la gzugs mthong bas bdag rug myos// sangs rgyas 'dren pa ma gtogs 'di na skyabs rab mchog
gzhan med// de nas bdud gzhan zhig rab tu ngu zhing gdong mchog tu khros sras non pas/ bdud sdig can la'adaskadanus smras so// log pa'i lam du zhugs shing lan dman pa//
bdag gi stobs mthu med pa'i ng ma shes sam/ 'dren pa la yang gang phyir khyod sde ba// ngo mo tsha 'am 'dzem par mi bya 'am// bdag cag stobs na shin tu brlag par gyur//
sangs rgyas mthu yi 'grob ma lus pa// paN+Da'i drung du nye bar der dong ste// chos gros rim pas lus kyang shin tu dag/ bdag cag rnam par 'jigs shing skrag
gyur te// lus na dri nga stegs dang brtson 'grus ster// jatsus skad cig brlag nga ra ma gyur pa// de yi bar du thub dbang skyangs 'dong ngo// den bdud gzhan zhig gis la me
sbyar te/ 'di skad ces snas so// sdig can khyod ni chos kyi spyod pa spangs shing sdig byed dga'// sangs rgyas ma go 'di 'gro ba'i phan don mkhas shing dge ba'i mchog/ grong
khyer 'dir byen bdag cag myur du ngaga' bde ngang bas blta// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed srog chags kun gyi sman la skyabs su 'deng// de nas nam mkha' de nyid nas bdud dbyangs kyi blo
gros zhes bya ba des sgra chen por 'di skad cus snyas so// khyod kun tshogs nga sa gus shor dga' ldan nga ya ga nyon cig/ sdigang 'i lta ba kun bzlog lus btud ga ya du 'thun spyod de// khro
skadas rab dga' thub pa'i gsung mchog la yang dga' dad bskyed// sadas rgyas mngon sum rnyed dka'i skyabs de de ring gus par mchod// denus skad cig de nyid la bdud thams cad nam ma kha'
las babs nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi sgo rin po che sna bdun las byas te/ bdud la la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/

0 mchod pa'i phyir 'bad cing 'khod do// la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni dbang byed kyi cha byad du/ la la ni dpang phyug chen po'i cha byad du/ la la ni sred med kyi bu'i cha byad du/ la la ni dga'//

ldan pa 'i cha byad du/ la lan 'thab bral ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni brgya byin gyi cha byad du/ la la na sumanurtsa gsum pa 'i cha byad du/ la la ni gzhan nu'i cha byad du/ la la ni rnam thos kyi bu'acha byad du/
la la ni 'phags skyes pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni mig mi bzang gi du byed du la la ni yul 'khor srung gi cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa'i phal pa'i chu byad du/ la la ni ma'i cha byad du/

la la na zla ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni skar ma'i cha byad du/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni nam mkha' lding gi cha byad du/ la la ni mi 'am nI'i cha byad du/ la la ni lta 'khyerlan pa'i
du byed du/ la la na rin po che'i cha byad du/ la lani gser gyi rgyan gyi na byad du/ la la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyud du/ la la ni rin po ma'i shing ljon pa'i byad du/ la la ni rgyal
rigasakyi cha byang du/ la la ni ga zhan mu stegs can gyi na khyad du/ la la na 'khor lo rin po chu'i chu byed du/ la la nanor bu rin ba che'i du khyad du/ la la naglang po che sa srungs kyi ru'i chu
khyad du/ la lani rta'i rgyal po sngon gyi shugs can gyi cha byad du/ la la ni bud med rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni tshong dpon btsun pa'i cha byad du/ la lan blon po rin po che'i cha byad du
thubya// bdag nyid mngon par sbrul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// la la ni sde zhing kha dog sngo la phyang phrul dang/ rgyun dkar de sa brgyan par/
[+ ]bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dmar ba dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs shing/ 'phang du Sha
la'i srid tsam gyi nam mkho'i dkyil na 'khod do// la la ni dkar khring kha dog dkar la/ spyang phrul dang/ sbyad pa kha dog le brgan te/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan
yo ser pa dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs shing 'khod do// la la na le brgan kha dog le brgan la/ gsar gyi gos dang/ phyang phrul dang/ lhab lhub ste/ gdugs dang/ rgya mtshan/
dang ba dan mthing ka glegs shing 'khod do// la la ni dmar zhing kha dog dmar la// mu tig dkar nga 'i char 'bebs so// la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la/ mu tig dmar po'i chur
'debs so// lal ni lha'i drang srong gi kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkhalas me tog gi char mngon par 'bebs// la la ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
gzugs su mngon pa la sbrul nas/ nam mkha' las lha'i skyes sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs so// la la ni dri za'i kha dog gis lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo// la la ni lha'i bu mo'i kha dog
gis/ rin pe cha sna tshogs kyi snod du sngos chu thogs te sa la rlag nag 'debs so// la la ni mching bu na ga nga lta bu kha dog ste/ sres sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdug par byed do//
la la ni lha'i du'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing/ glu dbyangs 'byin to// la la ni kha dog sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das/
la bstod do// bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor la lano/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de logs su mngon ra ra phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rin po
che rnam pa sna tshogs thigs sa// la la ni srad dang/ khang pa dang/ skar khung dang/ rta babs dang/ bsal khang dang/ lam gyi bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa dang/
sgo khang dang/ gzhal med khang rnams na 'dug cing thal ma sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'a das 'a mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod de// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gang gi tshe/ bdud de dag thams
cad ga yog dang bcas te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabs su dod bar mthong ba de'i tshe/ rang tu 'khrugs te skrag cing myos nas rab tu ngu zhing 'di skadas smras so// bdag la phyin chad gro
med de// bdag gi dpal deng thams cad skor// bdag ni bdud kyi yul nas 'khyams// brtson 'grus tham brtsam par bya// bdag gis brgya rtsa ba bcad// pad+ma bcad dang kun 'khrugru
te des n sems can phyogs phyogs 'gro// de ni dri ma'i stobs yin no// bdud sdig can gyis de ltar bsams nas rlung lta bur nam mkha' las babs te/
srang gi pad+mag la ba der phyin nas/ pad+ma de'i sdong bo yan chad dbyung bar 'dodon/ reg par yang ma nus/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma bcad par 'dod na/ de dag kyang ma grong/ pad+ma'i snying bal lag
pas brdub par 'dod na de yang ma dam gas te dper na glog snad yang ma dmigs ba bzhin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na grub ma snang yang mi dam gas pa de bzhin tu/ pad+ma de yadu snang
mes kyi ma dmigs so// gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis pad+made mthong yang ma dmigs shing reg par mi rung ba de'itshe/ 'khor thams cad rab tu sngangs par bya ba'i phyir skad drag cing dul
'jigs pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dodon de yang ma nus so// yang stobs chen pa'i drag shul gyis rkang pa gnyis sa chen po la brdabs te/ rab tu bskyod par 'dodran/ reg par yang mnus te
ma dmigs so// 'di lta ste/ dperan la la zhig nam mkha' la rdob bar 'dod na ma dwasogs pa de bzhin du/ bdud sdig can gyis mthong yang reg par ma rung zhing mi dmigs nas//
de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci nas sems can 'dus pa rnams brtags te/ sems rnam par 'khrug par bya'o snyam/ sems can de dag mthong mang/ ma dmags shang reg/
a par ma rung ngo// de nas bdud sdig can rab tung zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi sa thus de'i lus shing ljon pa bzhin du 'dar te/ gdong mchi ma can gyis phyogs bzhir lta zhing 'di skad
ces smras so// dge sbyong gis na 'gro kun bsdu phyir de ring sgyu 'ad byas// 'di ltar de dag ni mdun 'dir bslad bzhin skad cig myos dar song// yul dang rang gi stobs las nyan
shing bdag gi sreg kyang rbad// des bskad brnag par ma gyur bar du bdag gnas myur du 'gro// bdag gi gnas su 'gro bar 'dod na der yang 'gro bar ma nus te/ de rab tu skrag
nang dus nas 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de/ bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di'i dbang du song du 'ong/ dgra 'da'i mdun du bdag gi srogazad par 'gyur du 'ong
gis 'dir mi snang bar byas te/ can s sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas nga 'i sa mas can gcig gis kyang bdag 'chi nga 'i dus byed pa ma mthong bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma mdzad kyi phyi rol
ru 'chi ba'i dus bya'o snyam na/ 'on kyang ma snang bar bya ba 'am/ phyogs dang/ phyogs mchims su 'bros kyang ma nus te/ de kId du mgul da btsang pa lngas btsungs ra ra

sa beng sa rab tu 'os shing snyog ste/ skad chen por du zhing 'di skad ces sus so// kyi shud bu dang gnyon shes sdugbdag gis ma thang nas rab tu khros shing skrag ste/ skad tshan par ngu zhang 'daskad cas pas sa/
bya@#// ro de nas bdud dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad du 'dug par gyur te/ des bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces sas so// ci'i phyir
khyod dang mya ngan yid du gdong gi sgra chen 'dod/ 'gro ba kun gtso grub mchog skyabs su ma 'jigs myur du song// 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyen sdug bsngal gsum
silab// 'ad la bsan bkur zhing ni bde 'gro thob par 'gyur yang dag/ de nas bdud sdigacan 'di snyam du bdag gis tshug snyan ra sa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i skyabs su [“]sing la//
blo bcings pa 'ad las bdag grol bar bya'o snyam du bsams te/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis phyogs gang na/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i phyogs ga la ba der gos su thal mo sbyar ba btud
nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang brag gi mchog skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba las rab tu thar par mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la
bdag skyabs su mchi'o// 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// thub mgon myur du 'jigs chen ni bzad btsangs pa 'di las khrol// de ring sman chad bde gshegs gtso mchog skyabs su bdug
mchi ste// gti mug gas na bdag mdangs khyed la khros shing nodas chen bgyis// mngon sum khyod bzhag spyan sngar de dag so sor bshags par bgyi// gang gi tshe bdud sdig can tshig
las/ snyan pas/ sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su gang ba de'i tshe na/ bdag spel ba sum du shes/ kang ka che 'khor 'di nas bdag 'gro'o snyam du bsams pa de'i//
tshe ya nga mgul pa b.rung ba lngas bcings par bdag gis shes te/ gang gi tshe gang du ra nga 'gro ma nus pa de'i/ bem ldan 'das la mgon dang skabs su sems bskyed nas/
ya nga bdag nyid grol bar shes so// lan bdun gyi bar du bdag bsungs pa dang grol bar shes te de nyid sna 'dug ge la nang chen nga rin po che tog gi gzungs las bdud btul ba'i
le'u ste gsum pa'o///gang du skyes nga 'i bar du ste// nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag rgyal de'i khad kyi grongakhyer chen por bsod sems kyi phyir song ba dang/ bdud
gzhon nu de dag gis dge sbyong glu long zhig 'dag sbyong gar byos shig ces skyed pa ma yin pa byed du bcug nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag kyang srang ga dbus na rgyug cing mya ngan las
'das pa 'i lam gyi tshig dang ldan nga'i glu dbyangs kyis gang gi tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa sas pa de'i tshe/ sa chan pa 'ad tu g.yos so// skad cig de nyid la lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod
sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnams gdod mchi ma can gyi 'di skad ces
snas sa/ chos kyi kha lo sgyur mchogamya ngan med bzhugs kyang// rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di lta bu yi gnas gyur te// hran thos de dag lan kyal ka deng byas
nga/ 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong na dad par ga la 'gyur// de nas lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham ya na dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye
chen po dang/ sran pa bye ba khrag khrig na nga pe gdong mchi ma can gyas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khodanas/ 'di skad cus gsol te// da ltar
bstan pa 'di la gnas// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzigs te/ bstan pa'i cho ga bsrung slad du// kun mkhyen btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' la nga//
'di ltar nga nyid der song ste// bzhin dpung bcas pa'i bdud btul la// skye bo mang po thams cad kyang// mya ngan 'das grong 'gre bar bya// de nas de dragany+tsams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di
skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs shige/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ bdud kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ klu'i yul
bsam gyis mi khyab/ las rnams kyi las kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal tam/ yul thams cad kyi nang nan sangs rgyas kyi yul khyad par du
03 lor gas pa'i mchog lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rab tu kham par mdzad pa dang/ chos kyi phung po bya ba khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa
dang nyon mongs nga 'i rgya mtsho bskam pa dang/ lta ba'i rgya mtsho dral po dang/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la gzud par spyod med kyi/ 'on gyis kyang bcom
ldan 'das deng gi dus la gshegs pa ra ma rigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/ sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad bdud du
gyur la/ de dag re re'i bdud kyi stobs dang/ sbyin gyi rlabs kyang sa'i rdul nga rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te/ de dag thams cad nga la gsod par shom yang nga'i spu'i khung du
gnug tsam la yang gnod par ma nus so// ngas ni 'di na 'dug nga bzhan du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rnams rab tu pham par bya ba dang/ gdul bar nus te/ bdud g.yog dang bcas pa
'ad na ma gtogs so// yang nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdud 'di dag gi rgyal po 'khab kyi grong khyer chen nga thams cad du bdud kyi stobs dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam par sprul pa'i byin
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon ba skyed par gyur to// jitsam na gdon las bzhengs par bzhed pa dang/ de nas 'od ma'i tshal srung bkrin
momathu mdzes zhes bya ba de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gdong mchi ma can du 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan de rang gshegs pa'i dus ma lags// grong la
'di dag kun nas bdud kyis gtams// ra'il yang shin tu ma ru dus ba// bye bas smra ba'i seng ge 'i bskor zhing mchis// zhesdang rab 'bar rno ba'i mtshon thogs te// khyod bkrong/
smad du 'khrugs pa'i sems kyis gnas// mgon po rnam pa kun tu dang ma gshegs// 'jig rten tshu ga brlag par ma bzhud cig/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzheng/
ba de'i tshe gtsug lag khang saM lha mo snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// 'di skad ces gsol to// sdig can dag ni lnga stong po/
mtshon char bsus te mchis pa na// bsam med de dag khyod la rtogs// thub chen de ring ma gshegs shig/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'dus gtsug lag khang nas byung ba dra'i tshi/ smanagyi
lha mo grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten sgron ma banag gyur na// kyi hudachos kyi ma
stor nang// chos kyi tshul ni rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi gru 'ang 'jig bar 'gyur// 'jig rten kun na rgyal chen gyi// chos kyi don nyams par 'gyur// 'gro ba 'di dag kon
mongs gang nacan gdug pas shin tu gtan sa// sa 'dir bde gshegs thub nga 'i mchog ni ma rung 'gyur ba las// ji ltar shin tu dbyung ba'i mthu ni bdag la ci ma mchis//
khyod ngarlag bgyi slad 'di na btu mi bzad mang po dag/ sdog pa'i chos can ral gri sta re mtshon rnon thogs shing nangs// bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten srung slad bdag
gi tshog gson te// stobs banu grub par bzhud pa de ring grong khyer ma gshegs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi dang ra nas bzhud pa dang/ de na shad ga
lha mo 'od 'chang zhes bya ba de nyid rdza sId ljabar du zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad rtse go la te// thams cad don grub thub pa ni da bzhin
rdzogs khyod ma rung gyur na ni// mgon po bams gsum 'di dang/ thams cad de'u re mig ni ster bar 'gyur// nam mkha' 'di la sbrul gyis skyed bcings rno pa'i mda' drang mtshon
thogs shing// khyod dgrongs slad du kha nas me 'bar rgyu yis da na dar ma gshegs/ de nas sgo gang gi lha mo 'od zer chu'i lha zhes bya bde sgra cher nga zhing brtsom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la ma ge khes phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol te// grong khyer bzang po 'din dram zer ming btags steng drag zhi
po mda' dang su gri mtshon cha 'bar kha bregs te snyang med par lta// gcog pas gcig mi bzad pa snying rjemed pa stong phrag nyishu rnams// khyod dgrongs slad du
'dinumachis kyis ga tsongama'i zhalan ma gshegs shig/ de nas btsan ldan 'das sgo gang du byon pa dang/ der rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyar srung ba'i lha ma ta la'i snying po zhes
bya ba de nam mkha' las sgra cher ngu shing bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du ranges par song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshol nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan shul 'ad seng gi rdza mo glang chen smyon pas bskor// dge slong rnams la gtsesad bdud kyis rnam mang gnod pa rang rgyud// sa 'dir ston nga khyod dgongs spyod du mustegs
gzhan yang brtson// sngon dbyangs 'od 'bar lha klu thugs brtse slad du ma gshegs shig gab ma ldan bdud thul khyod kyis bstan pa rnams gzhag dang/ sgyu ma bgyis pa mi mthun gdod
na bduda mthong nas// lham klu dang ma 'am ci yi dbang po rnams// kun 'dus ma dga' skug nas shin tu rnam par 'khrugs// dam chos char zhag pa dang 'jig rtan 'khrugs 'gyur dang
nam mkha'askar re nga skyer te zla gyur mthong nas// 'gro mchog kye ma ma bzad klad pa deng drag rdeb// bde gshegs ma rung 'gyur bar kun dogs kyi bud mchi/ gam grong ra'i nyam
'di nyams shing// chos kyi sgron ma zad par 'gyur// rdzogs nga 'i sangs rgyas dgrongs pas bdag/ chos kyi chu yang skam par 'gyur// dam chos spyod pa 'jig rten du// ma rung
'gyur bar nye gnas che// mi dge ba ni dadud rnams kyang// 'di dag kun ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas lha me des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog du ra ma mthong nas/ gdong na mi
macan gyis yang 'di skad ces gsal te// thub pa 'jig rten kun la gzugs su gsel// sna'atshog d rang brlag pa du ma bzhud cig/ bdag gi grong du ma rung khyod 'gyur na//
'jig rten gsum gyis rtag smad 'gyur du mchi// 'dren pa dog gi tshig gas na sems can mchog/ bdag gi grong du brlag par deng ma bzhud// sems can thugs brtse 'i slad du 'dir gzhes
te rngasems can skye bar gces pa 'jigs thar mdzod// dam pa brnyes nas sgrol bar rab 'gyur bar// sngon gyi dam bcas de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs// sems can mang po sdug/
bsngal du mas gdungs// srog chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung zhig/ sku ra chog bskal ba bye ba mang por bzhugs// kye ma 'ded la chags pa byis pa'i sde ga/ de rnams zhi bgyi
slad duchos lam shad// skye mched dbang po don ni rang bzhin stong// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo gang du gshegs pa dang/ de nas sa'i lha me
gakhri brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig sku gzhig cing gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// rab tu
sbyin la dgongs shir khyod kyis ni// rgya mtsho bzhi gtams ra yi khrag stsal cing// dgu dang rus pa khor yug ri rab tsam// sbyan yar gang+ga'i bye ma snyed stsal to// sngon na rin chen rnam pa
sna tshegs dang// sras dang btsun mo glang chen de bzhin rta/ gnas dang gos dang na la chu zas skom dang// de bzhin nad pa dag la 'dod sman stsal/ rang byung mchog rab la ni mchod/
pa mdzad/ khyod kyis khag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs// bzod pa dang ni thos pa rtag tu bsnyen// phar 'dzan mar 'dzan pa yang de bzhin no// bya bar da ka' ba dag kyang
mtha' yas spyad// sems can du ma nyon mongs bar par mdzad// gang sngon khyod kyis smon lam btang pa ni// lam mchog ston pa sangs rgyas ched gyur cig/ chu bo chen po las ni
'gro ba bsgral// 'jig rten la yang shin tu chos bstan te/ de la sdug bsngal ma lus par ni bskam par byas// sems can mang po 'jigs med grong khyer gzud// sems can de dag
0 dgos pa yongs rdzogs shing// byang chub Dam pa la ni shin tu 'khod// 'di na lan bar sdig pa spyod pa rnams// tshul khren sa gros bshig mgon pos brjod par mdzod// 'di dag
sgrol cig dam bcas dgongs su gsel// bskal pa bye ba mang por chos sten te/ ma chen po chu de dag las 'jig rten sbrel// 'di dag yan lag brgyud kyi chu mas khrus// mgon po
na chog rang khyod dang 'dra ngan// 'jig rten gsum de 'don 'ga' na na tshas// bdag sgrol 'jig rten 'di dag grol bar mdzod// srid gsum rgya mtsho las kyang 'gro ba sgrol//
khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig/ rtag tu bzhugs shing chos nang shadadu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo gang du gshegs pa dang/ skadacig de nyid la lha dang/
klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ sran pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang banam ma khab la rgyu zhing gdeng na dri ma can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag rnams kyis bde gshegs sngon
nga sheng ba/ zhi ba'adus la shin tu sleban dul// chos rnams rgya cher ston pa mdzad pa na// de la 'di lta bu ya bgegs ma byung// sanar 'di na shin tu dus ngan la// rgyu chen blo
nga sa rang byung nyid bar s te// thub dbang 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad slad du// 'jig rten nyon modas bsgribs la chos ston cing// smra ba'i seng ge 'din bzhugs bzhin du// sdig can
dag ni phye ba stong mang po// 'di ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jig par byed// sangs rgyas dpa' bo khrod du deng ma gshegs// de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gsa'
skad ces gsol to// sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phan brtson pa// u0f7a dag yul gcig 'khor lo bskor gyur pa// 'di na gang du gshags ba der yang bskor// derang ma rung bar rnagyur
ta re de nas yang lha ma gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// ded dpon 'dir ni thugs rje'i slad/ shin tu sems can don mdzad sbyang// de ni de ring grong khyer 'dir// brlag
par gyur snyam bdag rtog go/ yang de'i tshe lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
gdong mchi ma zag cing ngo 'dzum gnag pa dag nam mkha'i dus kyi lam las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas// bdag nyid la rnam pa mang po byed de/ lal ni sgra 'bul/
la lani rgyan 'grol/ la la ni gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan snyol la la ni bdag gis lus sa la rtog/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dzin/ la la ni shin tu
nyon mongs par du/ la la ni lag pas brang rdud/ ra la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug cing sa bya bzhin du 'gro ldog// la la na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo/
sbyar te bstod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang/ bdug pa dud skyes dang/ 'breng ba dang/ gos dang/ phyang phrul dang/ gser gyi skad nga/
dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang/ ras brtses bu dag mngon par 'thor ro// de nas lha gzhan bye ba mang pos mgrin gcig tu skad mthon por 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten
don slad 'di bas mang ba ya// bya bar dka' ba khyed kyis rab tu spyod// zang pa'i dus deng 'dare na khyod skyes kyis// btang snyan s mdzod la mi gshegs bzhugs su gsol//
sdig med khyod kyis sangs rgyus mdzad pa nyung du mdzad// lha dang ma rnams dbang du mdzad pa shin tu nyung// shin tu yun ring chos rnams ston cing khyod bzhugs la// srid pa
gsum gyi rgyu mtsho 'di las 'gro ba sgrol// dge ba'i las rnams 'gyed cing sa bon yongs smin te// bdud rtsi'i snod du gyur pa'i sems can du ma la// khyod kyis thugs rje bskyed
de so sad 'ab ston la// chu bo las ni 'jig rten nyam thag bsgral bar na dzod// 'gro ba'i dgon pa'i dpus sen 'khyams gyur cing// 'khor ba'i dgon par shin tu lam stor ba/
de dag lan lam mchog so sor ston// 'phags pa'i chos mchog gi chags thar par mdzod// chos kyi 'khor la dam pa gang bskor ba// de na khyod kyi thugs rjes ngo mtshar rmad//
u/ rlabs chen thugs mnga' ring du bzhugs su gsol// 'gro ba rnams na mgon med mgyur cig/ de nas yid lhamo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
[• ] rnam 'dren brgya las ma rung gyur na ni// 'jig rten 'don ma lus ldongs par 'gyur// yan lag brgyad ldan rnam thar gsum gyi rgyu// 'dir ni yongs ye thams cud ma mchis 'gyur//
ngag lus sems las skyes dag sa bon dag/ bdagacugapag med gyur sras 'dir btab ste// de slad bdag cag bde ba kun dang ldan// bsod nams 'byung ba nas 'di brlag ma gyur cig/
yang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// sa 'dir bye ba'i bdud rnams nyer lcags kyang// thub
klu ba rlabs chen thugs mnga' nam yang ni// ma rung mi 'gyur khyed cag ma 'jigs shig/ dge ba 'di la bdag cag mngon sum gyur/ dpag tshad sum cu drug tu mgyogs shong drag shul ldan
pas kun tu bskor// rna sbyang ral gri mtshon rnon nub nga 'i sgra mang 'jigs pa bdud kyi sde// byang chub snying por lhags pa de'i tshe de dag 'jigs shing brlag gyuran// de ltar don bar s
grags pas khyab pa de lag la bgegs shig byed// danas lham gzhan zhig du nga 'di skad ces smras so// sngon byung ba ni bdud kyi sde gcig yin te de dag dpung mtshe// 'din bye ba khrag khrig/
bdud kyi sde ste shin tu dpung che bas// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa 'di ni brlag par 'gyur ru ra kha dogs/ dakhag rten 'di dka shin tu snang med 'khyam par 'ong// de nas bcu
cin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad cus kasal to// blo zhan bdag cag gi ni tshig gson te// dge ba
ba zhugs shig gtso bsgrukAs rje can/ lha mang bye ba mya ngan chen chos gdungs// de la chos kyi bcud kyis da gdo ni/ de dus bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor re
dag la byams pa yangs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs nas/ de dag shin tu dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// deng khyod ma 'jigs khyed ni ma
skrag cig/ bdud rnams thams cad bzhin bcas cigacar du// rtogs kyang sku gcig skrag par mi nus na// nga yi lus kun la ni smos ci dgos// dang ni 'jig rten thams cad dbugs
phyung ste/ gang yis rtag tu sa 'di'i chos bshad do// lam [… ]ster ba la na nga nyid kyis dri ma med pa la nga dag lam bstan bya// ngas sngon bya da dka' ba mang po byas// zas dang
skom yang shin turgya chen khyon// gnas dang sman yang ming sbyin byin da sa// nga la deng su gnod par byed par nus// ngasan rta dang glang chen shing rta dang// lhab lhub phyang phul dag gi
rgyana rnam sadang// dran pa branam grong rdal yul 'khor btang// du lasu zhag gnod pa byed par nus// chung ma bu phabum branamang dang// yad 'ong dbang
phyugs steng rgyal srid dang// sems can rnams la phan phyir ngas byin gyis// da lus derang ci phyir 'jig par 'gyur// mgo dang sna dang rna ba mag gnyis dang// lus dang pags
pa khrag dang rkang lag bcas// nga yi srog kyang lus can rnams la btang// su zhigang la 'tshe bar byed par nus/ ngas ni sangs rgyas bye ba rab mang la// gus ldan bdag gi lag nas
shin tu mchod// rtag tu tshul khrims thos dang bzod la dga'/ gang lasu zhig rlag par byed par nus/ gangs sngon shin tu bya dka' mang po rnams// mnyam par bzhag pas
rab tu nga yis byas// lus kun bcad kyang d la 'khrug medan// nga la rnam par 'tsho bar su zhaganus// nyon mongs dra btul nges par nga sangs rgyas// sems can
thums rud lan byams sems ldan// khro med phrag dog tha bang la med// nga ya mdunun dering su zhiganus/ ngas na bdud kyi dpung rnams tshogs pa btul// ngasan bdud rnams
bye ba pham par khyos// khyod kun rnam par thar par nges par bya// grong du ci phyir ma 'gro ma 'jigs shig/ soms na donakhyer phyogs bcu'adi dgan// sangs rgyas la la gang dag
bzhugs pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun dang byung chub sems dpa' yang// rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kununas bsog/ zhing rnams mtha' dag rab tu gang bar bya// bsod nams
ye shes dag gis gnas par bya// sangs rgyas de dag tshul bcas kun gnas pas/[” ]/sangs rgyas dag gis dgongs pa 'i mdzad pa bya// yang de'i tshi (lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/
srin po dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang/ ma ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stod grangs med dbag tu med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das
la legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// ngo mtshar rmad du byud ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ngomatshar chen po rmad du byung ba grangs med/
pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dbugs phyung ngo/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bdud kyi phyogs phan par mdzad do// sems can rnams kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rtog pa bsal to// sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi ri rab tu b.ril lo// skye ba'i shing ljon
pa bcad do// 'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar brlag so// ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal te// gzhan mu stegs can rab tu dad par bsgyur to// chu bo bzhi bskams so// chos kyi sgron ma rab tu
'bar bar mdzad do// byang chub kyi lam bstan to// bzod pa dang des pa la btsud do// bsam gtan gyi bde ba la rtser stsal to// bab gas pa'i bden pa
[• ]bzhi khong du chud par mdzad do// ston pa bcam ldan 'das thugs rjechen po mnga' bas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral to// sems can rnams 'jigs pa ma
mchis pa'i grong khyer du rab tu btsud do// de nas lha dang ma do dag gis bdugapa dang/ me tog dang/ skyos dad/ 'phreng ba dang/ phyug ba dang/ lhab lhub dang/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis
bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lam de phyag bdar khyas so// lha'i gos dang/ me tog dang/ lha'i sa bortsis dus kun tu g.yogs so/
lha'i me tog man da ra ba dad/ mnadarab chen po dang/ paru sha ka dong 1 paru shaka chen po dang/ malcesha ka dang/ ma sha kachen po dang/ mdog mdzes dang/ mdog
mdzes chen po dang/ ut+pal dang/ ku mud dang/ pad+mas kun tu g.yogs so// gang du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 'dor ba'i lam de'i ngos gnyis su lha'i
rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa mngon par sprul te/ lha'i ras bcos bu dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang/ lag rgyun dang/ rna rgyan dang/ mgo'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan to//
gang de dag gi bar bar du lha'i rdzing bu grang zhing zhim pa'i chu dngas shing rig pa med la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun gang ba/ khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan gyis
brgyan pa dag sprul te/ bar snang la ma nga rin pa che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gson gyi skud pa dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba bzang zhing gser gyi phye
ma dag gi char pa ngo rab tu phab bo// dngul dang/ bo zurma'i phye ma dang/ a ka ru dang/ rgya skyes dang/ dusakyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ ma la'i 'dab ma'i char yang rab tu phab po/
gor shir sha dad tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char yang lam der phab po// lha'i rgyan sna tshogs gseragyi skud pa dang/ mu tig gra 'phreng ba dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dag
gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad brgyan to// grong khyen gyi phyi rolan yang lha dang mi rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lam mdzes par byed do// grong khyer gyi nangan
bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bkod pa dag bkod pa byas so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs bzhin du lan de nas gshegs so// yang de'i tshebcom ldan 'das sku'i gzugs dang/ rtags dang//
spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lam der zhugs te/ de na sems can gang dag tshangs pa la drad cing tshangs bas 'dul ba de dag gis na bcom ldan 'das tshongs pa'i
gzugs su lam nas gshags pa mthong ba nas/ gang dag brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i dar dang/ gang dag sred medakyi bus 'dul ba dang/ gang dag dbang phyug chen pos dul ba dang/ gang
dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis 'dul ba dad/ gang dag 'khor los sgyur bas 'dul ba dang/ gang dag khams kyi rgyal phran gyis 'dul ba dang/ gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul ba dang/
gang dag dge sbyong gis 'dul ba dang/ gang dag gzhan nus 'dul ba dang/ gang dag bud medakyas 'dul ba dang/ gang dgasod gis 'dul ba dang/ gang dag glang po chus 'dul ba dang/ ga
dag klus 'dul ba dang/ gang dag lha ma yin gyis 'dul ba nas/ gang dag ra bed la dad cing 'khong gis 'dul ba'i khar de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ri bong gi gzugs dang/ rtags dang/
skyed lo ma kyis lam nas gshegs pa mthong ngo// sems can gang dag sa ngos rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag gis ni bcom ldan 'adas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang/ rtags dang/ spyod lam
kyis lam nas gshegs par mthong ste/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas mngon par bstod cing phyag 'tshol te zham ring du 'brang zhing dong ngo// yang de'i tshe gangs kyi
dang nye ba na gnas pa drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bdud sdig can gyis btang nas de ga ngag lnga brgyudang/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo'i drung na stod pa sa bcom ldan
'dras drang srong gi gzugs dang/ rtags dang/ kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ spyod lam dang/ bkod pa de lta bu lam de nas gshegs shing/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po
mchod pa byed par brtson bar mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang du 'di snyam du senus so// bden par 'di ni drang srong chen po mthu che zhing mchod par 'os pa ste// lha dang mas mchod par//
snang ngo// 'di ni lus thams cad kyang bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan te/ mkhas shing slob dpon yin par shes so// bdag cag gnyis gang rgan gang mkhas pa de la sa
jaltar brtag snyam ste/ denus 'di ltar bdag gis bsu la/ 'di la rigs dang/ rus dang/ gnas dang/ brtul zhugs kun dri'o snyam du sems so// de nas drang srong
skar ma la dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas nas 'di skad ces smas so// thos ldan yid 'thad brtul zhugs che 'dzin mchod pa'i rigs par snang// zhashes chos don
ldan zhing thub mchog bzod 'dilam rab mkhyen// khyed cag thams cad 'di la gus par mchod rten yang dag sbyor// yon tan ldan pa 'di las 'khor mthar 'gro ba'i legs bshad/
mkhyen de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag thams cad kyis ma grin gcig tu mkhan po de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba/
g.yog dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das grwa la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar to 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// khyod su zhig/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ngani bram ze'o// gsal pa/ khyed kyi gdung rus ni/ bka' stsal pa// nga'i rus ni go'u ta ma'o// gsol pa/ khyod kyi brtul zhugs ci/
bka' stsal pa// nga brtul zhugs ni rnam par thar pa gsum mo// gsol ba/ khyod kyi spyod pa nyid/ bka' stsal pa/ ngani yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid 'o spyod do//
gsal pa/ khyod rab tu byung nas ji srad len/ bka' stsal nga/ ma rig pa byung nas ji srid lon pa/ nga rab tu byung nas kyang de srid len no// gsel ba/ drud srado chen kho
skur ma la bshad pa lung bstan pa'i rig pa gsung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ sgro btags pa mid pamanyam pa nyid du ltago/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi shes pa
ste/ de la snying po ci zhig yod/ drang srong gis gsol pa/ mkhas pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar ma'i gnas gang yin//
ba drang srong gis gsol ra/ gad zla ba dang nyi ma la rten cing rjes su rgyu ba'i rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad brjod pa 'di dag go/ de la mdzung ni ser brgyad kyi tshad de/ mdzub pa'i tshad
kyis lus pa srid du mdzub bcu gnyis mchis par rig par bgyi'o// klang po'i spyi bo la mdzub gang dang/ rkang pa'i mthil la ma dzub gang dang/ mdzub b.ru bzhi ste/ skar ma rnamU
kyi gnas so// gang du dag na gda' ba ni rnam pa gzhan du ma 'gyur te/ skar ma gang dang gang la b.rus pa du dang de na gda' 'o// yang gong zhe na/ dbangashad par bgyis/ grub dang/
chen po gsan cig/ sman drug la nasu btsus pa// de yi gdong gi sar bzhin// g.yas phyogs na na skye ba mchis// spyi can gnag la mdog kyang dmar/ dalongs spyod bdag
nga grags dang ldan// mkhas shing rab tu dpa' 'bar te// snyan drug la ni skyes pa yi// mtshan ma nyid ni de lags so// gang zhig la ni sor bzhin// skye ba 'di nyid gda' ba da
snar ma la ni skyes pa ste// shes shing rtag tu chos la dga'// mkhas shing longs spyod phun sum tshogs// rnam pa kun tu mdzes dang ldan// dpa' zhing rgyal ba phun sum tshogs//
ngag rnams rtag bar rab tu 'dzen sa// mgul pa yi ni mdzub phyed na// gang la tshig pa 'dra gda' ba// deni mgo la skyes pa ste// dpa' zhing longs spyod ldan pa'o// mdzub
ba bya@#// kyi phyed bo gnyis pa la// ga mnan sme ba gang mchis pa// lag la skyes pa khro ba ste// de ni blun zhing longs spyod bdog/ mchan khung ga lonan ske nag/
[A ]mtshis// zhabs lan skyes pa ste// nor dang 'bru yad 'byor par 'gyur// den shes nga'i rgya yang chung// ji ltar khyed na rgyal la skyes// mtshan mchog dag ni rab tu gda'/
phyag gi ma b.lan 'khor lo ni// dri ma lta bur rab tu mdzes// dbu skra dgan thams cad kyang// gyen dug yas 'khyil legs par mchis// sku ni chu zheng gab pa ste// 'dren
pa khyod kyis kon mongs thul// tshig 'dra gang ga snyadi ka mchis// skag la skyes te 'thab mo srid// tshul khrims 'chalasung 'grogs mi bde// don g.yem la dga' ba'o//
'og gan brang ngam rgyab gcig na// gang la bu sran 'dra gda' ba// mchu la skyes te nor dang ldan// btsun khring chos dang ldan pa'i mi// lta ba'i g.yas g.yon gnyis ka na//
gang la rma 'dra gda' ba na// den bri la skyes pa ste/ ser sna che zhing tshe yang byung// lte ba man chad sor bzhin// gang la skye ba rab gda'ob// dbo la de skyes longs spyod
can/ khrims ldan 'chi 'phos mtho ris mchi// me bzhi la ni skyes pa dag/ skye ba dman pachu sa gda'// skuzhing g.yo ngan sgyu ma ste// bsod nams chung zhing shes pa//
zhan gang ga mtshon na skye ba ni/ 'gradu'u bar gyur pa nges par yang// nag pa la ni skyes pa ste// 'dodra chags rtag tu glu gar dga'/ mtshan kyi 'og gam steng na ni//
skye ba ser po rab tu gda'u/ sa ri la ni de skyes te// mi mkhas brkam zhing mang bo sdang/ dkar gzhis kyi nimadzub gang na//skye ba dmar bo de bzhin te// kra ka la ste shar ba
mchog/ skyes pa budamed rnams kyis bskor// mkhas shing dba' la dgra yang thul// rtag tu bde la gnas ba ste// ngo tsha shes shing brtan dang ldan// ga 'phros nas ni
madzra ris mtsho/ 'bar gnyis kyi namadzub don// gang la byi sun 'dra gda' ba// lho mtshams las te tshul khrims can// chos dang longs spyod ldan pa// gang gi brla log
gatris na ni// skye ba gda' ba snon la skyes// ma sdug tshe thung tshul khrims 'chal// dbul zhing snying rje ma mchis so// pus mo gnyis ka'i gong na ni// gang la mchud gda'/
ba de snubs las skyes te dbang thang can// myur du bdag khyim zhig par bgyid// chu stod lani skyes pa dag/ skye ba pus ma'i lhad na// sbyin pa bgyidatsang chos lam 'tshol/
'chi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi// chu smad la ni su skyes pa// sku mdo la ni skye ba mchis// de ltar gda' bo shes dang ldan// longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams// skye ba
[©]// gnyis pa gda' ba ni/ 'gro bzhan la ste longs spyod rtag/ de bzhin nad med sems can khyams// 'chu'i ngos nas ni mthe ris mchi// skye ba nag po
[+ ]ngar la/ (gda' ba mon gru skyes pa skye// de ni khro zhing 'dod chags chu// longs spyod ma mchis shes rab ldan// rdzongar la ni mdzub don// sme ba nag po rab tu gda'//
mon gre la skyes thun pa ni// de na chu yos 'chi ba 'gyur// rje ngar 'og gi mdzub gadran// rmi 'dra mchis pa khrums stod la// blun zhan gzhan la gnod bar bgyid// de ni dbul zhi
rkun po bgyid// gang la skye ba mdzub gduna'akhrums smad la na skyes pa ste// sbyin dang tshul khrims ldan pa dang/ shes rab 'jigs med snying rjer ldan// gang gi rkang pa gnyis ka
la= skye ba phram gda' ba ni// nam gru skyes pa marabs te// 'dreg mkhan du yang 'gyur ba lags// gang gi mthe bo'i phrag par yang// skye ba sngon po gda' ba ni// rtag tu stobs ldan
nad ma mchis// tha skar la na da skyes te// rkang mthil skye ba mchis pa ni// khra nye la ste snying brtse medu// gsod pa'i gshedama'i dang tshul can// shi 'phosanas ni dmyal bar
mam gang gis spyod pa 'tshal ba ni// skar ma'i gnas ni 'o da dag lags// 'jig rten nana rnam shes 'dis// sems can rnams ni pha rol 'dren// bcom ldan 'das kyis
0 bka' stsal pa// kun tu rtog pa'i spyod yul can// byas pa gang la chags 'dug pa// den byis pa rmongs pa ste// sems la gnas shing ri'i sa nad bcas// khyi dang sbrul dang
rus sbal dang/ srog chags gzhan yong rnam mang po// skar ma rgyal la gang skyes pa// de dag bde ba bsten ma yani// ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang// thar pa khyod kyis red
pa bzhin// nga yad thams cad gzigs pan// ci phyir nga la khyod 'dra// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas// bcom ldan 'das la me tog gas gtor nas// yid rab tu dga'
ste 'di skad ces gsol to// drang srong mi yi gzugs sun// mtshan mchog rnams kyang shin du gda'// khyod kyi gdung rus ma 'tshal na// lha 'am 'on te khyod mi lags//
gsung dang dbyangs dag 'byin pa ni// tshangs pa chen po btsan du gda'// spyod pa'i gnas dang tshul gyis ni// sngon gyi drang srong rnams dad 'dra// thub partsi 'dra phun sum tshogs//
'di sngon ma mthong ma thosan// khyod kyi ston gang de ni de// khyod kyi gdung rus ci logs gsungs/ de bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa// pa rol tshu rol mi shes shing// mtshan
ma la ni gang gnas pa// de dag sdug bsngal kun gyis bcings// da ni thar pa'i snod ma yin// pha rol phyin drug nga yi rus// bram ze mngon shes drug dang ldan// yang dag
dga' badrug smazhing// dbang po drug ni rnam par gzhag/ chos gsum rtogs pa'i shes dang ldan// nga yi spyod pa rnam thar gsum// byang chub sems ninam/
skyes pa// de tshe nga ni rab tu byung// mtshan ma rnams n ngasam dmags// mtshon na med par rab tu bsgoms// sems can med cing srog med pa// bdag med stong bar mngon sangs
rgyas tshor ba gsum dang 'du byed gsum// stong ba nyidadu rnam par bsgoms// nga yi ye shes pa la song// nga yi tshig 'di mtshungs pa med// gang dag mkha' bzhin ma chags
par byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed nga// de dag bzod stobs phun sum tshogs// ye shes 'di 'dra'athob par 'gyur// chos rnams la ni mi 'jugacing// rnam par smin pa
'dod med la// de bzhin nyid las 'gal ma byed// de dag byang chub rnyed pa dka'// chos rnams la ni mi gnas shing// pha rol tshu rol mi rten par// yang dag mtha'ani 'di'i bsnyen
na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// mtshan nyid med nyid mtshan ma'ang med// dmigs pa dag ni rnam par skadus// chos rnams kun dang ma 'dresan// de bzhin gshegs
ba nyid du 'gyur// rang gi mtshan nyid 'dori bor la// rang gi sems la the tshom skyongs// nam mkha' 'dra bar shes nas su// nga 'drar sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byas// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad ba de dag gsungs ma thagatu/ de nas drang srong skyar ma la dga' ba g.yog dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang//
rtags dang/ spyod lam du zhugs par mthong nas/ sngon gyi dgu ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur to// de nas drang srong skyar ma la dga' bas ting nge 'dzin gang thob na/ byang chub
sa nas dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin du 'dug nas/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la lta zhing gzhan la rag las pa med do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs bar 'gyur
ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che tog ces bya ba thob bo// de nas drang srong sar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag pa
gnyis n me tog thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dra dgra gis mngon par bstod do// yon tan mtha' yos 'jig rten mgon pa bden da/
gsungs pa legs bzhugs pa// khyod kyi ye shes spyan gyi 'od zer gyis ni 'jig rten kun snang mdzad// rtag tu sems can kun gyi slad du dba' bo byams pas mngon 'phags pa
sems can snying po chags pa zang ba 'dren pa khyod la deng phyag 'tshal// gser gyi kha dog gsar dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsal gyur pa'i/ yon tan dag gis sems can
bya// thams cad byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul// khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nyon mongs ri rnams bcom par gyur// tho ma'i spyod pa byang
[D• ]chub shes pa'i rgyu ni da rung mthur phyir ti// sman pa chen po sems can snying po mtshan rnams kyis ni ri rab brgyan pa yi// sems can snying po sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i
'dun pa de ring bor shad du gsol// bdag gis lta ba'i rgya mo gtsud cing grol nas 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi// ja srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ma yi dam pas 'byung
bstan gsol// sdug bsngal chu bos bdas ba'i sems can srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba brag pa med pa'i lam la dgod par bgyi/
phyogs bcu dgan sangs rgyas gang rnams yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu dag/ nga drag bdag gis dbang du gsol te byang chub tuni sems gzhol brgya// drag cing ma bzud rtsub pa'i
sdug bsngal dag gis reg pa'i sems can kun// dus gsum gyi na bdag gi lus dang dag dang yid kyi bsod nams des// sems can thams cad sdug bsngal de ring zhi bar gyur
cing sems can kun// sangs rgyas kyi ni bde dang ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'da'akhad shog/ sems can thams cad nad zhar gyur cing nyon mongs chu yang skems par sheg/
ngo khri nyid kyis ye shes dbang po snying po ldan pa thob par shog/ sems can gang dag gsad par chad cing sdug bsngal dag gis gces pa rnams// de dag bdag gis bsod nams
gzi brjid dag gis myur du thar par shog/ sems can re res kyang ni yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad thob gyur cig/ shes rab bsod nams tshad med ba dang bde ba kun gyis tshig par
koka/ de dag sdug pa rnam stangs lta ba mnyam bad du bsten gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skyeng dran zhing chos la spyod pa nyid du shog/ sems can de kun chos grub sridaba'i
glu ma tshe pha rol rgyal gyur cig thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin pa sangs rgyas su yang grub par shog/ bskal pa dang ga tu med bar chos kyi char yang 'bebs shing 'dug gyur cig/
sems can thams cad chos kyi sngon gyi char chus legs par 'khru bar shog/ bdag gis lus dang ngagadang yad kyis nongs pa nyung zad ci bgyis nga// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du
gsel te lus par bgyis nas so sor bshags// bdag kyang phyin chad sdig la lta ba'i las rnams spyod par ma gyur nug/ rtag tumadun na bsam gyis mi khyab gang zag mchog
bzhugs mthong bar shog/ bdag gis bsod nams cud zang ci mchis deng nas byang chub bsngo bar bgyi// sems can ched du spyod pa kun dang sdug bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi// sems
can thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam du rab tu gzud par bgyi// bskul bar zhing dang ye shes sems can rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang bar bgyi//
chub reg 'gyur zhing ya nga rnam par dag par thob par bgyi// 'khor kun rnam par dag cing bzod pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog/ smra ba'i seng ge ngas par mngon par shes balnga rnams b
bar shog/ 'dren pa chags med ye shes ldan zhing thams cad gzigs pas lung bstan gsol// 'jig rten du ya nga sangs rgyas chos kun kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur zhe na/ me tog sil
ts+tshA ma gtor ba nam mkha' la ni gdugs su gnas par shog/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams lhags par kun kyang dpang gyis shig/ sa rnams go yo bar byed cing khyod kyi zhabs la mgo
bros phyag 'tshal shog/ de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de steng logs su gtor ba dang// me tog de dag thams cud bcom ldan 'das
kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du gdugs gcig tu gyuranas 'dug ste/ drang srong skur ma la dga' bas de mthong nas rab tu zang zing med nyid mchog tu dga' ba dang/ yid bde bas tshaming
skyes par gyur te/ de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' khas/ bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drag tu g.yos so// sems can bye ba
khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang dag der lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang yid ma skyo zhing ltad mor gyur to// gang dag glang pos 'dul dra'i sems can de dag gis
na bde bar gshegs pa glang po che'i gzugs su mthong nas yid dga' bar gyur cing/ drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' mos me tog gtor ba de dag steng gi bar snang la gdugs su gyur
tu gnas pa dang/ sa g.yos pa de yang mthong nas rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// gang dag yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i
sems can de dag thams cad kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyis cha byad du mthong nas ngo mtshur du gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'dras dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
las bzhengs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gis tang ngo 'dzin de las bzhengs par mthong nas/ zang zing mdasring mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/
bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang/ sngos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ na bza' dang/ phyang phrul dang/ rgyun ji snyed pa de dag gis gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po myur du longs la nyon// byang chub lung bstan zhes ni 'dren pa gsung// mnyam pa med/
nga'i mthus ni sa g.yos shing// nam mkha' la yang me tog gdugs gcig 'dug/ khyod ni 'jig rten khan phyir ston dbang po// rkang gnyis dag gi gtso bo sangs rgyas su//
bsod nams mtha' yas nam mkha'atshad mnyam pa// khams gsum snying por 'gro ba'i sgron mar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dwapa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la
dga' bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang du bdag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsalapa/ khyod ni bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa na/ byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog rgyas ba'i drazhes bya ba 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
den ji ltar da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du dkedab de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa//
bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdul med skyes
snang skar ma'i dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ khyod kyi tshe tshad ni bar gyi bsgol kha bcu thub par 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa 'ba' zhig gi gnas su 'gyur te/ khyod kyang ngan theg pa chen pa'ikatam 'ba' zhig ston par 'gyur ro// 'khor ji snyad lhags pa/
rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen po skar mal dga' ba lung bstan pa de thosanas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed pa la brtson par gyur to//
dram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya pa de dag dang/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu nganu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur
te/ de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tang nge 'dzin byang chub kyi sems mi brjod pa zhes bya ba thob bo// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las drang srong skar
ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas bdud bye ba dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar grong khyer 'di'i phyi rol lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dag gis
brgyan ba derazhin du/ bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i sgo gang nas gshegs pa'i de'i sgo dung de 'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam ba khyad/
par du 'phags pas brgyan to snyam pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis bdud bye ba de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa mkhyen nas/ 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon
par 'du mdzad do// de ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byab mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo banu gakris su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das danu gnyis grong khyer gyi sgo ra'i
nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so// bdud bye ba de dag kyang nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du/ bdud kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyun shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa/
rdzu 'phrul grangs med ba dang ldan nga 2 bkod pa'i mchog rnams dang/ bkod pa mdzes pa rnams kyis grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang/ sa'i phyogs de dag dang/ rtsig pa de dag dang/ shing
dadog dang/ sa'i des de dag brgyan te// bdud bye ba dedag dang/ bdud kyi 'khor de dag la la dag ni/ tshangs pa'i cha byad lta bu nas/ dwa nga sred chen po'i cha byad lta bu'i bar du bsgyur
te/ nam mkha' la gnas bzhin dukhang pabartsegs pa de dag gi skar khung dang/ rta babs dang/ ba gam dang/ skyed shing gi nang na me tog dang sbos dad/ bdug pa dang/ 'phreng ba dang//
0 gser dang dngul dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig sna tshogs kyis smras pa dang/ gos dang/ rus dang/ ras btsus bu sna tshogs dang/ lhab lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi char ni rab tu phab/
sal snyan dang/ dkrol ba sna tshogs ni dkAl nas bstod kha dang/ yon tan bsngags pa snatshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngo
mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod ba mchog tu rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pas/ rgyal bo'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i snyan bzhugs te/ zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bos
sgo'i them pa la reg pa ra mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa de la reg ma thag tu de nas de'i med la/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'diring

tu ga zhes so// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri brgya byin dang/ rmongs ba dang/ khyim dang/ zla ba dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ driza dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phyichen pa'i dbang po dag dang/ sa dang/ chu dang/ rgya mtsho chen po dang/ grong khyer dang/ yul 'khor
gyi lha dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang/ 'og min gyi bar nas bzung ste/ sems can gabri brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams
kacad sa g.yos par snang ba des bskal ma thag tu smyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po kha ra khor yug tu bskor nas/ sa dang nam mkha' la gnas shing/ me tog dang/ sbyos dud
kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma'i bar gyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog dang/ phyi ma 'bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi cha re re na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing la

snga rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yod+ma su dkapa dang/ yongs su ma dag pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mi stong pa rnams su sangs rgyas la mchod cing bsti stang bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gter ba
dang sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu me tog dang/ phye ma dang/ rgyun de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo// myur du sad par gyis la 'di dag ltas// byang chub phyir ni bag yod spyad
