pa spyod// khyod kyis 'khor ba'i gcong rong 'khyam pa yi// 'jig rten thams cad dag ni sgral bar byos// yongs su smin dang ldan pa'i dus bab kyis// g.yeng bar gyur pa rab tu
myur thong la// 'dir ni sngon gyi dam bcas yid labyos// byang chub lung bstan rab tu thob par 'gyur// thub dbang drang srong chen po myan med// 'gro la phan phyir de ring grong khyer
gshegs// bdud stod bye ba rang gis pham mdzad des// den chos kyi 'khor la myur du bskor// grigs pa zhi ba 'di la 'gro dga' mdzad// dpa' mchog dadas pa mang dag ston pa
mdzad 'gro ba sdug bsngal dag las thar mdzad nas// byang chub tun de rang lud mang snyan// rang byung mya ngan med pa'i grong khyer gshegs// da phyir zhing der rab tu myur gshegs la//
de ltar mdzes pa de dag reb ltos te// rim gyis byang chub tu yang 'gyur bar byas// yang de'i tshe 'od ma'i tshal na byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa dang/ kan bres dang/ nyan gros chen
po gang dag nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa de dgags ston pa de la bltas pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'i sgo na 'dul pa la gzhas shang 'dug pa mthong ngo//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ nyan thos chen pa de dag thamasacad bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su 'khod pa dang/ bkod pa chen po de dag kyang mthong ngo// de nas

me tog dang/ phye ma'i rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra gang byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ yongs su ma dag pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mi stong pa dang/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du gang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dgan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ nyan thos chen po gang dag gnas pa de dag gis

sgra de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu/ ro myang bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ dga' bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ tshim par byed pa da lta du/ sbyo bar byed kha 'di lta bu/ yon tan
chen po brjod par 'os pa 'du lta bu'i sgra 'di dang/ me tog dang phyi ma'i char bad nad ga las te sam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po de dgadang/
nyan thos chen po de dag rang gi dge ba'i phyogs btang ste/ ngo mtshar cher 'dzan par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang/ lhab lhub
kyi rgya 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi na dang/ bkyi sgyu 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs mo/
thal gtu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mjed 'di dang/ phyogs banu'isangs rgyas kyi zhing thams rtsod du bkod pa chen po 'di lta bu 'di snang ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'ongs
pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag cing/ rdul bas gas pa med ces bya ba yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di'adra
ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ rdzu ga pa med la legs par brgyan pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing lo dupa trA rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du yang btsam ldan 'das de bzhin/

gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs par snang ba na ma btegs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang bya chub sems
dba'ade dag dang/ nyan thos chen pa de dag sgra thos pa des bskul ba dang/ phyogs bzhir lta zhing 'khod de/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten khams mamajed 'di/hang yang ma ring ba na
'dug par mthong ngo// sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi lha'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan de dag thams cad kyang mthong ngo// de nas byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po rje dag dang/ nyan thos chen
pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang 'dus pa chen po 'i bkod pa de dag dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pade dag blta ba dang/ nyan thos chen po brtag pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la yang blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir der 'dong ngo// der ni bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang

thob par 'gyur gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyibs sang rgyas kyi khrong rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyi byang chub sems dang lnga sems dpa' chen po dang/ nyan thos chen

pa de dag de bzhinagshegs ba shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas masnang bar gyur te/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khamasam mjed 'dir na te//

nga'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang/ byang chub sems dang 'a sen sa dang 'a re na po grangs meng dngag tu meng pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyang 'dir lhags nas/ sas rgyas
[21 ]/kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i bar ma lus par gang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi

rgyu 'jun ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la dag gis ni/

bcom ldan 'das la mchod ba bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyi char gyis khebs par byas so// la la dag gis ni mu tig gi char rab tu zab pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/
bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gis ni gser dang/ dngul dang/ be DUrlu dang/ shel dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ sdug dang/ gor shari sho dang/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang/
shing ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i char gyis nam mkha' khebs par byas so// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gis nalte lhub dang/ phyang phrul dang/ rgyan dang/ ras dang/ ras
bcos su sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab go/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gis na rin po che'i gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan sna tshogs bsgreng ngo// bcom ldan 'das
lamachod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gsan sbos sna tshogs kyis bdugs so// kha la dag gis ni na po che'i 'phreng ba sna tshogs gtor to// lal dag gis ni sa'i snyan dang dkrol ba sna tshogs dkrol lo//

cha la la dag gis ni glu dang/ gar dang/ rol mo'i sgra rab tu bstan to// la la dag gsan sa phyogs der sgrosachu sna tshogs kyi char gyis chag chag btab bo// la la dag gis ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi/
snod rnams rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs so// la la dag gis ni rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rnams sosachus bkang ste/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang//
la mas brgyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs so// la la dag narin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs/ lha'i gos dang/ rgyan dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan
nas 'phang bstod de thogs so// la la dag gisani bdag nyid tshangs pa chen po'i cha byad du mngon par sprul te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'khod pa nas/ rgya cher nga

ltar gong du smos pa bzhin no// la la dag gis ni seng ge 'icha byad du mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang/ rang gi dge ba'i/

rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed bas/ sems can de dag phan tshun mag gi dbang pos gzugs snang ba rnams la thags thogs med de// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta bu'i bdud kyi yul chen po la rnam par 'phrul

pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnams dang/ rang gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par seng ba dang/ rdzu 'phrulagyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ sa dang
ting nge 'dzin dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcokhargyad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs
nas srang gi dbusan pad+ma yod pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ ga ga yas pa'i mthil gyis pad+ma'i snying po la reg bar mdzad de drangs nas bzhugs so// pad+ma de drangs tegayos pas/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i ri khor yug dang/ rikhor yug chen po dang/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang/ rgya mtsho chen po dang/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang ga mos so// bdud kyi gnas thams cad na
ts+tsa gzhal med khang dang/ gnas khang dang/ mal dang/ stan rnams kyang rab tu g.yos so// de nas gang bdud kyi bu rnams dang/ bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang/ bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor gnas
pa de dag kyang 'jigs skrag cing skyo ba skyes nas phan tshun 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rgyu medarkyen med par ni gzhal med khang 'di dag ga yo bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi rgyal bo bdud de rang gi yul
nas 'phyos par n gyur gleng/ bdag cag kyang khang pa 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba'i chos 'byung bar ma 'gyur srung/ bdag cag gas blta gor ma chag snyam ste/ de nas de dag gis mthong nas 'di snyam du
sems rta/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni snyigs ma lngacan du gyuran/ 'di sus legs par brgyan cing/ shin tu nyams dga' bar byas snyam mo// de nas rang gi yul na gnas pa'i bdud g.yog dang bcas
ba de dag de na 'khed ba zhin du yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de skyes bu chen pa'i man sum cu rtsa gas kyis legs bur brgyan cung shan tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa mthad de//
thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang sems can gzugs dang ]kha dog drang/ rtags dang/ dbyibs snatshog
su gnas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas/ sems can gtsag kyang ngo ma shes te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod bakhya ba'i phyir brtson par mthod ngo// de nas
yang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang de bzhinagshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ da ltar bdag cag jo bo dang g.yog tu bcas kha gar deng ba yang dra ba'i phyir
der 'dang gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag thams cad ga mog dang bcas bar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
pa ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// rab tu rnam par
dang sems kyis// bcom ldan bdag ni skyabs su mchi// bdagakhrol 'di nas myur du mnyid// chos ni yang dag spyad par bgyi// bam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nga// 'gre ba dang ni 'ong ba
bya// yang / ngas ni su yang bzlog pa med// gal te lam nirab shes na// gang du dga' bar 'gro bar byos// bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gang gi spyod yul
sa gar dga' bar// gang tshe bdag ni mchi 'a chol te// bdag ni bcing ba lnga dag gis// bcanges par mthong nge ge'u ta ma// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ngan rtog pa kun spangs te//
grol nas 'gro ba grol byed pa// ngas ni 'tshe ba rnam spangs nas// sems can bcings pa thar par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
thams cad sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba la gzigs nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dir ni lhags pa thums cad kyang// the tshom
thams cad rab ngas la// skad cig ci yang ma smra bar// khyed cag rnams nad nyon cig/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khrig rtan dkon// chos dang dge 'dun shin tu dkon// dad cing chos la
tsho'abyor pa dang// byang chub spyod pa shin tu dkon/ shA'ajig rten mgon ba'i mngon sum du// chos nyan pa yang shin tu dkon// gang du bzod pa sten byed pa// de yi dus ni red par dka'//
gang du 'jig rten sdig pa yi// rtog pa thams cad rab stong ba// stong pa nyid ni sgom pa dang// sems nadul bar byed pa dkon// ji ltar ngas sngon sbyad pa yi// byang chub spyod pa red par/
0 dka' de las me tog tsam mched 'di// khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya// gang gis byang chub 'byor byed ba// sred ba'i bcings las rnam grol zhing// dun pa'i phung po sel ba yi// lam kyi
mdog ni bstan ba bya/ 'drem ngan ba gsum spangs la// ston pa sa gsungs pa 'di'i nyon cig/ chu bo rnams ni ba rol rgol// rgya mo can gyi sred pa spongs/ rnam thar gsum la rab gnas shing//
sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnas// khams gsum gyin nyon mongs gang// de dag ma lus rnam par chos// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mchod dang// chos kyi don du khyed cag rnams// sangs
rgyas lha dang bdung gsum gyi// byin rlabs sprul pas lhags pa rnams// dus gsum ma ga bsgribs pa 'i sems// bye brag tu na ba sngongs la// khams gsum pa las grol ba ya// zhibyed bzod pa thob
par byas/ phyin ci legani rnam bzhi yis sa so'i skye ba bsud pa rnams/ gdanges pa med la rtog byed nga// de dag bzod pa'i snodam yin// mag ni gzugs la zhugs pa yis// lus dang ngag dang sems
bsgribs nas// bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba rnams// 'kher ba shin tu bden par gyur// 'jig rten na ni gang mangs gsal// bsam gtan sgom par byed pa rnams// de dag phyin na log bzhi las/
de ring rnam par grol bar 'gyur// dbang phyug de dag sems can rnams// chu bo bzhi las thar par byed// 'chi 'pho skye ba rab shes ba// des nga rnams ni pha rol 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs
rkang pa bzhi dang ldan dug/ sems can srid bas khacings pa rnams/ yang dag shes pas gcod par byed// phung po lnga rnams yongs shes pa// zhags pa

las grol zag pa med// yang dang yang du ma skye ste// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed// sdig pa dwag na myur dushogs// sdig pa ma lus rab yongs la// 'jigs
ba med par pha rol song// srid par yang dang yang skyes par// sdig pa'i grogasakyi dbang song bas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dag ni// 'dus byas la yang myong bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i grogs po
rab sdongs te// sdig pa'i lta ba rnams bor nus// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dran khyas te// dam pa'i chos la rab sbyor cigaM/ btung ba'i dam pa btung bar byos// stong pa nyid kyang rab sgoms shig/
dam pa'i don la dngos po med// rdzas kyang med cing mngon nyid med// 'di ltar dbang po drug stong ste// byed pa po ni 'di la med// de bzhin mtshan mAr rtog pa yang// dngos po tsam ste g.yo ba med//
tshor ba drug dang sred ba drug/ regapa drug las byung ba yin// de bzhin reg pa'i skye mched drug/ stong pa yin par shes par byos// rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med par// dngos po nyid la brtag par
byas/ skye ba med cing 'gag med pas// 'di na rdzas kyang med par ltos// gang gis chos kun tshul gcig ste// dus gsum du yang dngos med par// shes ba de dag nad med de// de ni
khrun med pa'i lam// rnam pa bcu gsu ma nges grol la// sems can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing// tshu rol pha rol rnam grol ba// de ni bzod pa sgom pa yin// de nas gang gi tshe/ bcom//
ldan 'das kyis/ bsod nams kyi stobs rnams dang/ ma 'jigs pa'i shugs dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med pas/ tshugs/

su bcad pa de dag gsungs ba de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dang/ mi steng pa snyigs ma lnga can gang+gA'i klung dpag tu med pa ma 'khrugs pa'i bye ma snyed rnams su dbyangs kyi dkyil
'khor gyi tshig brjod pa 'di dag grags par gyur nas/ de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dbag tu med pa dag ni shin tu zang zing med
nga'i dga' ba dang/ dad pa red de blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// la la dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzod pa dang/ gzungs sna tshogs
thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyis ni/ don dang/ tshig dang/ yi ge 'di dag thos nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par
gyur to// sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni// theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung ba thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po skar ma la
dga' bas pad+ma'i khri la 'dzeg bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas me tog gis kun tu g.yogs pa mngon par sprul te//
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol te// brams cad mkhyen pa rga shi mya ngan gyi/ 'dam du bying ba'i 'jig rten thams cad la//
rab tu gzigs te mi rgyu gyur bcas kyi// 'jig rtan du ni chos kyi zam pa thogs// thal mo sbyar ba sems can tshe brgyas// rab tu gtams pa'i zhing la gzigs nas su// chos
kyi mchod sbyin rab tu bgo ba'i gsel// rang gi mthu rtsal rnam par bstan du gsol// mtshungs pa med pa pad+ma mngon 'dzegs te// mgon po shes rab dang ni thabs rnams kyis// chos
chusprin gyi char pa rab thob la// nyon mongs gzir ba'i mi la bstan du gsol// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang// drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan// khyod kyi
dpang du de dag kun bzhugs kyis// thub pa'i dbang po bdud rnams pham par mdzod// chos rnams stong pa nam mkha' lta bu dang// ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma brlar mkhyen nas// sngon
gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mdzod la// bla med 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol// chu bo bzhi dbus 'khod pa'i sems can rnams// mi yi seng ge s de ring bsgral du gsel//
bas/ khyod kyis chos rnams shin tu thugs su chud// srid gsum mtsho las 'jig rten bsgral du gsel// shan tu rlabs chen thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das// bde bar gshegs kyi lam
ni bde ba la// 'gro ba gzud mdzod mtshungs med chos kyang ston// 'jig rten zhes pa'i dri ma bsal du grasel// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur sngal nga 'i tham
skas de las nga d+ma'i khri la mngon par 'dzegs te/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs so// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyogs bcu thams cad du rnam par gzigs nase/ bdud sdig
can la bka' stsal nga/ sdig can jiltar khyodakyin gyis/ deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag mngal na gnas pa
dang rgashis gtso ba rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ rnam par thur bar 'gyur/ chu ba bzhi las yang dag par rgyal bar 'gyur/ zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur/ nam mkha' dang
mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur te/ 'di la sdig can khyodani sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro nga yin gyis khyod dga' bar gyis shig/ sdig can khyod
kyis nga la chos bshad par gsol cig dang/ ngas deng dud kyi dkyil 'khor mthon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i bal tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis/ patshe tshigs su
/ @#// bcad pa 'di smras so// ci ste sdig med khyod la tha ba zhe sdang rgyugs medan// ci phyir deng 'dir kun tu skag bar bya phyir chos kyang ston// de ste khyod lazla ba rgyags dang nga rgyal med

[= ]nani/ thub dbang khyod kyi tharapa ci 'drakhadag la 'dir shod tsagi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa kA nga ni sa la mngal gyi gnas na zla ba khanu gnas ba// de na yang ni bdud khyod nga la gsad par

rab tu sbyar// de tshed la khen dang smra ba nyung zad tsam yang med// nga ni bzod dang ldan te gra ba ma lus med pa yin// ngan btsas ma thag 'dir khyod kyis sa yang ba/ mi bar byas// nga bsad phyin n sde ba'i
char ba rab tu dbang bar khyas// den khyod kyis nga yi ma yi nu zho myur bskamasabyas// khyod kyis nga la gnod ba du ma nyi ma byas// nga ni bsam gtan bzhugs na khyod kyis bud med khrod de 'angos//
ngani bsod snyoms rnam par spyod tshe zlas kyang bcad pa byas/ khyod kyis de tshe da la rgyal srid mdon par rab tu bstangs// nga ni 'byung ba'i nub mo 'dir yang mun ba byas par gyur// de
tsho khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis grong khyer kun tu bskor// rdzu 'phrul gyis na seng saN+Di char drag pa rab tu phab/ sa na 'dom do 'phang tsan rdo ba dag gis gang bar byas// zhi ba'i gnas na/

gnas pa'i tshe yang sgranirab tu phyung// ngani shin tu dka' ba spyod tshe grwa'i rlung dngani// 'ab chu'i 'gram na gnas tshe khyod kyis chu bor ba tu btang/ ngan gsad par bya phyir khyod kyis seng gi rang

0 tu pa tang// de tshe khyod kyis nga mi za bas kha drag po'i dug kyang btang// ngan byang chub shing drung nye bar ya dra dag song ba na// rdo rje dang ni gnam lcags rtswa grwa mda' char khyod kyis phab// 'gro la
phan phyir rdo rje'i gdan la mngon bar gnas pa na// khyod kyis ngur smig gos kyang 'jim ba dag gis rab tu bskus/ de na yang ni nga gan khyod kyis bu mo rnams bkye ste// ngogs/
phyir ni khyod nyidam bu dang bcas te 'ongs mod kyi/ 'a'on kyang khyod kyis nga yis yid la gnod byas cung zad med/ ngas ni khyod btul nas ni byang chub mtshungs pa med pa thob// 'on kyang ngo tsha
bor te 'dir 'ongs nas ni ya nga sna 'am// sdig pa'i tshul gyis khod spungs mchog la sogs pa bzlog pa byas te// khyod kyis sems can bye ba du ma ma rung byas nas kyang// sAng rje bar tu 'dir

yang ngalargol zhing rgyu byed dam// nga yas zan ma zos pa'i tshe yang khyod kyis su// nga gsad phyir ni glang chen myos pa drag shul can yang btang// sa steng nga la lha sbyin gyis ni rdob 'ang ngas pa
dang kya ma ngas ni zla ba gsum du rta chas zos pa dang// phyar ka gtang phyir bu mo na rjes ldan rab tu gang btung dang// me mdag 'bar ba ma bzad pas na'obs rnams bkang ba dang// kha zas
dag na myur du gdug pa 'a dug dang sbyar ba yi// del sdig pa'i las can khyod ni rtsa ba nges pa yin// khyod nyid dpung bcas bu dang lhan cig ster bcas 'das nas su/ gang gsad par ni mda' bo
dag @#// che dang ral gri mda' mang thogs// 'on kyang 'di na khyod kyis nga yi sku gcig ma ga yosanA// ci phyir khyod ni rgyags par gyur nas 'din da dung 'dug/ ci ste bdud
na stong phrag bye ba rnal du ma dakhatsudakyang// sems can khrag khrug dag na de ru yang dag lhags nas su// zhing kun rab tu mang bar 'dug pa da mi dang nga min te// ngan khyed phyir
mchog tu byams nga 'i yid kyis gnas par byas// nga ni snying rje gnas te 'gro ba rjes su'adzin byed pa// khyod ni shin tu gtum pa da la rtag tu bgegs byed da// thub pa'i dbad de khyu
mchog 'di dag da ya dang da yin gyis// da ltar bla ma'i dus la nganisangs rgyas mdzad pakhya// rnan par sems kyis sems can rnams kyi don kyang spyad par bya// snyas par gyur pa 'od
brjod pa yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o// nga la phrag dog tha bar ba tu khro ba'i yid medade// khyod ni rjes su gzung phyir nga nyid rtagatu mngon par brtson// nga la gsol dar khyod zhing zhi phyi
'jig rten gsum dag tu// mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi bshad par bya// de phyir khyodakyi sdig pa'i las rnams med par rab 'gyur gyis// 'jig rten ma gan nga u0f7cda la mdan
myur du dad par byas// khyod ni rtag tu 'di na gnod pa bya bar rang sems kyang// khyod sgrolaphyir ning sang rtag tu byams pas rab tu dang// sdig pa'i blo gros bar la dad khan yad 'byas/
kashig dang// ring por ma thogs khyod na byang chub tu yang yung bstan to// de nas bdud sdiganyan bcom ldan 'das la ra btu khros te/ 'khrugs shing rngams nas/ de nas slar 'gro bar
'ded pa dang/ bdag gi mgul pa bcing ba ldas bcings nga sum du shes te/ 'jigs skrag bra'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod kyang de ma nus nas// bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa'i phyir//
rang khros pa'i mthus shin tu tsha pa'i dbugs btang bu dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shan tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog tu mnganopa sbrel te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes te chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i gdugs
su byin gyis brlabs so// sangs rgyus kyi zhing de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la gsal
ba/ ma tog gi gdugs 'di dgag las mchis/ su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lags/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod da den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de rab tu nyon mongs pa
can sAgs malta dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sngon gyi sman lam gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas nas chos ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dra ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rnga ba tu 'jom par byed ba/ stobs drang/ ma 'jugs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams
cad ma thon par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyud thams cad dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi sgron ma yun ring du gnas bar byed pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thamasacad rnam par 'a de la bar
byed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs byed po/ dgra dang las kyi rgol ba thams cad 'gan du tshar gcod par byed pa/ ngom mtshar ba dang/ bkra mi shis pa dang/ rtsod ba dang/
( rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ mu ge dang/ 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang/ 'thab pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ 'ching ba dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod ba dang/ char mi 'bab pa dang//
dus ma yin par tshe zhing grang ba dang/ rlung dang/ tsho ba dang/ nad dang/ sgra mi snyan pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ lha dang/ klu dAr/ gnod sbyin dang// ma dang/ ma ma yin
ba thams cad 'dun par byed pa/ rgyal rigs thams cad 'dun bar byed cad 'gugs pa/ rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi don la 'dzud pa/ shes rab kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar
khyed ba/lam drang por rang tu ston pa/ khyim dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs drang/ yul dang/ pho brang 'khor dang/ yul 'khor thams cad
'dun par byed pa// gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ nyin par dang/ mtshan medang/ zla ba gcig dang/ zla ba phyed dang/ dus dang/ lo rnams cad 'dun par byed pa/ lo tog
dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'bru dang/ sman thams cad grub par byed pa// bzo dang/ las kyi mtha' dang/ gnas dang/ byin rlabs dang/ dgos pa thams cad
grub par byed pa/ lus dang/ ngagadang yid kyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa// rig pa dang/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ mas pa dang/ dpa' ba dang/ brtan pa dang
bzed pa dang/ stobs pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i snang bas rdub tu gsal bar byed pa/ 'bags pa'i rigs bzhis chos kyi tshul khyon gyi kha
pa theg pa chen po ston par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phel bar byed ba/ sems can chen bo rnams dbugs 'byin pa/ phyir ma ldog pa gis la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin gyis
rdzob pa/ sa panu la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khod du chud par byed pa// dbang bskur ba'i chos dang/ byang chub la gzhol bar byed ba/ gdul ba'i sems
u// tsan rnams rjes su 'dzin pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzud pa/ bla na med
[+ ]ba'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa/ chos kyi char rab tu 'beb me kha/ chos kyi ros sems can thamasacad tshim par byed kha/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed
paDa bdud bzhi'i yul las rab tu thar bar byed pa/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasasu 'jog par byed pa// chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying/
bos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i zungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug bu lung bstan pa 'chad par bzhed do// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

ba'i sangs rgyas thamasacad kyis kyang chos ma nyam pa de rdo rje lta bu'i brten pa'i chos kyi snying bos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug palul bstan pa
gsungs go/ byin gyis brlabs so// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes go/ gang dag da ltar phyogs btsun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ chos kyang ston

pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang chos ma nyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu kharten pa'i chos kyi snyade pos lus 'jom pa zhis byaba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa
lung bstan pa gsung ngo// byin gyis rlob bo// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs banu'i 'jig rtenagyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dog tu/ de bzhin
gang shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag kyang chos ma nyan pa nyid rdo rje lta burten ba'i chos kyi ang bos lus 'jom ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyur// byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas bsangs
rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po gang dag yod pa de dag gis so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la yongs su zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
gis sngon ma thos ba tshos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgyu dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug kha lung bstan ba gang 'di ltar
yon tan mang po bgyid ba/ 'di ltar yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab ba dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snang ba bgyid pa nas/ zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang
lags/ chos mnyam ba nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi song bas lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug b.lung bstan ba bdud kyi yul gyi stobu/
thams cad rab tu 'jom par bgyid pa nas/ phung po lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das ba'i bar du bgyid pa de skye bo mang/
bal sman pa dang/ skye ba mang la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang/ skye bo phal khro che dang/ lha dang/ mi rnams kyi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde ba'i slad du bgo
ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
lho dag nged kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du/ de kha yin la gshegs pa dgra khacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya shud pa ga la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo// de ltar khyogs bcu'i
'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dgan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes ba de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis
ba skor cing/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du ba dar nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang de dag par rdzogs pa'i sa dngas rgyas
shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dar lhan cig sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/ na par spyod pa'i las las bzlog pa dang/
khazang po spyod pa rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dang/ bla na med pa'i e shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos manyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi sAde pos lus 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i
gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis bltas te/ chos mnyam kha
nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jomA pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur gyis khyed cag las gang
chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi sAng pos lus 'dzom pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgyudang/ tshig rab tu dbyakha la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnan pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi khyim med dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gtsagan bzhugs pa de dag la mchod pa bya ba dang/ chos de yang nyan kha dad/
sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ lha'i yul dang/ bdud kyi yul thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nang gi rgyan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang/ sangs rgyas med pa
tsha ka/ 'dus pa sngonan gros ma mthong ba lta bar 'dod ba de dag dang/ nged kyang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du/ de bzhin gshegs kha dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deka la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la/ byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po
de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs 'di 'chad pan gal te bdag cag gas gnas rid cing/ sangs rgyas bam ldan 'as
! de dug dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshogs pa de dag la yang phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ chos mnyan par rdo thag kha ltan dra
bzhin du bdag cag kyang de bzhinakagshegs pa dang rlabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs kha dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der chos mnyam ba nyid
a/ rdo rje la khu ban ba'i chos kyi sring bos lus 'jos ba zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstanapa mnyan pa'i slad du mchis te/ der bdag cag gis
dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho lagazhes pa rnams la mchod par bgyi'o// de dag
las chos kyang mnyan bar bgyi'o// der bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi yul bkod pa bzhis 'jig rten gyi khan sa man je 'gas par brgyan pa de yang blta bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen po
bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sen rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/
tan thos chen po de dag la 'di skadacings bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag 'jigarten kyi khams der 'jug pa 'a/nas dang go skabasakyi phyir deltar the tshom ma za zhig/ de ltar nem
nur ma byed cig// de ci'i phyir zhen/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad
kha ni mtha' ma sa so// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pas go skabs yangs so// rigs kyi bu dag yongs su brtag khra bzung ste/
sems can gang la la sems can gyi khams su bas bar bsdus pa khams dang skye mched la gnas pas sems can de dag gal te re re'i lus kyang ra ba tsam du gyur tu zin kyang/ de bzhin gshegs
ba shAkya thub pa de sems can lus de lta bur gyur pa de dag thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gnang du tshud par nus so// sems can re re zhing yang yul gyi gnas go skabs yangs te/ sems nyon
de dag phan tshun mig rgyang gis kyang mi slebs so// yungs 'bru de gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi lus bcug kyang bri ba 'am gang bar snang mi mngon te/ rigs
kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thebs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang srab nyid ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ni sa'i khams te/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sa'i khams thams cad jul gcig steng du 'dzeganus la/ rdul de gcig gi steng du sa'i khams thams cad bzhag kyang grwa ba 'am gang khar mi mngon to/
de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang nyung zad gsher bar snang ba de thams cad ni chu'i khams te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des chu'i khams de thams cad skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chud par nusal/ skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chu'i khams de thams cad chud kyang bri nga 'a ma gang bar ma mngon no//
rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang jitsam du dro bar snang ba de thams cad ni me'i khams te/ me ri khams gang sngon byung ba dang/ 'byung ba dang/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dgathams cad rdul phra rab
gcig tu chud par nus la/ me'i khams de thamasacad rdul phra rab de gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu dgagazhan yang gang nung zad
rlung gi khams su snang ba'i rlung khams de thams cad de bzhin gshegs bapahAkya thub ba des spu'i khung bu de gcig lta'ajug nus la/ rlung gi khams de thams cad sku'i khung bu de brdzig
nu gnas shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu 'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan pa da de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi
sems can thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhapo de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog par nus te/ rdul gcig la sems can de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po
de dag drang bcas par rang gi yul gyi las kyi mtha' rnams spyodakyang gnas shin tu yangs par rgyu ste/ phan tshun gnod ba yong med la/ rdul gcig gin mo de yang bri ba 'am gang
khar mi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi
skye mched drug dang/ spyod pa dang/ nye bar len pa dang/ smon lam dang/ byin gyi rlabs dang/ tshig gi lam gyi sgra dang/ ya ge dang/ tshig brjod pa dang/ 'du byed gsum gyi las
kyi mtha'i bya ba dang/ phung po dang/ dpyod ba dang/ bsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji snyed ba dang/ gang yang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i mu nas bzung ste/ dus gsum
du gtogs ba'i 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba na srid gra 'grub pa dang/ 'chi ba po dang/ skye ba 'byung ba dang/ sa khri khams thams cad kyi rtsal phra rab drisnyed pa dang/
sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i skad cig thang cig yud tsam 'das pa jis dab dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sku'i khung bu ji snyed
pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad longs spyod dang/ kun spyod pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba jis
ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des skad cig gcig la rab tu mkhyen te/ de bzhin bshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ mngon
par shes pa'i ye shes 'dil bu dang ldan pas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par dus gsum gyi mtha' yongs su mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa
kAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyilul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas dras monyam pa nyid kyis sems can longs su smin par byed pa'i thubs tshad med pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no//
mtshan nyid bshad pa 'di lung bstan kha na/ khyogs tha dad pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so'i 'khor/ byang chub sems dpa'
brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i me rags kyi rol tu phyin par gyur to// 'dus pa chen pan po che tog gi gzungs las mtshan nyid kyi le'u
ste lnga pa'o// yang de'i tsheshar phyogs logs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs ba zhes bya kha/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis gshegs bar chas nas/ skad
cig gtsag tsam la sadas rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
ga la bzhugs pa der gshags nas/ pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs go/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas
pad+ma'i stan ji lta bu byung ba de dag la 'khod do// de la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa'i rdul phra rab
kyi rdul nyid kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i/ dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon to// de bzhin gshegs pa der yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dang/ nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang thabs cig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
kha yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de ga la bzhugs par khyen to// khyon nas kyang pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba rnams la bzhugs so// yang de'i tshe lho phyogs logs
nas de bzhin gshegs kha rin chen tog ces bya ba byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du rgyas bar bya'o de bzhin du byang phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes
ga bya ba khyon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs so// yang de'i tshe nub phyogs gas nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying bo la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o/
'og gi phyogs lags nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying bo la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// stad ga phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa
ye shes kyi 'od zer ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya skyed grangs med dpag tumed pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
med dang thabs cig tu/ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de nas gshegs khar chas pa dang/ sems kyis skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas
kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa de da
gshegs nas/ pad+ma'i snying po'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ji ltar rang rang gi bsod nams dang/ rdzu 'phrul
kyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis btsa'i stan sa la pa rnams la 'khod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba phyogs banunas 'dus pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la drag gas ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi char phab kho/ dgong du smos pa bzhin du sbyar te/ la la dag gas ni sangs rgyas
kyi zhing dem lus par bskur bar byas so// la la dag gas na chos nyan pas bskor nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'khod do// la la
dag gas narang gi dge ba'i phyogs yid la byed cing gnas so// yang de'i tshe bla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas thal mo sbyar te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyi stobs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis bkang ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// the tshom thams cad gacoda mdzad pa/ thub pa zla ba kun nas gshegs//
sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa ki/ dge 'dun phun sum tshogs 'ad snang// byang chub sems da pa' brtul zhugs mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis ra ba gang bas//
zhing 'di mchod rten gyur ba ste// zhing rnams kun gyis phyag byas go/ gang na sems can smin pa yi// ging na sAgs ma lnga can da/ gru ba ba snang mdzad rgyu med par// rdzogs pa'i
sang sa rgyas dang mi gshags// de ring bdud ngan tshar gcad cing// nag po'i phyogs na reb gzhon dang// spyod pa dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir// de yi don du kun nas gshegs ka mad na 'a ba tu
dang byas la// bdud sde rab tu 'jom pa ni// chos nyid zhi ba rab nyon la// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos// theg pa chen po spyod nga 'i lam// bzod pa'i gos bgos shes
rgyu par khyos/ nyon mongs thams cad zad bya'i phyir/ 'gozungs tshad de rang ma nyan par byos// gdan rnams la ni bzhugs nas su// khasrung ba 'di ni bshad gsal phyir// de phyir thamA
cad mgrin gcig tu// 'dren pa rnams ni spyan drongs shig/ dam chos yun ring gnas pa'i phyir// sgrib pa thams cad na byed pa// chos rnams thams cad sdud pa yi// gzungs 'di
gzhan gyis mdzub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa thob ba grangs med dpag tu med pa de snyad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces ga se la// sangs rgyas
dam bcom ldan 'das rnams pad+ma'i gdan 'di dag la bzhugs te/ deng thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis byams ba chen pa'i mchog dang bzod pas yongs su bsgos pa/ mi 'jigs pa'i
rgyu mthun pa de shad pa/ chos thams cad sdud pa/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba la 'jug pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar bgyid nga/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol kha/
chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ thamasacad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud kha
'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad spud ba/ bla na med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos thums cad dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/
rtogs pa dang/ mas pa ma brjed pa spyod pa thams cad kyi thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa kun tu ston l/ bdo ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skye mched dang/ byin gyi rlabs dang/ting
ngo 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ brjod pa la 'jug pa/ snang ba'i ye shes mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi snying po 'dzin pa'i bar gyi gzungs
'di sems can rnams kyi gzi brdzing dang/ kha dog dang/ longs spyod dang/ stobs dang/ grags pa dang/ bde ba la reg par gnas ba dang/ slobs ba dang/ dran pa rnam par 'phel
zacha @#// bdad thos pa 'dzin pa ma brjed pa dang/ dgra thams cad kham par kha gyid pa dang/ lo tog mngon par 'grub pa dang/ bslab kha 'dzin pa dang/ na ba'i
[A ]snod du gyur pa dang/ spyod pa man bar 'grub par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub yang dag par thob par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzungs 'di de riTi bdag
cag la bshad du gsol/ chos kyi tshul rjes su gzung ba dang/ yun ring du gnas pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rogs chab mi'atshal ba dang/ bla na med pa'i byang chub lam mtha'
[Q ]dag bstan pa dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha'adang/ nam mkha' dang/ de bzhin nyid dbyer ma mchis pa dang/ mun pa dang/ snang ba dang/ dmigs pa dang/ ma dmigs pa dang/ tshu rol dang/
ba rol dang/ rtog pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang/ sems can dang/ srog dang/ gas ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zagu thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa dang/ chos thams cad mi skye
ba dang/ mi 'byung ba dang/ mi 'gagu ba dang/ mnyam brjid kyi mtshan nyid dngos bo ma mchis shing/ yang dag pa'i mtha'adabyer ma mchis pa dang/ sa dang/ chu dAng/ me dang rlung dang/
nam mkha' dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'di'i bdag cag la chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor/
dam ba'i gzungs bshad du gsal/ gang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng dpag tu med pa dag la dkon mchog gsum mngon du gyur cig/ sems na rnams
phan tshun du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid cing phan pa byed par gyur cig/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyang chub tu sems bskyed pa
dang/ phyir mi ldeg par 'gyur ba dang/ lung bstan pa thob par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang/ chos bstan pa'i phyir cad ma gsung bar gyur pas/
gnan gnas par 'i sing po de dag la bzhugs so// ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang/ dge
ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsngags pa'i phyir dran ba dang/ dad pa dang/ dang ba dang/ mos ba red par 'gyurakha dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas
kyi zhing 'di'i gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ lta ba ngan pa dang/ dal dang/ rgyugs pa
dang/ dregs pa dang/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang/ thatshom dang/ ka bar len pa dang/ srid pa'i srid pa kun gzhi'i shes pa dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang/ sems can so so nas
'di gam du bdag cag gcig pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ldan chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi zur drin gzhan ni su yang med do// bdag cag gcig pu la te
[DA ]bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs thams cad kyis dgongs te/ nad thAms cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bzhed do/ 'di gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos
mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba ma btab bo snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi smon lamamanyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs su
yang de'i tsho la nga sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus po 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang po thams cad bstan te/ rtsal mo sbyar nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces
gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol/ btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol/
bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos nan tan gyis bsdu bar bgyi'o// de nas yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das gzhan rnams la mchod pa'i phyir skyes bkod kha las shin tu lhag pa'i skyes god du mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa/ rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad khyab par byin
gyis brlabs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rnams la mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lag na
rin po che dang/ me treg dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ stes dang/ rgyug pa sna tshogs dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ rgyun dang/ lhab lhub sna tshogs dag
gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang jid phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag
nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dri ba'i phyir byon pa rnams dgongs su sol/ bdag sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon mdas pa can sags ma lnga dang ldan pa'i
'jig na du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ikhyang chub mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyas te/ sems na bsam btams pa las rab tu stor khaM/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dang
rab rib kyi ling tog gsanyon mongs pa'i tshun bar khacug pa/ na song gsum du zhugs pa/ mi dge ba dang 'grogs pa/ dge ba thams cad dang bral ba/ b+hAbs mkhas pa
thams cad kyis yongs su sangs ba/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos slong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ snying rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can
[s/g]bya// rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du/ gang brtsi ba dang/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi brtson bzhin res grang ba dang drobadang rlung dang [7 ]tshob dang/ ngal ba dang/ chad ba dad
du blang bar bgyi'o// grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ lul dang/ yul 'khor du rkang gis 'gro bar bgyi'o// sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/
rtsub pa dang/ nyung ba dang/ romed pa shin tu sman pa mi mthun pa'i zas bza' bar bgyi'o// de dag gi dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slad du skyom kha/ rtsa ba pa/ reg na ma bde ba/ shan dang/
shing bal dang/ gas ma'i ras dang/ phyag dar khrod kyi gos bgo bar bgyi'o// ra dang/ ri'i sul dang/ nags skyog pa dang/ grong stong pa dang/ dur khrod du gnas par bgyi banas/
rna'i mal cha dang ga som dang/ shing gi 'dab ma rtsub po/ drani zhim ba rig na mi bde ba'i mal tsha rnams skyed par bgyi'o// bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang/ sAren po dang/
brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi go cha bgos nas/ sems can rnams la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ rgyal rigs rnams lan rgyal srid dang dbang phyug gi gtam bgyi'o// khram ze rnams lani
ga khyed dang/ skar ma'i gtam dang/ blon bo rnams la ni yul dang/ las kyi mtha'i gtam dang/ snyan kha rnams la khams dang/ sman dang/ bsgrub pa'i gtam dang/ tshong ba rnams la ko
0 tshong gi gtam dang/ dmangs rnams la ni las kyi mtha' la mngon par zhen pa'i gtam dang/ bud med rnams la ni kha dog dad/ rgyan dang/ bu dang/ phyug ba dang/ 'gran med ba'agan
dang/ dge sbyong rnams la na bzod pa dang/ des ba dang/ las gsum la brtson pa'i gtam bgyi'o// sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slod du du ma thob pa thob par khagyi ba dang
mngon sum du ma bgyis pa mngon sum du bgyi bar gzud do// mkhar pa rnams rab tu thar par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la skyo bar bgyi'o// sems can yongs su
smon par bgyi ba'i slad du/ yul rgyu bar bgyi'o// de lta mod kyi sems can 'di dgan dan bdag la gshe'o// mi snyan pa zer ro// phrag dag gi chos kyi rgyus badrag la 'khrig pa'i chos
kyis med pa la skur pa 'debs so// kha gsag dang/ tshul 'chos dang/ skya dang/ g.yo dang/ ba rdzun smra ba dang/ zheg rtsod pa dang/ bud med kyi tshig dag gis skur ba 'debs so//
bdag la sas 'thor ro// bdag gsad ba'i phyir mtshon dang/ dug dang/ mi dang/ 'khar ladang/ mda' bo che dang/ mda' dang/ ral gri dang/ mdung dang/ dgra sta dang/ rdo ba
dang/ mtshon cha'i char 'bebs sa// bdag gsad pa'i phyir glang po che dang/ sbrul gdug ba dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ glang dang/ ma he dang/ spyang ki dang/ phag rgod dang//
tshan po che rnams kyang bgyud do// bdag gi gnas do dra/ gnas khang dang/ gtsug lag khang yang mi gtsang ba dang/ dri nga bas 'gengs so// bdag gi nyan tho sa grong
khyer du zhugs pa rnams la/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis klu dang/ gar dang/ tshul ma yin pa khyed du btsud do// thabs brgya stong du mas bdag gsad pa'i
phyir brtson no// bdag gi bstan pa nub par bya ba dang/ chos kyi tshul gyi sgron ma gsad pa dang/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsil ba dang/ chos kyi khru gzhag pa dang/ bdag gi chos kyi
k+ku mchod sbyin rnam par stor ba'i phyir brtsonano// dasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul la gzigs te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das de dag gas sangs rgyas kyi zhing kon mongs pa can sAgs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir/ 'dus pa chen po mdzadunas/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul mun rang du gnas par bgyi
ba dang/ bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gnas ba rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba dang/ sems can rnams kyi dag ba'i rtsa ba 'phel
bar bgyi ba dang/ dkradang/ bas kyi rnal ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ mu ge dang/ nad dang/ pha rol gyi
dmag tshogs dang/ 'ching ba dang 'gyed pa dang/ rgol ba dang/ dus ma yin bar grang ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ cha rang/ rlung dang/ lus dang/ ngal dang/ yid kyi shes pa dang/
'ching ba dang/ lta ba yang kha rab tu zhi bar khakyi kha dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ ma dang/ ma ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par khagyib dang/ khyim dang/
grong dang/ grwakhyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul 'khor thams cad bsrung ba dang/ g.yo dang/ dug dang/ khyod dang/ rmongs byed dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan kha/
thams cad gzhil ba dang/ 'bru dang/ nadang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar 'tsho na 'gyil dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/
dmangs rigasadang/ rje'u rigs rnams dge ba spyod pa la gzud pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gzud pa dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs shes pa la mkhas ba dang/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs pa dang/ mos pa dang/ dpa' ba dang/ brtan pa dang/ spobs pa rnam par 'phel
bar bgyi ba dang/ dbang bskur ba'i sa la dbugs 'byung bal 'dzud ming ye shes kyi la rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sngon kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs rab sangs
rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jon ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ rig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan
pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing byin gyis brlabs bko/ gcig la gcig dgyes pa des 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i ng 'tsho la gzhis pa
dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sAgs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di'i dri ba'i phyir/ gshegs te bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di bsrung ba'i sudadu/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje
lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi sAdi ngas lus 'dzes pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos kyi ma un ring du/
gnas par bgyi ba dang/ bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang/ ji ltar gong du rgyas par brjod pa bzhin du sgrib pa pazabag med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi
pa'i bar gyi slad du/ bdag gis gsol ba btab pa la thugs brtse bar mdzad de/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas shing las kyis rgol ba thams
cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang/ ma 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad pa dang/ chos kyi bcud kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho
bar bgyi ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/ byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bshad nas kyang phan tshun rjes su dgyes pa mdzad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin du bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la lag skyong bgyi ste/ chos kyi
tshul yun ring du gnas lnga dang/ bdud kyi yul kyi skong sa pa bas cad rab tu gzhom ba nas/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i dar gyi slad du/ byin gyis
brlab cing chos mnam pa da rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes pa spyi ba'i 'gazungs phyag dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug ba lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di bshad kyis// gang su dag sangs rgyus kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cud nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ A ga ra// ang ga ra/ bad ga ra/ khra khang
ka ra byu a mi tA/ mi tra ma lha sa// a le/ a kha/ am ba re/ dom/ de mad te/ ke bdate/ ke Are/ sa ma 'a gnaM/ sa man ta wa te/ d+harma med+d+ham ke dza tA le/ mi nu pA la/
pA la b+ha tra/ ga te ga Na/ waran te/ ha la ha li/ dal da lo ke/ dzam b+ha ba te/ka se// naze Ta ka ba gto/ ga Napa ban te/ di'an te/ sha don te/ ban du ba te/ go b+ha he/ dzu ra mi tra dzu'u
dzu she/ a gre/ a ba me/ sa skya ta thA tAn/ hu'u hi la/ tsan khre/ sam stsame/ d+harme/ kunoru 1 mu tshuru/ a med ta/ A laM/ latsa b+ha ha/tshu lu tsu lu/
mi tra khA ha/ ku lu ku lu/ sa ra sa ra/ ku rkya ku rkya/ mahA sa ra sa ra/ tu Ta tu Tu/ mchu sa rkya/ hritA ya/ dub she su bu she/ dum par ha re/ a b+ha ye/ ru cinaka ra ke/ A ya
masgyu ba bAha/ ti ti le/ man le/ pAsha ka/ shig ra shi shir/ la ka'i nA ya ka/ badze badze tA re/ 'dze bA te/ 'dze ma de/ badzad N+NaM/ tsakA badzra yi/ tsakri tsab te/ d+ha red+ha ra/ b+hani
b+haro/ b+hu re tu re/ huture/ b+hang ga pa ni ba re shAr/ sha lu/ tshur/ pUr/ man dra Ne/ man tra Ni/ ga ka ra Ni/ mu dA Ni/ sar pra mo han/ d+hid+d+hir ya ni/ mukhe shwa ra la ma ni/
( ri sha ni dzani/ d+hA ba ba tsi/ tsaN nA la sa me/ sarba sa t+ya a d+hiSh+Than/ a d+hiti/ sadi ts+tshan tu mahA na ma min/ pAl ra te/ o rje gri/ ba tsani/ bA na har/ bu bu re/ gu ru gu ru/ mu ru
mu ru/ gil go li/ ha ra ha ra/ ka ka nA da ba ha/ hi hi tA na/ sa ra ba'/ tutu tu tu A hA/ a yur han/ kAn ta/ dzA lA ba sA ga ra dwan/ ad+ha ha ni/ mArga sa b+ha rohani/ pA la sa

kyi a ro kha ba ti/ hi li hi li/ yab+hA ba dza swA gra ma thA/ bar n tsa nI dI la ba sa skye de par bar/ mArga a lha ro haN/ a tsa la khud d+ho/ dA da bra tsa tsho nga la/ bde bya hridA ya/ tsan dra tsar te/
ba a tsa le/ sho d+hani/ pra kr-i ti nA ra ge/ a li a li le/ bra be sar dra tre/ sarba da tra tag te sa skya nu ga te/ An bAr na ba te/ al te/ ang gu re shA min brah+pha mo hi/ a hri da/ a b+ha hi/
nir ba yo ba/ itsar mArga/ lan la gu sA re/ tIratan/ bang she/ d+harma kA la/ dz+wa la tsan dre/ sa mu dra la ti/ mahA b+hU ta bya ya/ sa mu dra ba kAkha byur mu dre Na mu kha mu dra/ sur
dra ti sama'i rgyu/ su mu tra A brtani/ saN+Dartan/ sam mo ha skar/ bcu ta ra se na li te mu dri te sa/ yeketsita pratib+hi kAha/ ba hab ha ba ga/ kr-itA/ kabatA/ gA la pra tI t+ya srid la
na mu dri tA dAr nan/ d+har d+har d+ha ra/ dIn dAlaM/ dun de la/ hU kra sa hri tA la/ mu de tos dzadu dza ba data/ dza kha ba te/ su ma ti ba ti/ ma nA da b+hu ta mu dri ta/ yi ka nIta btA ta na

ni tA bu ta/ i ni mi ni/ satsane/ go sha sa tsa ni/ bu dri tA/ tsar+ya a d+hiSh+ThanubA kal/ thAnAn+ya grwa ma hA bu rgyu sa muts+tshA ya/ a pa tAr/ ma hA ru NA ba tshu dri ta sa samyaka pa ti bdatsArArA

dran tshwa la du d+harman/ tusajemu ni shrI kA lA/ many+tsa kA ru NA sa mA d+hi/ nal lha ba len mi tri t+tag/ a b+ha bAr+ya ba len/ a d+hiShi te sa chu to btsa lA ya hAhA/ de nas de 'i tshosangs rgyas kyi zhing
thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 'di skad ces sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshol lo// phyag 'tshala'o// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag
'tshal lo zhes lan gsum smras nas/ kye ma thub pa 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos chen po rnams
'dus ba ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma'o tshes mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu bskyon pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'dzom ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan
pa'itshes kyi rnam grangs ston pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyis chos kyi tshul dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs byin gyi rlabs ston pa/ bdud kyi yul gyi stobs rnam par 'joms ba/ bdud kyi
zhugs pa kun gcod pa/ dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgred pa/ chos kyi phyogs srung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ sngon ma thos pa ste// sangs rgyas kyi tshul
mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi snying po dang phyag rgya dang/ 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang/ 'du byed dang/ skye mched drug yongs su sbyang bar bya/
nas/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das bas pa thob par bya ba'i khar gyi phyir da ltar sa brgyas khacom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/ phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye
ba la 'jug la lung bstan pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do// gzungs sngags lung bstan pa 'di bshad pan/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung
sum nu tshu drug gi khye ma snyed dag gzungs man par bsgrub pa'i ting nga 'dzin dang bzod pa thob par gyur to// yang de'i tsha zla 'od gzhonanur gyur bstan las langs nas/ thal mo sbyar te kun
tu rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dbyangs kyis bkang ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal bzla
ba rnams kyi 'khor// 'di 'dra ba ni snyed par dka'// byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs che/ mkhas pa 'di nird par dka'// gang 'di thugs rje ldan pa yi// mgon blo
chos tshul byin brlabs pas// phyag rgya 'di 'dra thos pa yang// mchog tu red par dka' ba'o// bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad dang// dgra rnams kyang ni ngam byed kho//
dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs// sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// bzod dang des par ba 'phel ba// sems can rnams kyang
'dun byed pa// rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor skyong// bdenangan byas zlog byed pa// ltabangan pa ba 'gog pa// byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa// byang chub lam yang rab ston//
bal phyin pa 'phel byed ga/ khazang po'i spyod pa rdzogs byed pa// thabs dang ye shes spobs pa rnams// 'phel bar bya phyir byin gyis brlabs// dkar po'i phyogs ni sdud byed dag/
za7 @#// gzungs gzhan gyis ma thub pa// byang chub lamalas mi ga yo ba// chos kyi dbang rnams 'bar byed pa'i// gzungs la yid gnyis thams cad ni// bsal nas lhag/
par mos par byos// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no// chos sku rnams ni bsrungs ba dang// nyan pa mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir// gzhan gyis ma
thub pa yi gzu ngas// bdag gis da yang bshad par bya// sgrib pa med pa 'grub pa dang// sems can rnams kyi phan 'a phel phyir// byang chub sems dpa'i grags chen go dgu dag 'di
la dad pa 'bul// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhonanur gyur pa gda'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis mgrin gtsag tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang gzungs
'di la dad pa 'bul lo// byin gyis brlab bo// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/dge slong gdage slog la/dge bsnyenanam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis khrus byas te/
gos gtsang ma bgos la/ me tog sna tshogs khakram pa/ sos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs pa/ robro ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor kha/ ras dang/ rgyan dang/ ras bcos bu sna
tshogs bting ba/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng bas shin tu brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su seng ge 'i khri'i gan 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ gzungs 'di yang dag par bshad pa
na/ su yang de'i tshe sems 'khrug pa 'am/ kham sa 'khrug pa 'am/ lus 'khrug pa 'am/ yad 'khrug par mi byed do// de'i lus la su yang dbugs mi gtong ngo// kladakhan bar byed
mi nus so// mAgan ba dang/ lcen ba dang/ so na ba dang/ rus pa na ba dang/ mgul pa na kha dang/ dpung pa na ba dang/ rgyab na ba dang/ rgyu man ba dang/ lto na ba dang/ chu so na ba dang//
brla na ba dang/ byin pa na bar byed pa sus kyang ma nus te/ de ni gnas med do// de'i skad 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ro// chos smra ba de sngon gyi ma dag pa'i las kyis khams 'khrug pa//
'am skad 'a ga par gyur na yang des gzungs 'di bklags na thams cad ma lus par zhi bar byed par 'gyur te/ las yongs su byang nas bde par 'gyur ro// chos nyan ba gang dag
der 'du bar 'gyur ba de dag la yang su ya nga khams 'khrug pa 'am/ skad 'gag par byed par ma 'gyur ro// gang dag de na gzungs 'di nyan pa de dag kyang mi dge ba'i las kyis yun ring par na ba
dang Da khams 'khrug pa dang/ skad 'gag pa de dag thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// de nas zla 'od gzhonanur gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dad 'i 'khor
can gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma snyed de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongs su gsel/ gzungs 'di
la dad pa stsal du gsol/ 'di lta ste/ kha shAn te/ a sa ma re pe/ me tri so/ ma ba te/ e hi na ba kuny+dzakhe/ na ba kun kyA ba/ mu la
go tanA/ ba ta kha ba cad kha ba ha kha/ mA ra ba tra yA tA/ bar tsid du ba ha sa/ ba ha sa/ a mU la/ a tsa le/ rtsatsale/ pra tsa lA/ d+hi d+hi le/ e ka ya ba ri datsan tre ne/ ba'i se/

ba ra sa tren/ kha ga su ra Nin/ lta ba sur drini b+hU ta ko Ta larits+tshe de/ tshwa kha kha tshwa la kha/ ba ye dzAl kha ba ye shu la khA/ namu ka khA/ ka ka kha/ hahA hahA/ hu hu hu/ par sha de da na/
btsadan/ sa mu ma cu/ ma ma tra/ ma mo sa mu dra/ mu tAb kha/ sang skuro nam par ts+tshad/ bo d+hi swA khIta bam/ ma hA ba ma/ b+hUta ko Ti/ A kA sha/ ba sa mA
ts+tsA da swAhA/ la nga de'i tshosangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/ rtson thos chen pa de dag dung/ brgya byin
dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'a na skyod ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dung/ dri za dang/ lham man dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'amacudang/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang
pa dag dang/ sems can gzi brjod tsha ba gawa brjod che ba de dag thamasacad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang 'di skad du/ kyam
gzungs 'di na stobs che ba/ drag shul dang ldan pa ste/ dgra thams cad bzlog pa/ 'jigs kha dang/ nad dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa thams cad las yongs su
thar par byed pa nas/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang/ bsod nams dang/ ye shes chen po bsags pa klan med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di bshad do zhes bka'
stsal to// yang de'i tshe tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa lha'i las 'das pa'i gis dang/ sbyar ba dang/ rgyan dang/ ma ga dang/
sa dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ rgyug ba rgya chen po mchog rnams kyis lus brgyan nas/ bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur te/ tshangs pa chen po'i stobs kyi yul bkod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas tshangs pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug stan las langs nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal
nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis grang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhingam lus pa 'dir dbyangs kyis go bar bgyis la/ der khadag la bgegs
cung zad kyang ma 'byung bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi brjod pa rnam par gdon mi 'tshal ba bstan par bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bdag gis da ltar chos smra ba rnams dang/
chos nyan pa rnams kyi slad du/ 'di 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsrung ba bshad khar bgyi ste/ ci nas slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na bdud dam/ bdud
kyi 'khor tum/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ ku mo 'am/ rkun po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i 'khar bo 'am/ klu'i 'khorom 'am/ klu'i bu 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ de bzhin du rgyas
par bgyi ste/ sha tsha'am/ sha za mo 'tshe/ sha za rgan po 'am/ sha za rgan ma'am/ sha za'i 'khor lo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor ba 'am/ shaza'i bu 'am/ sha zagi me 'am ma 'am/
mi ma lags pa'i bar gang la la chos smra ba dang/ chos nyan pa rnams la glags lta ba 'am/ skabasatshol ba'i dgra phyir rgol ba zhig mchis te/ tha na chos smakha 'am/ chos nyan pa rnams
kyi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la yang 'tshe'am/ gnod par bgyid dam/ 'jigs par bgyid dam/ mdangs 'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs chen po gtong dam/ than skadacig gcig tsam
yang snang ba'isems kyis bstan/ bdag gis bdud nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag bzlog pa dang/ chad pas gcad pa dang/ tshar gcad pa dang/ rmugs pa dang/ drangs pa dang/
rmongs par bgyi/ bro 'tshal bar bgyin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhingam lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar bgyi ba'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor
ma gyi tshig brjod par byin gyis brlab tu gsol// 'di la su zhig bdag gi grogs su 'gyur/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do//
denas brgya byin gtsug phud bcas bya ba 'dran bu'i chu bo'i gsarakyi rgyun gyi 'dakyis lus brgyan nas snga rung yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug go/ de nas brlabyin gtsug phud 'dzan gyis/
tshadra ba phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhi de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpagamed kyi spyan sngar ma 'dug cig// chen 'dir bag med par m byed cig/ khacom ldan
'das la ma 'tsho zhig/ deci'i phyir zhin/ phyis pa rnaman spos la dga'// de bzhin gshegs kha sngos ma ma 'a// de dag skye 'jig mtshan nyid kyi// 'dus byas dgakyang ston ba mdzad/
de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzungs dang/ gi dang chig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshul 'das pa ste/ chezhad bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa
nyid du gcig pas/ de bzhin nyid las 'gal bar mdzad de/ nam mkha'al ni 'du byed gsum gyi 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid sgro btags pa med do// ji ltar 'du byed rnams la nam mkha'
mi gang rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs ba yang 'dod pa'i yon tan la spros bar m mdzad/ ma rtog rnam par mi rtog/ ma gnas mdon par mi zhin to/ de bzhin du srog/
la ma yin/ skyeb po la ma yin/ gso ba po la ma yin/ skyes bu la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams la yang spro bar
ka pa mi mdzad/ mngon par mi zhen/ tshan khyod kyis ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la glo bar byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po rtogs
rtogs te skyes shig/ khyod la des mi sdug pa'i 'bras bur gyur tar/ skyes bu dam pa chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas shing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams la dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa// skyes bu dam pa 'din de bzhin gshegs pa lamachod pa byaba'i phyir legs par brgyananas bud med kyi lus su mngon par sprul pa yin gyis/
'di la bud med ces tshig tu ma rjod cig/ donas brgya byin gtsug bud 'dzanagyis/ tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces skyas sa/ rdzogs kyi bu bdag la sprugs brtse
khar dgongs te bzed par gsol/ 'di skad ces smras pas bdag la 'bras bu mi sdug pa pheb bar 'gyur gi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsolag/ bcom ldan
'das gal te brgya byin gyis tshig de slar ma bshagasen/ de'i 'bras bu rnam par smon pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' sA la ba/ rigs kyi khu
gal te des sar ma bshags su zinan 1 tshe rabs brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dod pa'i mngal smad pa bud med kyi dngos bo yongs su blangs par 'gyur// de bas na rigs kyi bu can s kyang ga gi
las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis khyod kyidabyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin rlabs kyisakhyod kyis stobs par gyis shig/ de nas
tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thal mo sbyar te phyogs khahur rnam par kholtasanas 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras rnams
dang/ byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ tan blos chen be rnams dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha 'a lding dang//
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gi bsam pa la chos kyi tshul 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ chos sgo ba rnams dang/ chos nyan ba rnams
dang/ nan tan dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe bar ma 'gyur khar 'di'i dad pa stsal du gsol/ gang sladama'i dusanabadunas/ mi dang mi ma lags pa'i bar gyis de dag la 'tshe bar ma bgyid par
dad pa stsal du gsol/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis de dag gi snang ba'i sems bzlog pa dang/ gnas bskrag pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi sgra phyung nas/ sgra des 'jig rten gyi
[p/ ]@#// khams 'di khrims cad gang bar byas so// yang de'i tshe tshangs pa'i dbang bde dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag kyang gzungs
'di la dad pa 'bul lo// bdag cag nyid kyis kyang phyi mdusasu ]gzungs 'di gzung bar bgyigo/ rab tukhastan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos kyang bsrud bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba dang
nyan pa de dag dang/ nan tan dang ldan pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dba' sems dang 'a chen po rnams deng/
rgyu kan gros chen po rnams kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul gyis skyes bu dam pa gsungs shig/ de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so// sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dung/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'di lta ste/ a ma
le/ 'a ma le/ ga Na shAn te/ hare/ tsanatre/ mahAtsan/ tsae ha/ tsa me/ so mi sbame/ A ba ha/ ba baha/ ang ga dzanatra/ kha kha/ mAl kha ritsod/ yak+Sha tsan dre/ pishA
rtsotsan tre/ a brtan/ sam b+ha ta na/ sang kAr Ni// dzam snyan/ stam lhan mo han/ udatsAtani/ da ma hA/ ha ma hA/ ma hA sad ku can/ kha ko sha ba/a ma la/ a mU la//
la brte/ a sAr kha ba swAhA/ gsang sngags 'di las gang 'da' zhing// mang po tshogs par mi spyod na// mig mi mthong zhing mgo mang 'gas// yan lag tha dod 'jig par 'gyur/
'di lta ste/ Ane tso a ba ha tsatsu/ tsakA la tsa ta tA kha tsa// na kha ga/ tsa tsatsa/ tsa rtse/ na tsa ha/ mAlatsatsa/ tsa nA la/ tsatsa ha/ ma mA la tsan+ti/ ha mU ha mU/ ba A ba
A sAnA/ de nas tshangs pa'i dbang po thams tsadanas/ sha za'i dbang po 'bar gyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces smras so// stong chen po'i stobs kyi shugasashan tu
'dzin se pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad de phan pa ma yin par sems pa'i 'byung po thams cad la zhags pa 'di btab na de dag 'tsho bar ga la 'gyur/ tshangs ba lun sum tshogs pa'i
dbang phyug gas 'di skad ces smras so// 'byung po gang dag snang ba'i bsam pa can sAng rje med kha/ byas pa ma gzol/ sems can la 'tshe ba rnams sam/ bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor

glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad nga 'i rgyal po rgyalarigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la skabs tshol du nye bar 'ong ba dang/ btsun mo dam pa dang/
bu dang/ bu mo dang/ btsun mo 'i 'khor rnams dang/ blon po dang/ shor ba dang/ dpung dam pa dang/ 'khor rnams dang/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa'i skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/
khye'u dang/ bu mo rnams dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyenam dang/ chos smra ba dung/ chos nyan pa rnams dang/ dge slong dwang/ dge slong ma dang/ bsam gtan dang/
kha tonal 'grus kha rnams dang/ zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa rnams la skabs tshol du 'ong zhing/ bla na sems kyis skadacig gcig lastsa'i khung bu gcig tsam la 'tshob 'am/ gnod par byed dam/
'jigs par byed dam/ mdangs 'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs gtong ngam/ dri de ba dad pa de ba'i sems kyis bltan/ bdud nas/ mdang mi ma yin pa'i bar lus dri nga ba de dag gi mgotshal
pa bdun du 'gas so// de dag gcig kyang 'ong bar 'gyur/ snying yad bskams par 'gyur/ sha bkra can du 'gyur/ lus rulacing dri nga ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul yang yongs su bri bar 'gyur/de
dag sa gas par ltung bar 'gyur/ rlung gis kyang de dga phyogs bzhir gtor bar 'gyur/ rdul gyis kyang de dag g.yogs nas de nyid du sems 'khrugs te 'thoms par 'gyur// gang dag sa la
rgyu ba de dag gis sa'i khung du 'jug par 'gyur te/ sa'i 'og tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// gang dag chu nargyu kha'i 'byung bo sdang ba'i sems
dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la man bar ma dad par gyur ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal po rgyal rags nas/ zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa'i dge slong gi/
[n, ]bar la 'tshe 'am/ gang dag sngags kyi tshig 'di dag las 'da'an de dag kyang de bzhin du mgo tshol ba bdun du 'gas pa nas/ de nyid du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa'i bar du 'gyurar//
yad yul gang du bdud kyi tshogs kyis ma thub pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'byung ba der bdag dag gis bsrung ba dang/ bskyabs pa dang/ smra ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o//
der chos 'dod pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas do sdang ba'i lus srul po'i bar thams cad de de nas bskad bar bgyi'o// yul den 'thab
pa dang/ rtsod pa dang [7 ]mu ge dang/ la rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ dus ma lags pa'i char pa dang/ rlung dang/ grang ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ nad thams cad skyar bzlogs par bgyi'o//
bde ba dang/ 'dun pa dang le legs bu dang/ dag pa'i lta ba dang/ 'thun pa rnams bsgrub par bgyi// chos smra ba rnams dang/ chos nyan ba rnams la nad ma mchis pa dang/ grags
pa dang/ red pa dang/ bsti stang chen po nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// yang de'i tshe tshadas po chen po dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas
la tshongs pa'i nang du ni tshangs pa kun gyis bkur/ bdud kyi nang du ni bdud kun gyis bkur/ brgya byan gyi nang du ni brgya byin kun gyis bkur ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam thos kyi bu dang/
'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ yul 'khor srung dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ sred med kyi bu dang/ lha ma yin dang/ lha'i dbang po'i nang du ni de dag
[A ]kun kyis bkur ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rgyun dam pas legs par brgyan pa/ bud med kyi gzugs dang/ rtags dang/ spyod lam gyis de bzhin gshegs ba shAkya thub
pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ lag pa gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i
sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la mig ma 'dzums par bltas te/ gzhan ma yin pa'i dngos po brjod du med pa su yang mi
yin par bltasas// denus de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des/ rmongs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye khyodakyis mig mi 'dzums mar ci'ang ma yin pa'i
bar dal ci zhig blta/ nu 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang/ ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i chos gang yod dam/ de bzhin du 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi nyon mongs kha
rnams yod do zhes bya ba'i ming gi dngos khani rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do// mtshan nyid kyican ni ma rig pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams nas/ 'gog kha'i bar du rgyas par bya'o//
0 gsol tu/ bcom ldan 'das 'ad ltar mumachis bsan/ de'i slad du ma rig ba zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan das ga la gal te ma rig pa ma mchis na/ srid pa'i yan lag bcu
gnyis pa de dag gang las skye bar 'gyur/ ci nas nam mkha'alas skyes zhes bgyir nanam mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'dras kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de da
bzhin te/ sang sa rgyus kyi chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu 'o// ji ltar nam mkha' rdzasam yin/ mtshan nyid ma yin/ mun pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ rtog pa su yin/
rnam par rtog pa ma yin/ rnam par rig pa ma yin/ grub pa ma yin/ rjod pa ma yin te/ tsu'ang ma yin pa/ cha shas med pa/ dngos po thams cad sbyangs pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de bzhin nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams na yang dag pa'i mthus yongs su bcad pa'o// bri ba med nga dang gang ba med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams ni pa rol dang tshu rol la rag pa med pa'o// chu shas med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni brjod du med pa'o// mi g.yo zhing rnam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas
kyi chos rnams ni rdzas dang/ dngos pa dang/ mtshan nyid thams cad med pa'o// tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med pa ste/ yang dag lam
yan pa'i kun tu rtog pa las srid pa'i yan lag rnams skyes so// bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tsho/ srog chags bye ba brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsal pagal te sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha' lta bur drangs pa ma mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa
lags na/ de ci'i slad du ye shes dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ thabs dang/ pha rol gnon pas khyod 'di ltar bdag la 'tshe bdag gi bdud kyi yul 'jom/ bdag gi bdud kyi las
sems can kha 'dren 'gro ba mad pa dang/ 'ong ba med ba dang/ ci'ang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la slob tu 'dzud/ gang gi tshe sems can 'di dag khyod kyis bslab pa dag la
slob kha na/ de dag nyon mongs pa skye ba'i spyod pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// gang gi slad du khyod kyis bdag gi slad du grungs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
pa ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dbu'u sAms dpa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos chu bo rnams dang/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang kwa 'jig rtan skyong bya bzhi dang/ dbang
phyug chen pa rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen
ba/ po rnams bsdus nas 1 sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus ba 'ad gang bar bgyis/ snying rje med pa 'dis kyang gang dag thos ma thag tu bdag klad pa'i nad mi bzad ngas btab ste/
sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing lus kyang rul la drud bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad/ yang de'i lho bdud drug khri brgyud stong/ bdud kyi 'khor grangs
mdo dpag tu med ba dang/ de bzhanadu sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ grul bum dang/ sha za de dag thams cad kyis khyod mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ bdag cag kyang
bsam thagatu klad pa na ba'agyur te/ lus kyang rul cing dri nga bar gyuranas/ shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba myong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad rtsis bka' stsal to//

sdug can khyed kyis 'das pa de dran par byas shig/ da byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/ khyed kyis nga yang gsad pa'i phyir dang ga tshad brgyud nu tshun chad kyi sa gzhi dang nam mkha' bdud kyi
sdus bkang ste 'das pa nas/ da ltar bdud bye ba 'khor dang bcas te/ nga gsad pa'i bar du bkye bas de bas na khyod yongs su gdul ba dang/ zhi bar byang dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
dang/ de bzhin du bdud gzhan rnams nas/ ma dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du gdul bdang/ zhi bar bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal tham sa cad ko ngar zhi bar bya ba dang/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med partsi'ang
