[4 ]@#// ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la bslab par bya ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang/ skye ba dang/ 'khor ba'i chu rgyun bsam pa dang/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan/
po las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med khranas/ ma dang mi ma yin pa'i bar/
rnams bsogs kyis/ sngagacan khyod daklan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig/ de ltar n khyed klad pa na ba'i sdug bsngal ma bzad pa'i tshor ba 'di las yongs su
thar par 'gyur te/ mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos nan mkharang bzhin lta bu mngon du 'gyur/ bdud kyi yul lasaches khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rnams kyang
'thob par 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad steng dang/ bdud kyi 'khor grangs me dradong ga tu med pa dang/ sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas/ lus srul pa sdang ba'i bar gyis mgrin
gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis kyang sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems khaskyed nga ra bgyin/ ji ltar bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i
rang bzhin lta bu dedag mngon du 'gyur/ thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di yang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces smas so//
gal te bdag phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du klad pan bar gyur kyang bdag 'di 'dra ba'i g.yo sgyus byang chub tu sems ma bskyed do// de nas tshangs pa chen po dbyangs drang ldan pas 'di skad
ces gsol to// bdag kyang sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bstan pa'i chos kun gzung bar 'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can
'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'di'i bstan pa la gtso bas gtad pa gzung bar bgyi ste/ do yang shAkya thub pa mam nub kyi bar du bdag gis bstan pa 'di la dad pa'i chos kyi tshul
'bar bar bgyi'o// yul gang na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'dra ma byung ba dar bdag gis dbyung bar bgyi'o// gang du byung nga der ni shin tu lhag
parabyung bar bgyi'o// grong dang/ grong khyer dang grong rdal dang/ yul de dag na rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mchis po de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar
bgyi/ gnod pa las bzlog par bgyi/ don dang dge ba la gzud par bgyi'o// gang dag bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di than brisanas 'chung ba rnams
dang gangan chos smra ba gang ga'i khri la mchis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'tshol ba de dag gis der thog mar gsang sngagasakyi tshig 'di dag brjod par bya'o//
@#// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis bdag 'gug par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas dang sa phyogs der mchis nas/ chos smra ba de dag dang chos nyan ba de dag
bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sbra bar bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ a ba me a bo me/ a ma ba re/ a ma bu re/ ba ri kun dza/ nA da na da/ puskurwa ba ha/ dza lu'u kA/ ma kha la/
lo ma la/ ka li/ kirti tsa ra mu dre mu dra mu khe swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gadra dang gang na chos smra ba de dag gis thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyis la/ bdag cag
gis kyang lha'i rna ba'i khams shin tu yongs su dag bas thos te/ dar ma mchis na 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bslus par 'gyur zhing
bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang ma 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag der mchis la chos smra ba'i rkang pa'i drung du skya ngag
blang bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba de'i skyobs ba rigs pas nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ chos smra ba dang/ chos nyan pa de dag gi nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi/ lta ba ngan pa dang/ bya ba ngan
pa dang/ thatshom thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ kun chub bar bgyid pa der bdag 'khor dang
bcas tem chis nas 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ mu ge dang/ nad dang/ 'jigs ba dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ char chu 'bab pa dang/ dus ma lags ba'inang dang/ tshub dang/
lta ba ngan pa dang/ bya ba ngan pa de dag thams cad dang/ mi dang/ ma ma lags pa dang/ dud 'gro rnams kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhibar bgyi'o// den bkra mi shis pa dang/ rmi lam
ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ sdang ba dang/ brlung ba dang/ zhe gcod pa dang/ ro brol ma mches pa dang/ kha ba dad/ tsho ba dang/ dri nga ba dang/ reg na mi bde ba'i dug de thams cad
khasal bar bgyi// der tsha ba dang/ mu ge'i gnod pa rnams bsal bral bgyi// glang po che dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ ma he dang/ sbyang ki dang/ sbrul gdug da dad/
rkun po dang/ g.yon can dang/ mi dang/ mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// der sems can thams cad kyi longs sbyod dang kun tu spyod
pa'i slad du/ nor dang ]'bru drang/ sman dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ ro dang/ bras dang/ skom dang/ gos dang mal cha sna tshogose brar bsgrub par bgyi'o
yul gong na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang/ 'dzan pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ 'chad pa der bdag gis sems can rnams kyiganod po thams cad
bas sor bsal bar bgyi'o// sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ kun spyod pa'i slad du phan ba dang/ bde ba dang/ yid bde ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o//
sems can de dag kyang chos 'dod ba dang/ dge ba spyod pa la gzud par bgyi ste/ 'di na bdag gis sangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das thums cad kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab pa'o// sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ skyes khu'i mthu 'di nyams 'og tu chud par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag/
la yid bzhin du bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ de nas de'i mod la shAkya thub pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis tshangs pa
dbyangs dang ldan pa de lazugs brtse bar dgongs te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'dis gang gi phyir brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/'jig rten skyong ba
thamasacad dang/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'ilha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ drizad ng/ lha ma yin rnams bkug ste/ skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed
par 'gyur gyis/ nged kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag tshangs ba dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di la sbyin par bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad cas bka'
[sal to// tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la grub par gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ tsa mun ze/ mun d pa ni rtsod/ hachu hu ha mAha/ ha mu// sang ras bal pa bkaM/ sha ma kha ka par bA hA/
tshamAr ya b+hatsa/ su ba kha u mu la/ bar tsA da bo rma bud d+ha ad+hiSh+Thate swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkyathub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu bdud dang/ brgya byin dang/
tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang/ gzhan yang lha deng/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri khra dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ gAkhri brjid che ba dang/ gzi brjidache ba'i mi dang
ma ma yin pa rnams 'gug ming 'dun par byed pa'i gzungs 'ad sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gzung zhing byin gyis brlabs kyis// khyod 'dis skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus
bar 'gyur/ dbyangs dang ldan pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bud med kyi cha byad 'di lta bu s chos kyi tshul bsrung bar bgyi'o// bud med rnams kyang yongs su bskyong bar bgyi'o//
bcom ldan 'das bud med la la zhig la bu 'chol te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tum/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ bras te 'changan bdag gis bud med de'i bsam pa
yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// yang bud med gang 'di lta bu s sems medas su skyo bar gyur te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang zhing klog kha nas/ nyan pa'i bar bgyid na/ de 'dod pa la
a/ @#// spyod kyang mngal du mi 'chags so// yang bud med gang brnyes shing smad bar gyur/ longs spyod dang/ kun spyod pa rnams dang bral ba des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
sa bklags na/ bsam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba brams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba drang/ sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su
rdzogs bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la 'bul la// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de
bzhin te/ srung ba dang/ yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// 'dus ba chen ba rin po che tog gi gzungs las gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa 'o/
yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub ba dang hacad yang ma ring ba
zhig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu 'bar ba'i dpal gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas de yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i mkhyad dang skadatsag gis bdud kyi gzugs su snang ngo// de bzhin du
sbyar te/ brgya byin gyi gzugs dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kya lha'i dbang po'i gzugs dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'thab bral dang/ rgyal chen bzhi dang//
a/ da bang phyug chen po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ srin po dang/ la dgas dang/ shaza dang/ grul bum dang 3
rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze'i rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ glang po che dang/ na ha nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar gyi gzugs rnam
nga sna tshogs su snang ngo// skad cig gis bya dang/ shing dang/ ro dang/ 'bras bu dang/ gos dang/ mal chu dang/ snam bu dang/ snod dang/ phyang phrul dang/ rgyun dang/ sman rnam pa
sna tshogs dang/ rin po cha'i gzugs dang/ yud tsam gyis dge slong dang 2 dge slad ma'i gzugs dang skad srog gis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su snang ngo// skad cig gis kha dog dang//
rtags drang 2 dbyibs dang gzugs brgyad du rtswa bzhi'i sna ngango// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das
rigs kyi bu 'di kha dog dang/ rtags dang/ dbyibs dang/ gzugs brgyud du tshu bzhir gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang
ldan pa gang po rigs kyi bu 'di ni mthu rab tu che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par che ba'i blo gyis dam bcas pa'i stobs kyis yul gang la gnas nas sems can rnam sa yongs su smin
par byed cing/ shes rab kyi mig sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ yongs su ma dag pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na
bsams padung/ sems pa ji lta bu dang Da sems ji lta bu dang/ spyod pa ji lta bu dang/ ci 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab pa dang/ gang la skyabs su song ba'i sems can ci 'dra ba de dag mthong ba de
'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub sems dang 'a sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi gzugs dang/ kho dog dang/ rtags dang/ spyod lam dang/ dbyibs dang
! gzugs de lta bu dag gis sems can rnams thug pa gsum las phyir ma ldog pa la 'god pa dang/ sems can gang dag 'dod pa'i zil gyis non te/ me byad dang/ longs spyod rnam pa sna
tshogs 'dod pa de dag gi chags pa spang ba'i phyir yo byad rnanas byin nas/ phyir ma ldeg pa la 'god pa dang/ nad kyis btab nas sman 'dod pa rnams la sman byin te/ phyir mi ldog pa la
'god pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gres 'dis nyin gcig la gang+ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar byas te/ theg pa
gsum la phyir ma ldog par 'god pa'i dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi spyod yul 'di ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bgrod pa ma yin no// gang pas gsol pa// bcom ldan
'dras rigs kyi 'u 'dis sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu chen po'i mthu brtsams nas ji srid gtsug lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal pa// rigs kyi du
'dis bskul pa gang dag gi pha rol tu zlan med pa yad dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa ni grangs med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed do//
byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis bskyal ba gang dag la ting nga'adzin gyi mogrus skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu brtsan sa nas bskal pa grangs med pa drug cu rtsa bzhi 'das
sa gang pos gsol pa/ 'di ji srid cig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskal ba chen po brgya stong phrag nyi shu rtsa drug 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa chen po sgol nga zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba
'byung bar 'gyur te/ skye dgu'i cho lo stong phrag bzhi bcu thub pan/ mchon sa med pa byed pa nus/ mi dge ba bcu'i chos kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du bla na mong pa/
ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub na ngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus me tog rgyas pa ma bya' yas pa'i
'od zer ces bya bar 'gyur ro// des lo bzhi khrir sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir theg pa gsum po
dag la sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur// de'i 'og tu phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ gang pos
khaM gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'dis sngon sems can gang dag yongs su smin par bgyis pa de dag gang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
skyes bu chen po de'i smon lam rigs su chad pa med de/ des smon lam 'di skad du/ nam phyogs bcu'i phyogasare rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bar chad med par mthong bar ma gyur tam/ bdag gis mngon byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang dgothog mar bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa 'byang chub la btsud pa dang/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pajug la bkod pa de dag phyogs bcur so sor sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma mthong ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khyadachub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi

bya'o/ ting nge 'dzin bkod pa 'i mthu 'di 'dra bas phyogs bcu'i phyogs de re rer ya nga sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag/
dang = gzhan dag na yang sems can gang dag mtshoms med pa byed pa dang/ the tshom can nas/mo drag pa'i chos kyi bar dang ldan par gyur pa de rnams de dag nas sha 'phos nas/ bdug ga sa ngas
rgyas kyi zhing du skyes la/ bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du de dag thams cad kyi dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byas te/ phyir mi ldog pa la so sor bkod nas/ de nas gdod bdag blon
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ngar skyes bu'i mju chen bo 'di lta bu s rgyunadu bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo// de nas phyogs bcu'i
sangs rgyus kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag da lta'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir lhags pa rnams ston ba 'di lta bu dag kyang ma/ga/
bar bgyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sang rjetshan ba dad ldan pa 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu yang mthong/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'dod pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu bsten pa'i chos kyi sAng pos lus 'jom pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'dzug ba lung bstan pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi byone
ma @#// kyi rlabs sngon ma thos pa 'di yang chos mnyan pa'i slad du red pa ni bdag cag gis red pa legs bar med do// 'dus ba chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las dam pa'i
chos yongasasu gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o///yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs ba mi 'khrugs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bos te 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ lha drang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am
dang lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po nas/ ma dang mi ma yin ba'i bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa 'dir lhags pa khyed cag thams cad ngas spro bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams 'dus pa 'di lta bu 'dri dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pa 'di dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshungs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong dang/ lha dang/
klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ ma dang/ ma ma yin pa 'dus pa 'di lta bu n dkon no// de bas na khyed kyis 'di mthong nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ dam pa'i
chos 'di dang/ chos kyi tshul 'di yongs su bskyang ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 'di 'bar bar byed par spro ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed so so nas rang
rang gi smon lam thob cig/ yang de'i tshe bdud dge sbyang me tog ces bya bas me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo tog dang/ myu gu sna tshogs kyis rin po che sna bdun gyis tre bo byur bur bkang ste
bud med kyigazugs kha dog bzang bo rgyas ba mchog dang ldan par bsgyur nas/ bud med kyi gos dang rgyan mchog gis brgyan te 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su
dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byon te bzhugs pa thams cad dang/ gang gzhan yang su dag 'dir 'dus pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su grasal/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das thams cad la me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo tog dang/ rgyu gu thams cad kyis byur bur yongs su gtam zhing rgyas pa'i bro ba 'di u0f7a'bul na/ sems can thams cad la thugs
brtse bar dgongs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag gi drwa ba me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo tog dang/ myu gu thams cad kyis yongs su gtams pa 'di
bzhes su gsol/ 'altar bdag bskal pa bzang po mtha' dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams la zas dang/ skom dang/ 'bras
bu dang/ me tog dang/ lo tog gi sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur bar bgyis/ de dag kyang yongs su smin par bgyi/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa des/ bdag la rol tu phyin pa
drug yongs su rdzogs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi/ sems can gang dag bdag gis 'dul/
kha de dag kyang ye byad kyis ma brel bar bdag gis rim gro bgyi na/ bdag gi bsam pa rnams yongs su rdzogs bar dngos grub stsal du gsal/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
de dag brAms cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di ltar sems mngon par dad pas sbyin pa che zhing mtho ba byas pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad
la khyod kyis mchod pa byas pa legs so legs sa// khyod kyis tre bo me tog dang/ 'bras bus yongs su gang ba 'di yang bzhes so// khyod kyang me tog dang/ 'khras bu dang/
'bru dang/ lo tog la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang/ ji tsam 'dod pa dang/ gang gi phyir 'dod pa red par gyur cig/ khyodakyi ra ba yid kyi brnag pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur
cig/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'bru phun sum tshogs pa grub par gyur cig/ 'byor pa yang phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gag dang
gas lo pa grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal M dang/ ljongs dang/ ri brags gang dgan bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di 'chang ngam/ ston tam/ 'chad dam/ tha na
[t, ]glegs bam la bris te/ bsti stang brgyad pa'i grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ ri brags de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o// de dang de dag tu shing ljon ba rnams
kyi me tog dang 'bras bunas/ 'bru dang lo tog gi bar du bsgrub par bgyi'o// de dag thams cad na/ me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshol ba'i sems can rnams kyang tshan par bgyi'o//
btsum ldan 'das de bas na tshe bas pa ma gtogs par gal te de na sems can me tog dang/ 'bras bu'i zas 'tshol ba 'ba' zhig me tog dang/ 'bras bu'i zas ma 'tshal ba'i slad du 'khum
pa 'dus bgyis par gyuran/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang/ 'dus pa chen pom lus ba 'di bdag gas bslus par gyur kyi/ bdag kyang bu
na medub yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gang yang de na sems can rnams me tog dang/ 'bras bu 'tshol ba de ni bdag ga sbyin pa'i bal
tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das den me tog dang/ 'bras bu de dag 'tshal nas gang sems can de dag gcig la gcig phan pa dang/ gnyen pa dang/ snying rje
ba'i sems su gyur pa de na bdag gitshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gang me tog dang 'bras du 'tshal nas brtson 'grus
dung ldan par gyur ba de na bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu 'gyur gang sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes
'jug pa de na/ bdag gabasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gang me tog dang/ 'bras bu 'tshol nas/ thanakhya dang/ ro dgas kyang chos 'tshol bar gyur
cing stong pa nyid la gnas ni/ den bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gzhan nang chos kyi rnam grungs 'di gang du 'byung ba der sems can gyi 'bras
dang gro dang/ nas dang/ til dang/ mon phran sde'u dang/ man sran spe'u dang/ rgya sran dang/ sran chung dang/ gang dag la tog tu 'gyur ba de dag gi slad du bdag gis nan tan cher bgyi'o//
'bru dang lo tog mang po de dag gis kyang mdzod dang bang ba thams cad yongs su gtam par bgyi/de na sems can gang than bya dngu'i dgas dag gis kyang 'tshal bar gyur na/ den bdag gi
shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// der bdag gis bu ram shing dang/ rgun 'brum dang/ bal po'i se'u khu shugs shin tu mang ba bsgrub bar bgyi'o// der
bdag gis sems can rnams kyi rdza ma dang/ bum pa dang/ bya skyogs rnams yongs su gtam par bgyi'o// gang de la tha na bya dang 'i dgas la sogs bas 'tshal na yod de ni bdag gi shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ltar bdag gi pha rol tu phyin ba drug po de dag yongs su rdzogs nas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas ba'i byang
chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po thams cad kyis bdag gi byang rlung sem
dpa'i spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di la rjes su dgyes pa mdzad du gsal/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzod do//
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes togarus bya bas 'di skad ces bka' sal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di lta bu'i mthu chen po byed nus kyis/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis stobs drang
brtson 'grus dang/ sde ba btul ba de lta bu'i sems can thams cad gnyer bar gyis shig/ de dag bdud dge sbyong me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa yo shes tog de las dbugs 'byin
pa de thos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag la dgongs su gsol/ gang la la zhig na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi spyod pa der bdag mi gnas kyi//
gang la lar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der bdag gnas te/ sa phyogs de na 'khru dang/ sman dang/ 'bras bu dang/ me tog gang dag 'byung ba de dag sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang
kun spyod pa'i slad du/ rab tu rnam gcan dang/ shan tu rje ba dang/ shin tu mang ba dang/ shin tu ro bda' ba dang/ shin tu kha dog dang ldan par bsgrub par bgyi
sems can de dag kyang bza' ba dang btung bas tshim par bgyi/ sems can rnams kyim rjod dang/ bad ba dang/ bum pa dang/ rdza ma dang/ bya skyogasa rnams Nashin tu yongs su gang bar
bgyi/ tha na gang bya dang ri dgas kyis de la 'a tshal kyang de ni bdag ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bskal
pa stod thams cad du sems can rnams la zas dang skom kyi longs spyod 'di lta bu dag gis tshim par bgyi/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhang kun nas nyon mongs bar gyur pa snyigs ma lnga dang
ldan pa grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung gi byim sod rnams su bskal pa stong re re la yang skyes bu'i mthuchen po 'di lta bu bgyi zhing/ de nas gdodo bdag bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyin/ bdag gi las yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar dngos grub stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni
rang rang gi smon lam gyis 'gug pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig lags so// 'di lta ste/ tsa me kha/ tsa me kha/ tsa me kha/ bri dr-i te haste/ ba hab hab ha/ sma ra a kan/ sar te ba ba ba sa le//
sa ra sa ren dre sa ra ma henadre/ sa ra mahan dri/ sar badzin// ta rApa ma sazla kun/ hu hu 1 hu tu/ hu hu/ a sang ga dza be/ tA kha ta kha ta kha/ bA lu lA te/ u pa nA la/
san ta ra pA mA/ bi dza pA la/ pusha/a sha d+hi/ d+hanad+ma rten/ n+nA/ak+Sha ye dza la b+ha han/ snar as kan/ samyakA pra tilanan ba ya ma/ sa ta tu/ kA la/ yam mo/
ma mi ma mi dadza ba rwa sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag mosasu smon par bgyikho dang/ byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang/
gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad pa de dang de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o// de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de la legs so zhes
bya ba byin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang/ bdud 'kher dang bcas ba dedag thomasacad dang/ brgya byin dang ]tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba
thams cad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen bo dang/ grul bum dang/ sha za dang/
ma dang/ mim yin pa de dag thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis mgron gtsag tu legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod
bud med kyigazugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa legs so legs so// kho bo cag gis bsod nams dang/
brtson 'grus dang/ stobs dang/ pha rol gnon pas skyes bu'i mthu de lta bu'i mngon par 'grub khar 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bde skad ces bka' stsal
'tsho to skyes bu dam pa 'di'i grogs byed par snying brtse ba can du spro/ de nas bdud ngag sbyong me tog ga 'khor gang yin pa des mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag
'di'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing mdza' ba dang/ rjes su 'thun pa'i glegs bgyi'o// skyes bu dam pa khyod nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khyang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya ba de'i tshe khyod kyis bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston cig/ bdud dge sbyong me tog gis smyos pa/ bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin du gyur cig/ sems
can gang dag gis sa la sa bon rnams btab ste/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ dri kun tu spyod par gyur pa de yang bdagatsug la phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig/ de nas de bzhin gsheg
ba shAkya thub pa de la/ bdud dge sbyong me tog gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni khyed kyi bstan po 'dzin pa lags kyi/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa lags te/ 'di nyidi/
du thog mar mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan cher bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med ba yang dag par rdzogs ba'akhyang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/
da nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa del yan lag ltas phyag 'tshol te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
bas/ bdud dag sbyong me tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ bder gshegs sras bo dpa' bo dam pa'i bar 'i gdeng longs shig/ khyodakyis de ring byang chub mchog tu smon
lan snying bo btab/[” ]/rtsa lag gcig tu song rje skyes te bkres pa'i sdug bsngal gyis/ gzir ba'i 'gro ba 'di bkolanas na sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// chos rnams rang
bzhin drimed dag la nam mkha' 'dra ba dang// stong zhing mtshan ma rnams dngo smon pa'i yul las rab grol bar// rtogasanas zhing 'dir ring bor mi thogs dpal ldan zhes bya ba'i//
srangs rgyas dgra phrul blo gros shin tu brtan kha nyid du 'gyur// de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog mchog tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de drag lame tog sna tshogs
kyis gtor te// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbyangs kyis go bar byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams padag la dgongs su gsal/
za/ bskal ba bzang pobyun gnas bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi san sngar sems can yongs su sminapar bgyi ba'i slad du smon lam btab ste/ sems can rnams kyi
nad bzhikhargya rtsa bzhi rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sa'i bcud las byin blangs te/ rtswa dang rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to// sems can rnams kyi longs spyod

du bgyikha dang/ nad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang/ nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du sman banud kyis lenakhargya rtsa bzhi sbyar te rtsa ba'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang/ 'bras bu'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi
dang mar las sbyarab brgya rtsa bzhi dang/ 'bru mar las sbyar ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang/ bkru sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang/ sman nad medaces bya ba brgya rtsa bzhi nas/ bskaba'i phye ma dang/ ril bu
dang = snar stsal ba'i bar du stong rtswa bzhi bstan to// sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang/ nad zhi bar bgyi ba dang/ sems can rnams la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gis
de bzhin gshags ba 'khor ba 'jig zhabs 'brang dang bcas ba la kun spyad kha sna tshogs kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/ derakhadag byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal ba dang/ de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis/ bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i cholo brgya thub ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar dang ldan pa kashAkya thub pazhes bya ba 'byung ngo// de bzhin gshags ba de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi
sangs rgyas 'dus ba chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po 'byung ste/ der khyed klan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu
de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis kyang de skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i 'o ga tu 'od srungs kyis kyang bdug la de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ de'i tshe bdag gis sems can nad kyis
btab pa rnams kyi slad du/ bskal pa chen po gda'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di sman chen po bcud kyis len gyi lhar gyur cig der yang bdag gis sems can kun
gyi spyad pa dang nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sa'i bcud rgya chen po blangs nas rtswa dang/ rtsa ba dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to//
de na sems can gang dag gis yang dag par sbyar te 'chol nas sems can de dag sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang/ bdag med
par so sor rtog ba gang 'jug bde yang bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar khangag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i skyes
ka bu'i mthu chen po bgad pa de bzhin du/ phyogs banu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang bskal ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bdag gis
mtshabud med kyi gzugs kyis spro ba chen po dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ pha rol gnon pa 'di lta bu dang/ sems can nad kha yangs su sman par bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi
ba 'di lta bu s bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// da ltar yang bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi spyan sngar smon lam 'phel bar bgyid do// skal ba chen po dang ldan pa pha rol gnon pa brtan pa dge sbyong me tog 'dra'i grogs su yang gyur cig/ bdag cag gnyis kas
kha drag gcig tu budamed kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi'o// bud med rnams rab tu yongs su smin par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yang bdag cag
gnyis kyis nad pa rnams dang/ rgan be rnams kyi nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sa'i bcud las byin blangs ba zas dang/ skom dang/ kha dog dang/ dri dang/ ro dang ldan pa sbyar
bar bgyis te/ bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur chu// bdag bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs khar/
'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la legs so zhes bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag blon/
med pa yang dag par rdzogs khra'ibyang chub tu lung bstan du gsal/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skyes bu dam pa khyed legasas legs so zhes de la legs so zhes
bya ba byon no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod na 'jig na nad pa'i sman pa gcig/ de bzhin dbang po rnams la bde byed pa//
khad+ma ldan pa zhing bgatsang dam pa der// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin ces bya ba lung bstan pa
thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugasakyis sa la yongs su spyod pas smon lam btab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub bas de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to= khyedan ra dang sa 'dzan gcig pu ste// khyed ni ri kha myur du rdzogos par 'gyur// rgyal ldan zhing mchog phun sum tshogs par na// ye shes dbang phyug ces bya'i rgyal bar
[©]/ 'gyur/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba lung bstan ba thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis tshul yongs su
bod pas smon lam btab pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod kyis 'dir ni thabs dang shes rab kyis//
mi tog 'bras bus sems can tshim byas nas/ zhing mchog rnam par dag pa sgo ldan du// nyi ma mchog gi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' bral ba ston ces bya ba lung bstan pa sprob par 'dodonas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis me la yongs su spyod sa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam
btab pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyas/ de la yang 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// 'grob ma rtag 'du shes byas nas ni// skye ba byang chub yongs su smin byas nas/
skye bo rdulan zhing mchog rab bsngags par// me yi sgen ma bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'a sems can rnams la g.yo zhing rdul dang bral
ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis rlung la yongs su spyod pas sems can yongs su sman por bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan
[z/ ]'das kyis/ de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// g.yo bas sems can rnams la dug 'a sbyar te// khyod nyon mongs rab tu zhi byed cing// rnam dag khring du mnyam nyid don mthong
kha zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'o smin ma lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud medakyi gzugs kyis nam/
mkha' la yongs su spyod pas sems tshan yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ mi
gnas ye shes ston pa mya ngan med// yang dag byang chub lam mchog don skya pa// sgrib pa bsal cing chags pa med bzhin du// ye shes mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin/
du byang chub sems dang 'a sa mchogasna ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa me tog la yongs su spyod pas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya
ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// sangs rgyas lam mchog rten pa rnams la ni// me tog sos mchog dag
gis mchod byas nas// me tog 'byung gnas zhing mchog rnam dag tu// kun nas skyes kyi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kha dog ngur smig lung
bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa tshon sna tshogs la yongs su skyed bas/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam
[• ]btab pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rtenangur smig gos la btsud nas su// dkon mchog gsum rigs dka' bar ldan/
byas nas// sngon por snang ba'i sangs rgyas zhing mchog tu// rin chen snang ba'i bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du sa bon dang/ nags tshal dung/ 'bras bu'i lha dum nas//
byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nasaM/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang/
bud mad shin tu yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam bal ba dang/ de dag tshigs su bcad pa re sa lud bstan pa thob par gyur to//

de ci'i phyir zhen/ pho mchin gyur te mo mtshan thob pa ni shin tu red par sa la/ me mtshan gyur te pho mtshan thob pa ni shin tu rnyed par dka'akha'i phyir ro// de nas lha dang klu chen po bye ba phrag brgya
lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang/ tshigs su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo// de bzhin du lha ma yin dkrigs phrag stong phrag drug nu
rtsa bzhi dang/ bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang/ lha dang/ mi'i bu me mi 'khrugs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu dang/ bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu nas/ mo dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dam dus rigs dang/ skyes ba dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/
bu mo gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyed kyi bar dag khan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan bathob par 'dod nas/ tshigs su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo//
mi ma yin pa dang/ de bzhin du lha dang 2 klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'aman dang/ lto 'phye chen bo dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha zla
bgrang ba las 'das pa sngon blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag ni bskyed bar gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni phyir mi
ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das ba dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzod pa dang/ gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur
to sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni 'brasabu thob nas/ 'dod chags dang bral te/ gang zag pa zad par gyur te// sems can bgrang ba las 'das ba dag ni nyan thos dang/
rang sangs rgyas kyi thog kha las sems khaskyed nas/ sangs rgyas nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis mgrin
gcigeg tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o//
gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang/ yi ger 'dri banas/ 'chad par brgyud pa'i bar gyi gang zag de dag kyang rigs pas yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// 'dus pa
chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas yang 'di skad
rtsis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag thugs brtse bas dri ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dar gshegs pa thums cad rigs kyi bu 'di dag gas gos
dang Da zas dang/ skom dang/ sman dang/ lo byad kyis sems can rnams shin tu tshim par brgyus te bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams blun med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sman par bgyi ba dang/ ci nas 'di dag sems can yongs su sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems bskyed ma thag tu 'tshol ba dang/ gang
ba slad du 'tshol ba dang/ ji lta bu 'tshol ba'i gos dang/ zas dang/ skom dang/ sman dang/ yo byad rnams stsal pa 'am bsham pa 'khyor bar 'gyur ba'i yid la re ba medas su/
rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ca nas skyes bu dam pa 'di dag skyes bu chen po'i mthu 'di lta bu brgyud pa dang/ sems can rnams la ledas spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pas rimagro
bgyid nus pas 'di bdag la dgongs su gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs rje chen po dang/ bsod nams dung/ ye shes dang/ bsam gtan gyis
brgyan pa'i rgyu 'thun par yar la mdzad pas skyes bu dam pa de dag la 'di skad rus bka' stsal to// khyed kyi bsam pa drang yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir//
dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag sbyin no//
'di lta ste/ rdzu tib pa/ d+ha ti pa ra mun ba pa/ sad rkya ba ba/ bun a lang kA ra ba ba/ rgyun ra sa ba ba/ mo dkAru Na ba ba/ mo nA bra tabab/ a mahAb ba ru ti ba ba/ kI
tig ba/ sAli la ba ba/ kha ga ba ba/ bA yu ba ba/ brta ba ba/ a d+hakhyen ba ba/ a ma ba bo/ a hanan ba ba/ ta tha ga ta ba ba/ b+hUta ko Ta ba ba/ mahAne'i bri ti ba ba/ driku sha la bab
ka @#// tri ya na bab/ ti d+hA tukab pa/ trib moklu ba ba/ trishu klu ba ba rashA a d+hiSh+Than ba ba/ ba ba bu kha ba ba sa ma hA/ an rgya sa ma ta/ ta ta ta ta/ Ta tra Tasha kasrid d+hi/
sarba ku sha la mu la a d+hiSh+pa nA ya swAhA/ skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyigasang sngags kyi tshig bsam ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di dag
sems can rnams kyis longs spyod pa dang/ kun spyod par bya ba dang/ yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ khyed kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gzung zhig
yang de'i tshe dge sbyong me tog dang/ dang la gyi lham dang/ rtsi'i lha mo grub pa'i blo gros dang/ lham ngos 'dzin la sogs te byang chub sems dpa' khri thams cad bud med kyi gzugs kyis
sems can rnams kyi longs spyod pa dang/ kun spyod pa dang/ yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag
cag gi yid la ra ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi tshiga'adi dag gsungs pas na/ byin gyi rlabs 'dis bdag
cag sems can thams cad la rim gro bgyid nus so// bdag cag blan med pa'i ye shes sgrub par nus so// bdag cag gis sems can Tams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du//
gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bgyi zhing brtson pa drag pos skye bar bgyi'o// yang sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar
rang rang kris dam bcas pa la gnas par bgyi'o// lha 'am/ klu nas/ mi'i bar gang la la zhi gde bzhin gshegs pas khyen gyis brlabs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ma mchis
par bgyid dam/ rtag par bgyid dam/ rnam par ma rung bar bgyid na/ bas baayabadag cag gis dam pa'i chos yun ring po gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du gal te de na
bzlog gam/ nan tan du ma bgyis na bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad slus par gyur cig/ bdag cag blon med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ kyi grogs po dag lhunas/ ma'i bar gang la la zhig gi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen dang/
dge bsnyen ma la 'tsho bgal te bdag cag gis de dag ma bzlog gam/ bdag cag gis de dag gi 'khrug pa zhi bar bgyi ba'i sladadunan tan ma bgyisan/ bdagacag gis dus gsum du gshegs/
pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ bcom/
ldan 'das byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gad la la zhig zhugs dang/ rgyab dang/ dugadang/ mtshon dang/ khyod drang/ rims
zhag gcig pa dang/ zhag gany+dzis ba dang/ zhag gsum pa dang/ zhag bzhi pas 'jigs panas/ lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lus srul po dang/ rgyal rigs dwang/
bram ze'i rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ sang gro dang/ stag dang/ nad dang/ bkres pa dang/ skom pa dang/ 'tshe ba gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis
'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa las sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi nga'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag
dran na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs te/ bdag cag gis de dag gnod pa rnams las yongs su thar par ma bgyis na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag
cag gis bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ de'i tshe gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i
gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis legs par dam bcas pa legs se lags so//
da nus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs bshAkya thub bas/ bdud sdiganyan la 'di skad ces bkaT stsal to// grub pa gshegs ba 'di dag la ni
dad cing dga' ba'i mchog bskyed de/ derang gzhan gyi don phyir dga' bar myur du byang chub sems gzhol byas// snyigacan khyod ni rang gi yul na ba tu grogs med mthu med kyis/ thub ba
la ni khyod kyis bsngo zhing snyogs par byed pa btang bar byos// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsal pa khyod kyi tshig gis byang chung dri med dad pa'i sems gcig padrag mi bskyod//
thub pa ma gsung bzhugs shig bdag la rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyang mchis// de dag lhan cig bdag gi yul nas dpung dang bzhon par bcas pas gnas par bgyi// phun sum
tshogs 'dzin bdag mthus ji srid 'tsho bar khyod kyi dbang ma mchi/ 'dus pa chen po ni po che tog gi gzungs las snying brtse ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//
yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri mos kyis/ de ba[é]na gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungs so// ji ltar 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas byon te/ nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ni legs par byin gyis lam bas//
bdud bye ban pham par mdzad/ byams pachen bodang/ sIng rje chen po'i spyan gyis semana rnams la ni gzigs/sdig pa'i lta ba las ni rab tuphrod par mdzad/ shes rab kyi sgen ma ni 'bar bar mdzad

zhi ba'i lam la ni bkod de/ chos mnyam panyid dolta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying po lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag dang tshigab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam du 'di ni bdag po'i phyogazhi gam/

bar mdzod/chos kyis rgyal mtshan ni btsugs pa de bzhin du 1 da ltar phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du

nyon mongs ba can gigs na lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'du ba chen po mdzad de/ chos kyi tshul 'di legs par byin gyis brlabs banus/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs nga 'i bar du ni mdzad na/ shAkya
thub pa 'a ma khyod nub nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir su zhig mchog tu 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'du 'bar bar bgyid bar 'gyur/ sems can rnams
yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur/ 'dus pa chen po 'dir yang bgrang bar chud par 'gyur/ bdag gis su'i lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri mas la 'di skad ces gsungs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' bzod ba thob pa rnams sam/ brgya byin nam/ tshongs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'am/ lha dang/ klu dang 2 gnod sbyin dang/ dra bla dwang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' ldang
dang/ ma 'omasu dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ gadra su yod rung ste/ chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par brtson pa rnams dang/ gang dag dbus kyi gling bzhi la 'di na gnas ba chos kyi tshul 'ad/
la mngon par dad pa'i brgya byin drad/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba nas/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar de dag gi lag tu gzungs kyi phyag rgyar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad
par mdzod cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri mos kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshigabarjod pa thogs pa med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dag khyab par mdzad nas 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs po dag gang susangs rgyas kyi ri 'dir lus pa thams cad nyon cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni

shin tu dkonano// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad skad cig gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'dus pa 'di yajashin tu dkon te/ khyed la thugs brtse ba dang/ semacan thamacad rjes su gzung bdang/ dam pa'i/

chos kyi tshulabyin gyis brlab pa dang/ bla na med pa'i las la dgod ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas 'di dag thams cad 'dus te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad
bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba nas/ 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ rnga ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
za kyis dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sa'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs so// tshu'i khams thams cad dang/ me'i khams thams cad dang/ rlung gi khams thams cad dang/ nam mkha'i khams
thams cad byin gyis bar ngs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/

( brgya byin dang/ rmongs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mo'i mtshwa deng/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang pa'i dag dang

gang dag yang gzi brjid che ba ga= brjid che ba'i sems can rnams dang/ gang dag yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa de dag thams cad la bas te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs pa
dag sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'iphyir chos kyi tshul 'di byin gyis brlabs te/ khyod kyi lag tu shin tu gtad kyis/ tsa nas 'dir dam pa'i chos 'di myur du ma 'jig pa dang/ nub
par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yid la gyis shog/ 'bar bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag gdus pa chen pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'du 'dzani ba
nas yi ger bris te/ 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa dang/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam 2 dge bsnyen ma dang/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag de dag thams cad yongs su/
bskyang zhing yongs su bskyab ba'aphyir rigs par khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis chos skya ba dang/ chos smra ba la dga' ba dang 2 bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba dang/ chos mnyan pa dang/ dam pa'i
chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams khyed kyis bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bskyang ba'i bar du gyis shog/ de ci'i phyir zha na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang 'on mongs bcan snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas/ chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang/
ma nub par bya ba dang/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag kun tu bsrung ba nas/semamanan na sa cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ brgya byin dang/ rmongs pa dang 2 'jig rten skyong ba
thams cad kyi lag tu gtad do// de bzhinadum 'ongs pa'i dus na/ phyogs bcur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs

rgyas kyi zhing du skadacig gis 'dus te sems can la phan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi chog 'di dag kyang 'chad par 'gyur/ chos kyi tshul 'di yang byin gyis rlob par 'gyur zhing/ chos kyi tshul
'di bsrung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nged kyis kyang daltar/
kun tu bsrung ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa rnams dang/ gling bzhi pan gnas pa'i brgya byin dang// rmongs ba dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba
dang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ hriT dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' ldingadang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen pa'i dbang po rnams kyi lag tu 'di shin tu gtad kyis 1 nyin s myur
dum 'jig cing nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yid la gyis shig/ rab tu 'bar bar gyis shig/ bsrung bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa
gang dag dang/ dam bcas pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams gang 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin panas/
than glegs bam la bris te 'chad bar byed pa'i bar dang/ chos smra ba dang/ chos nyan pa dang/ bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang/ dran pa'i chos 'dzin pa de dag la khyadakyis bsrung
bar bya'o// rim gro bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ci'iphyir zhi na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ grong ngam/ grong khyer
ram grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam 1 ri brags sam/ pho brang 'khor dang/ dgon pa'i gnas nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang myos kyi rnam grangs 'darab tu spyod do/ 32
lung 'bog gam/ kun chub par 'gyed dam/ than glegs bam la bris te 'changan/ chos kyi bcud des sa'i bcud dang/ sems can gyi mdangs 'phel bar 'gyute/ khyed des mdangs dang ldan
zhing gzi brjid dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ parol gnon pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ khyed kyi g.yog 'khor dang gzhal med khang yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang srung bar
'gyur te/ de dag gi rgyal srid dang/ dbang phyug kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/ de dag gi yul 'khor thams cad kyang srung bar 'gyur ro// 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po rnams kyang chos kyi bcud dus tshomanas
gcig la gcig ban ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ rgyal po de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa la yang mngon par yid chas par 'gyur/ dge ba'i sems su 'gyur/ ser sna med ba'i sems dang/
phan pa'i dngos po'i sems dang/ sems can thams cad la snying rdzaba'i sems nas// yang dag par lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// so so bdag bdag gi yul la yang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/
'dzam bu'i gling 'di yang skye bo 'gas pas gang bar gyur/ shin tu lo legs pa dang/ shin tu nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos gang zhing sa yang ma dngas dang ldan bar 'gyur/ 'bras bushin tu
ba[p]/ mdog bzang ba dang/ shin tu shim pa dang/ loma'i sman dang/ me tog gi sman dang/ nor dang/ 'bru rnams shin tu 'byor ba dang/ nad med ba dang/ bde ba la reg par gnas pa skyed
par 'gyurar// 'thab pa dang/ rtsodapa dang/ mu ge dang/ nad dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ dug dang/ sha sbrang dang/ sbrang bu dang/ phyi ma leb dang/ sbrul gdug pa dang/ gnod sbyin dang

srin bu morungs pa dang/ ri dgas dang/ bya dang/ spyang ki dang/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang/ char pa rnams rab tu zhikhur 'gyur/ skaram dang/ nyin mo dang/ mtshan mi dang/ zla ba dang/ zla ba phyed pa
dang lo dang/ dus rnams kyang legs par 'byung bar 'gyur/ sems can rnams kyang phal cher dag ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi/

'jigartan du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ dedagakyang khyed kyi g.yog tu 'gyur ro// de ltar gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan mang zhing phan yon che ste sems can rnams 'khor ba'i
pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs te/ grags pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bud med kyi dngos po skyes nas myong
bar 'gyur ba dang/ lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba ma lus yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// mdor na tshe 'di la bud med kyi dngos po spyod bar 'gyur bar 'phangs pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/
mtshams med pa byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ma gtogs par/ gang gzhan lus dang/ ngag dang/ ya da kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i
gnas ngan len de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na glegs bam la bris te 'dang na yang 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas thamasacad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i
gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus de'i las dang/ na mongs ba'i sgrub pa'i rab tsam yang byang bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/
yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi legs par spyod pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang/ lta ba ngan pa
thams cad skyong ba dang/ dgra thams cad chos dang 'thun bas tshar gcad pa dang/ zhi zhing phra ba'i lam thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// yul gang du gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'dus pa chen po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus sa phyogs 'di snum par 'gyur/ 'bras bu mdangs
dang ldan pa dang/ shin tu zhim pa dang/ ro dang ldan par 'gyur/ kha ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ rtsub pa dang/ ro med pa dor bar 'gyur/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu shin tu 'khyer ba dang//
nor dang/ 'bu dang/ bang ba dang/ mdzod dang/ Naphru dang/ bya skyegs rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gos dang/ zas dang/ skom dang/ sman dang/
ka yo byad rnams shin tu 'khyer par 'gyur te/ de na sems can gang dag zas dang skom gyis 'tshe ba de dag ni shin tu nad med pa dang/ nor dang ldan pa dang/ kha dog dang ldan pa dang/ stobs dang/
la ldan pa dang/ dran pa dang ldan pa dang/ chos 'dod pa dang/ dge ba tshol ba la mngon par brtson ba dwang/ sdig nga 'i lta ba yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ de dag 'dinas shi 'phos nas khyed dang
skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis khyed kyis g.yog 'phel nas stobs dang ldan zhing thogs pa med pa'i tshogs su 'gyur gyis/ chos kyi skyobs kyis rigs bzhi'i skyeba'i tshogs
yongs su bskyang ba gyis shig/ sems can rnams chos kyi don la tshud nug/ daltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la ma chod pa byas
par 'gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man da ra ba'i dri mos kyis 'dus pa chen pos mdo'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung ba dang/ bshad pa dang/ bsrung ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi yul
gyi ye shes kyi sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pas den dang/ chig brjod pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di kun bkang nas/ byang chub sems dang 'i sems dpa' chen po rnams dang
0 brgya byin gyi dpang po nas/ tshangs pa'i dpang po dang/ lto 'phye chen pa'i dbang po la sogs thams cad kyi ngang du yang bas rgyus kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa phal cher gling bzhi pa 'di na/
gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams rud kyis skye ba mdzad do// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa gang dag bzod pa
thob pa bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi
bkas bdag cag gis kyang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i da nga zhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rigs pas ston par bkur zhing gus ba chen ba
gzung bar bgyi'o// snyang rjes sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba nas/ bla na med pa'i lam gyi bar la dgod pa'i slad du bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grod ngam/
grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul dang/ pho brang 'khor dang/ dgon pa'i gnas su rgyas par bstan par bgyi'o/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/
sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyi'o// yang de'i cho sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba
thas @#// byin te skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ de nas brgya byin dang/chongs ba nas// lto 'phye chen pa'i dbang po'i

kyi bar thams cad dang/ gang dag gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa sems can gzi brjid che ba gakhri brjid che ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag druganu rtsa bzhi de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig

'tsha tu 'daskad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi ba nas/ rgyas par rab tu bshad pa'i bar du
bgyi'o// yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// sems can yongs su smin par bgyi'o// chos 'tshol ba dang/ chos ma nyan pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o//
gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cagagis kyang 'thabs pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'brab mi dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ mu khe
dang nadadang/ pha rolagyi dmag tshogs dang/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang/ char pa dang/ grang ba dang/ tsha ba dang gdug pa dang/ rtsub pa dang/ ro ma mchis pa dang/ sra ba dang/ kha ba dang/
tshaba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// bad bdang/ nyams dga' kha dang/ lo legs pa dang/ 'dum par bsgrub par bgyi'o// chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i
slad du nan tanacher bgyi'o// chos nyan pa'i rgyal po de dag kyang shin tu yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba'i se ma can rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das de dag tham sa cad kyis legs se zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzang dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ bdag dang/ gzhan dang/ gnyis ka'i phyir
nan tan gyis shig/ de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cud la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar khyed kyis sems can yongs su

sman par bya ba dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshulaM 'bar bar bya ba dang/ dam pa'i chos yunarang du gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtsonan/ khyed ring por mi thogs par myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'don gnas pa'i brgya byin dang/ rmongs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong pa dang/ lha'i dbad pa nas/
lto 'phye chen po'i dbang nga'i bar dang/ gang dag ya nga sems can gawi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bka' bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi tshul 'di bstan par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ 'dus ba chen po sangs rgyas thams
bcad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rigs pas blang bar bgyi ba nas/ grong dang grong khyer dad/ grong rdal ba dang/
[D• ]ljongs dang/ tshul dang/ pho brang 'khor dang/ dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bshad par bgyi'o/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi 'o// yongs su
'tsha bskyang bar bgyi'o// gang dag yang chos bsgrub pas gnas pa 'am/ chos sgrub 'am/ chos nyan pa'i dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dad/ dad pa'i rigs
kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa dang/ bsam gtan la brtson pa de dgakhadag cag gis bsung par
bgyi yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ bsti stang du bgyi/ bla mar btsa/ rimar bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ bo dan dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ byug pa nas/ sman dang
yo byad thams cad kyi bar kyis bsti stang du bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang/ klog pa'i m/ ston pa'i drung du bdag cag nyid nyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag
gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ston par 'du shes pas/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gyis bstenang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe
ba sangs rgyas thamasacad kyis byin gyis bar bas pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ chos kyi bcud kyis bdag cag mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ stobs dang ldan/
brtson 'grus dang ldan/ mthu dang ldan/ dran pa dang ldan ye shes dang ldan/ phyogs dang g.yog tu ldan zhing tshogs dang mthu thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de ltar bdagacog gas yul thams
cad du 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'thabam dang/ 'gyod nga dang mu ge dang/ nad dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ dus ma lags pa rlung dang/ charapa dang/ grang ba dang/ rmo ba dad 1
char mi 'bab pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ sdong ba dang/ rgyu ba pa dang/ brlang ba dang/ kha ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ rom mchis pa dang/ ma dge ba'i phyogs bgyid pa'i dngos
pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// shin tu bde ba dang/ lo legs ra dad/ nyams dga' ba dang/ nad ma mchis pa dang/ 'dum pa bsgrub par bgyi// rlung dang/ char pa dang/ grang ba/
dang tsho ba rnams dus su 'byung bar bgyi'o// mtshan mo dang/ nyin mo dang/ blu ba dang/ zla ba phyed pa dang/ lo dang dus rnams kyang legasaM par 'byung bar bgyi'o// gza' dang/ rgya skar dang
nyi ma dang/ zla ba rnams kyang legs par rgyu bar bgyi'o// 'bab chu dang/ chu mig dang/ rdzing dang/ lteng ka yang shin tugatam par bgyi'o// gang du sems can rnams chu'i klung gis
0 @#// gnod par 'gyur ba de yang bdag cag gis bsal bar bgyi'o// grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs de dag tu yang sems can la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du
ka bdag cag gas 'dab ma dang/ yal ga dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ sdong bu dang/ 'bru dang/ sman dang/ ro dang/ lo tog rnams shin tu snum pa dang/ bda'akha dang/ kha dog dang/
ro che zhing mang bo bsgrub par bgyi'o// sems can rnams la nor dang/ 'bru dang/ sman dang/ gres dang/ lhab lhub kyis ma sbrel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// sems can de dag kyang dge ba
ts+tso tshol ba'i sems dang/ sdig pa yongs su skong ba dang/ dpal dang/ bsod nams 'byung bas tshorang po 'grub par bgyi'o// grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs
dang yul 'khor dang/ pho brang 'khor gang dag na sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad dam/ than glegs bam la bris te 'chad dram/
maM klog gam/ mchod pa dang/ bsti stang bgyid cing 'chang ba de dag tu rgyal po rgyal rige sbyabanas dbang bskur ba 'byung ba dag kyang bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi//
de dag la gnod pa bsal bar bgyi/ phan pa bsgrub par bgyi'o// ltad mo dang/ bkram rishas pa dang u0f8b/ lta ba ngan pa dang/ byed pa ngan pa dang/ byin gyi rlabs ngan pa dang/ smon lamangan/
00 pa dang/ skyabs ngan pa dang/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ kha gsag dang/ g.yo dang/ skya dang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ phrag dog dang/ khro ba dang/ ser sna thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o//
yang da0/ pa'i lta ba'i lam drang po dang/ dad pa dang/ dul ba dang/ kun sdom pa dang/ ngo tsha ba shes pa dang/ khrel yod pa la gzud par bgyi'o// de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa rnams dang/
btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang/ blon po dang/ rtsis pa chen po dang/ grong rdal pa dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba dang/ ljongs kyi mi rnams dang/ rigs bzhi rnams dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa
dang khye'u dang/ bum rnams kyang bsrung zhing yongs su bskyang nga nga pyab nas/ ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel med pa'i bar la gzud par bgyi// tha na yul de dgachu chung bzhi pa rnams kyang
bsrung bar bgyi'o/ gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba nas/ glegs bam la bris te bzhag pa'i bar du bgyid na/ sems can de dag la bdag cag gis de 'dra ba'i nan tan
chen po dang/ rtul ba chen pos yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos kyi tshul yang dag par bstan pa'i sladadu/ bskal pa mtha' yas par nan twan cher bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de dag thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin pazangs dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shog/ khyed kyis chos kyi tshul dang/ ]
dkon mchog gsum gyi rogs tshanub par nan tan byas na de lta na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par
ka 'gyurar// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las kun tu bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa sa brgya byin
pa dang tshangs pa dang/ 'phags skyes pa dang/ mag mi bzangadang/ yul 'khor srung dang/ lus ngan pa rnams la bka' stsal ra/ bzhin bzangs dag ngas mas can rnams la snying rje ba'i smon

lam gyi nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mu ge byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par ga ngas rgyas te/ sems/
can ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun dang/ g.yon can gyis gtses pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyi'i dus bdud kyi phyogs ni lam nga ra byas/
ngas dam pa'i chos kyis rgyal mtshan ni bsgrengs/ sems can tshad med pa dag ni sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su thar par byas/ dam pa'i chos kyi char ni phab/ngas bdud bye ba ni pham par
byas so// bzhin bzangs dag gang gi phyir daltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
ba/ bgrang ba las 'dus pa dang gtu med pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sa'i bcud dang/ sems can gyi gnas kyi nyes pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ sems can yongs su sman par/
bya ba dang/ mi dge ba'i las thams cad ma lus par zad par bya ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yunaring du gnas par bya panas/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su/
grub par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos chos thams cad kyi lus 'jom pa'i gzungs phyag rgya dang/ rmog rab tudabyeb la 'jug pa lung bstan
pa 'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabasakyis de bzhin du khyed kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la srungs shig/ gang nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par bsrung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas
sod nams ma ngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang/ gang lung 'bog pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ dran pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ bshad ba dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ dge
bsnyen gyi sdom pa gzung ba dang/ tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang/ gang bsam gtanadang po bsgom pa nas/ 'du
shes dang/ tshor ba 'gog pa bsgom pa'i bar dang/ gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du bya ba'i bar gyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang/
gang yang de 'dra ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du khyu ba da lta na byed pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan byed par 'gyur ba nas/ nga'i dam pa'i
ka chos kyi sgron ma 'di 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bsod nams man par 'du ba'i tshogs de thams cad khyed kyi lag tu gtad do// gang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos kyi
'tsha tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par brtson pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang khyed kyi lag tu gtad do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ tha na
glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag grod ngam dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang
dang gang na chos smra ba shin tu khrus byas to/ gos gsar pa bgos nas me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ras bcos bu dang/ ras snatshogs bting/
ba'i seng ge 'i khri la 'dug ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos 'chad dam/ tha na glegs bam la bris te klog pa der/ gal te khyed chos mnyan pa 'am chos skya ba bsrung ba 'am/
ches nyan ba rnams yongs su bskyang ba 'am/ bdag dang/ gzhan dang/ gnyis ka'i mi dge ba'i las yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir ma dong na/ de'i phyir khyed kyis de bsus pa dang/
lam bskyed pa la rmongs pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs bas 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis
pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos kyi skyol gyi bar du nub par gyurab na/ grong dang/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdul lam/ ljongs sam/ ri brags sam/ pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang
ngam dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ bram ze'i khyim man/ tshong dpon gyi khyim mtsha/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/
dge bsnyenanam/ dge bsnyen ra chos smra ba 'am/ gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/ yan lag shin tu byugs nas gos gsar pa 'tshol te
me tog khakram pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams su skyes sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ras khacos bu dang/ ras sna tshogs bting nga ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i seng ge 'i khri la
'dug ste/ lce'i rtse mos gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rang tu 'chadu dam/ bras ti klog pa der chos nyan pa 'am/ chos smra ba de bsrung ba 'am/ chos
nyan pa de dag dang/ bdag dang/ gzhan gnyis ka'i nyon mongs pa'i las yongs su byang ba 'am/ dge ba'i chos yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'am/ chos kyi tshuli chen po yang dag par 'bar
[9] ]/khar bgyi kha 'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba chen po mchog gi lam la 'jug pa'i slad du bdag 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor te/ der ma mchis sam/ grong nas dmangs
sa kyi khyim gyi bar de dag yongs su bskyang ba dang/ sems can de dag ga nor dang/ 'bru dang/ ma dzod dang/ bang ba mang po rab tu gang ba'i slad du/ der ma mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan/
'das thams cad kyi spyan sngarab dag gis sngon ma thos pa'i bro bar ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ ang gu ha/ ang gu ha/ d+hang ga pu ra ta/ na yA mi kha/
kha kha/ kha ba/ khakha/ klonan kha ba sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gal te bdag chos nyan pa 'am/ chos skyab bsrung banas/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ mdzod dang/bad ba mang po rnan
par 'phel bas tshim par bgyi ba'i slad du der ma mchis na/ yi dam las 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas ko'u
shi kas 'di skad gse lato// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa 'dus na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas/ 'di na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi
spyan sngar bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ kha pa sne kha/ a ba smiM kha/ na la g+ha/ a mud raM/ A ma ba nya/
a khad ta/ a kha[· ]u sha kha/ dzin pra kho sAhA/ bcom ldan 'dus gal te bdag gis dam bcas pa bzhin du ma bgyis na/ 'di na bdag gis khro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar
'gyur banas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa'i bar du'o// de nas 'phags skyes pas kyang gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang
ma mchis pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung bar ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba
lags so// 'di lta ste/ u kha na ban po sa ba na/ sa mu dAsang ngad dza ta tha sbyota/ b.ru nakha ba rA dza sAhA/ ma dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pa la legs so zhes
bya kha rab tu byin no// de nas mig mi bzang gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
bsrung bar mabagyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas ba dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste//
bya// rje lo g+ha/ a to ga/ a ma ma mo g+ha/ a ma sA rA dza na tsa bya ya mu dza swAhA/ de nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyisarkyal po chen pa mig ma bzung la legs so zhes bya ba
za rab tu byin no// de nas yang yul 'khor srung gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dusanagrong gibar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung
bar m bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gas bye bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so/ 'di lta ste/ byin du dro kha/ kha ba dza ba ra mu kha/ klu sAr/ pu ka ba
sAmArga ba Ta sAhA/ mdang ma ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung la legs sa zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas lus khan pos kyang 'di skadares gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das da ltare dang ma mchis pa'i dusan/ grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'du bsur bar ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das kyis spyan sngar blo ber ba'i dem bcas pa dang 'ga' bar 'gyur ba lags so// 'di lta ste/ klu dre/ ku ku klu dre/ sa kutre/ sA ste ku tre/ AnA yan kru tre/ hri daklu dwe/ sa gar gyi
sang gu su kru tre/ d+harma klu ya mu dre swAhA/ ma dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po lus ngon bo la legs so zhes bya ba'i bar du byin no// yang de'i tshe glid bzhi pa'i 'jig
nyan gyi khams 'dun gnas pa'i ga[”]gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po stong nyis brgya dang/ gzhan yang gling bzhi la gzhan na gnas ba bzhi khri dang/ gzhan yang lha dang/ klu dang//
gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag thamA cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad cas gsol/
te bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na/ dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'i par dunub par ma gyur pa de'i tshe/ grong ma/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/
ri brags sam/ pho brang 'khor ram/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal pa'i pho brang ngam/ bram ze'i khyim mam[7 ]tshong dpon gyi khyim mam/ bdag nyid chen po'i khyim mam/ dmangs kyi
khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsenum chos smra ba 'am/ bzhan yang dad pa'i rogs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/
yan lag shin tu byugs nas/ gos gsar pa bgos te/ me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/ skyes sna tshogs kyis bdug pa/ ro bro ba snachog
kyis gtams pa brgyan pa'i seng ge 'i khri la mchis te/ gzungs kyi phyagargya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad dam/ glegs ngam
pha @#// la bris te klog par gal te bdag cag re re zhing yang 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas ma mchis sam/ der chos nyan pa dang/ chos skya ba bsrung ba dang///
rang gi 'khor bsrung ba dang/ sems can gzhan yang bsrung ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du 2 gong ngam/ grong rdal nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag
'daM tu ma mchis sam/ 'khor dang bcas pas bka' ma mnos sam/ yongs su ma bskyangs sam/ der sems can rnams kyi nor dang/ 'bru dang/ mdzod dang/ bangabo mad pa
rab tu ma gtam mam/ der ma mchis sam/ der sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ mu ge dang/ nad dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ dus ma lags
pa'i char dang/ rlung dang/ shin tu grang ba dang/ tsha ba rnams ma bzlog na bdag cag gis 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
tsho bslus pa dang/ 'khus pa dang/ ma mnyes par 'gyod par 'gyur te/ lus la sha bkras btab pa dang/ lta ba yodas su nyams pa dang/ lus rul bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag
g.yog dang bcas pas da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar
ba'i bgyi'o chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan par bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'dra la dad pa'i gang zag rnams bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ yongs su smin par bgyi'o//
ngan par bgyis pa'i las yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan par chos smra ba'i gang zag de la bskul bar bgyi'o// chos nyan pa dang/ chos skya ba de dag gi/
nor dang/ 'bru dang/ longs spyod dang/ kun spyod pa rnam par 'phel ba bsgrub par bgyi'o// rgyal ba'i bstan pa mi 'jog pa'i chas su gzung bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas/
bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis ma dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad la legs se zhes bya ba byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ca lags/ gang bdud bye ba phrag brgya po 'dir 'dus pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa la gas sam/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsal la/ rtsa 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis/
dkon mchog gsum l dad pa thob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'du kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi khu deni ma yin no// bdud sdig can g.yog stod yod pa 'di dad pa ma thob ste/
'khrug cing yid ma dga' nas/ da lta dngam 'ongs pa'i dus na yang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ji srid 'bar ba de srid du 'di glags lta zhing skabs tshol te//
dam pa'i chos kyi tshul zhig pa dang nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de bzhin du g.yog khrisum stong yod pa'i bdud bco brgyad dang/ g.yog shu rtsa gcig yod pa nyis brgya pa
de dag kyang g.yog dang bcas par dkon mchog gsum la dadapa ma thob ste/ 'khrugs shing yid mi dga' nas 'di dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang rjesrid du dam pa'i chos kyi tshularab tu

rgyas ba de srid du 'di dag nga'i bstan pa la glags lta zhing skabs tshol te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang/ nub par khya ba'i phyir brtson par byed de// de ci'i phying zhen/ sngonachad khen du
gzung ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang/ mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang/ dge bas skyo zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba mi 'dod pa dang/ smon lam ma btab pa'o
phyir sems dang sems mtshamasam sbyor/ dad par mi byed/ gnas par mi byed/ rad tu gtong bar mi byed do// sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu mthong ba dang/ gzungs zab mo
'di lta bu thos pas rgyu de nyid kyis phyin chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dad pa rab tu med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gal te sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyi rna lam du grags par 'gyur na yang de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag khar rdzogs pa'i

byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshagos nga shin tu ngo mtshar to// yang de'i tsho bdudar bya zhes bya ba ston gyi rgyal ba la lhag par khyab byas kha/
dge ba'i rtsa bo bskyed pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi nyams ba red par gyur ba/ blonu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa de drang srong chen po'i cha byad du
de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas/ de stan las langs te kun tu rab tu bltas nas thal mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas//
sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis bkang ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bdag la dgongs
