dang bdag gi lta bar lhung ba'i bsam pa can rnams kha dog rgyas pa la mngon par chags par byed de/ mngon bar chags nas mos pas sgribs pa'i rnams shin tu 'dod
rtags so// shin tu 'ododachags pa'i rnams 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ mngon par 'du byas nas phyi phyir
shing dar gyi srin bu bzhin du rang gi rnam par rtog bar yongs su dkris pa'i blo can rnams 'gro ba'i skyo mtsho dang dgon par lcang zhing/ blo ba'i 'khrul 'khor bzhin du mi gda' yang
[r/ ]sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyu dang chu zla'i rang bzhin dang 'dra bar bdag dang bdag ga dang bral ba'i chos thams cad yang dag pa ma yin par rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i mtshan nyid
kyi gzhi dang/ mtshan ma dang bral ba/ skye ba dang/ gnas pa drang/ 'jig pa 'jug pa rnam par log pa/ rang gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa las byungakho/ dbang
phyug dang/ dus dang ma phra mo dang/ gtso bo las byung ba ma yin par ni mi shes te/ blo gros chen po ming dang mtshan mas g.yengs pa'i khyer/ byas pa rnams mtshan
ma'i rjes su 'brang ngo// de la blo gros chen po mtshan ma ni mig gi rnam grar shes pa'i snang bar 'gyur pa yin te/ gzugs zhes khya'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang/ sna dang/
lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi rnam brar shes pa rnams la/ sa dang/ dri dang/ rodang/ reg bya dang/ chos zhes bya ste// 'di ni mtshan ma zhes bshad do// de la blo gros
chen po rnam par rtog ban grang gis mang du brjod cing/ 'dinaglang po dang/ rta dang/ shing rta dung/ rkang thang dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med la sngags pa zhes bya ba yin te/
de bzhin yin gyi/ 'din gzhan du ma yin no zhes mtshan ma gsal bar byed pa de ni rnam par rtog pa'o// blo gros chen po yang dad pa'i yishos ni gang gis ming dang mtshan
mam dmigs ngagang/ ban tshun glo bur du byung ba'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa/ rtag pa med pa dang/ chad pa med pa'i phyir/ mu stegs byed dang
zakan smos dung/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyisar lhung bar mi byed pas/ yang dag pa'i ye shes sacu'o// gzhan yang blo gros chen po yang dag pa'i yarashas des/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang dngos por ma byed/ mtshan ma dungos po med par yang mi byed de// sgro 'dogs ba dang/ skur ba'imatha' gnyis su don pa lta
ba rnam par spangs kha/ mde dang mtshan ma'i don mi 'jug par shis pa de lta bu nar bzhin nyid yin par bshad de// blo gros chen po de bzhin nyid la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni snang ba mad pa'i rtogs pa'i spyod yul thob pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i sarab tu dga' ba thob pa des byang chub sems da pa'i u0f7asa rab
tu da ga ra ba thob nas/ mu stegs can dang/ ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad las rnam par log la yin te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rtogs kho la yang dag par zhugs
ba rtog ge'i lta ga la ltad mo dang rnam khar bral bsamtshan nyid la ra dris pa'i phyir sgra mal sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i chos kyi tshul rnam par sgom zhing/ mar gyis bdag gis
bka/ 'phags pa sa se lung gis rig pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi ches kyi snyan gyi sa'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// chos kyi sngon kyi sa'i 'og tu ting nge 'dzin dang/ skyobs dang/ dbang
dang man pa shes pa'i ma trel shin tu rgyas pa de bzhin gshegs ba'i sa'i bar du rab tu tholaM par 'gyur ro// des klob nas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/
sprul pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs kyis rnam bad mdzes to/ chu'i zla ba bzhin du thug pa med par gnas shin tu 'bral ba'i chos can/ mos pa tha dad pa'i sems can rnams la
chos ston te/ blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin nyid la zhugs pa'i phyir/ yid dang/ rnam par roge ba dang bral ba'i lus
de'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ blo gros chen pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gsum po rnams ches lnga'i nang du 'dus sam/ 'on te rang gi mtshan nyid du grub pa
'am/ nu lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros chen po 'di nyid kyi nang du rang bzhin gsum dang/ rnam par shes pa brgyad dang/ bdag med pa gtes kyang
'dus so/ de la ming dang mtshan ma ni kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o// gang yang blo gros chen po de la gnas shing zhugs pa'i rnam par rtog pa sems dang//
tsa[q ]/sems las byung ba zhes bsgrags pa/ki la dung 'od zer lhan cig tu/ dus gcig tu 'byung ba sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid/ rang gi rnam par rtog ba khong duchud par bya ba'i rang bzhin ni/
bablo gros chen po gzhan gyi dbang zhig bya'o// blo gros chen po yang dag pa'i yang shos dang/ de bzhin nyid ni mo'ajig pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin yongs su grub par shes par bya//
gzhan lang blo gros chen po rang gi sems snang ba la mngon par chags pas rtogs pa brgyad du phye ste/ mtshan ma dang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid la kun brtags pa'i phyir
bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa gnyis rnam par zhig khas/ bdag med kho gnyis skye'o// blo gros chen po chos lnga po 'di rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang/
( sa rnam par dbye ba'i mtshams sbyar ba dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdag gi 'phags pa so
sa rang gi rig pa'i ye shes rtogs pa la 'jug pa rnams kyang 'dus so// gzhan yang blo gros chen pa chos lnga rnams ni mtshan ma dang/ mang dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang/
de bzhin nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i rigs shes te/ blo grosachen po de la mtshan ma ni/ gang gi dbyibs dang/ rnam pa dang/ khyad par dang/ byad dang/ gzugs la sogs pa'i
ca mtshan nyid du snang ba de mtshan mgo/ gang mtshan ma de nyid la rje ma la sogs par ming btags te/ 'di ni de bzhin kyi/ gzhan gyi gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni ming ngo//
blo gros na khe gang gis bde ba zhe 'am/ go cha zhes ming de brjod cing/ mtshan ma gsal bar byed pa/ sems dang sems las byung bar khasgrags pad ni rnam bar rtog pa'o//
chos de dag phan tshun du myong ba med cing/ kun brtags pa'i ng ma yin pa'i phyir/ gang blo rab tu zhig pa'i bar du ming dang mtshan ma shin tu mi dmogs pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid de kho
na nyid yang dag la ngas pa mthar thug pa/ rang bzhin dang/ ngo bo nyid dang/ ma dmigs pa de bzhin nyid kyimtshan nyid du nga dang de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag gis kyang thugs
suchud de/ ji lta ba bzhin du bshad do// btags so// bkrol lo// gsal bar byas so// gang gis khong du chud cing yang dag par rtogs pa dang/ gang chad pa med nga
dang/ rtag pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtogra la mi 'jug pa bdag gi 'phags pa so so rang gi ye shes dang 'thun pa pha rol kyi phyogs mu stegs byedudang/ nyan thos dang/ rang
sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa de ni yang dag pa'iye shes ti/ blo gros chen po de dag ni chos rnam pa lngago/ 'di dag nyid kyi nang du rang bzhin gsum dang/ rnam par shes
ba brgyad dang/ bdagamed bra gnyis dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang 'dus te/ blo grosachen po de la khyed kyis rang gi blo la mkhas par bya'o// gzhan
yang byed du gzhugatsang gzhan gyi drang la 'jog par mi bya'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshes lnga drag dang rang bzhin dang// rnam shes brgyud bo nyid kyang drang// bdag med rnam pa gnyis
por ni// theg chen thamasacad 'dus pa yin// mang dang mtshan ma kun rtog pa// rang bzhin gnyis kyi mtshan nyid de// yang dag shes de bzhin nyid// yongs su grub
pa'i mtshan nyid do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'dus la/ byang chub sags dba' sems dpa' chen pa blo gros chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// gang 'di skad ces
bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa brjod pa las/ de khazhan gshegs pa 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar bya ni gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma snyed do zhes gsungasan/ bcom ldan 'das 'dil
sgra ji bzhin gyi don du gzung bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te don gyi bye brag gzhan zhag mchas sam/ ca lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bka' stsal du gsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa// blo gros chen po sgra ji bzhin gyi don du gzung bar mi bya ste/ blo gros chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i tshod kyis ni dus gsum gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi tshod du'ang ma 'gyur te/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ blo gros chen pa 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten kyi phul las 'das pa dang 'dra ba dag dang/ ma 'dra ba'i phyir dpe ni dpe ma yin no// blo gros chen pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
drug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jig rgan gyi ngal las 'das pa dang 'dra bas/ mi 'dra ba'i dpem ston no// blo grosachen po gzhan du rtag pa dang/ mi rtag pa la mngon par
zhes pa'ibyis pa so so'i skye de mu stegs byed kyi lta ba ngan pas brlab pa// 'khor ba srid pa'i 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnams skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ ji ltar 'di dag srid pa'i 'gro
bu'i 'khor le/ma da ba de la skyo bar gyur te/ khyad par 'dod pas khyad par du rtsom par 'gyur zhing/ sangs rgyas 'thob par sla bar bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
skye ba na u dum wa ra'i me tog lta bu yin no/ zhes kha rtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa mang drag ba ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsA'i klung
go lci ma sId ces bya ba 'di ni da pa tsam du bzhag pa 'o// bstan pa brjod pa las ngas 'dul ba'i skye ba rnams la bltasanas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung ba ni u dum
wa ra'i me tog bzhin durd par dka' 'o zhes bshad med kyi/ blo gros chen po u dum wa ra'i me tog ni sngon sus kyang ma mthong zhing mthong bar mi 'gyur na/ blo gros tshan
bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du mthong zhing da ltar yod snang// rang gi tshul so sor gzhug pa'i gtam gyi dbang du bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa
sa rnams 'byung ba ni/ u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin red khar dka' 'ozhes ni ma bshad do/ blo gros chen po rang gi tshul so sor gzhag ba'igatam bshad na/ 'jig rten gyi yul
las 'das pa'i dpe rigs pa rnams mi bya ste/ yid ches par mi rung bas na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dad par ma 'gyur ro// de khon nyid ni sems dang/ yare dang/
yid kyi rnam par shes pa las 'das pa'i ni/ bdagakra 'phags ba so so rang gi ye shes kyi spyod yul lan dpe rnams mi 'jug go/ de kho na byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
yin te/ de'i phyir nu de dgra dpe rnams gzhag par mi bya med kyi/ blo gros chen po 'on kyang 'din dpe tsam du byas la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang+gA'i klung
ba bya ma drang mdam skye// mi rtog pa rnam par mi rtog pas na mnyam zhing ma mnyam pa med de// blo gros chen pa 'di lta ste/ dper na gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma rnams zhwa dang/ rus sbel dang/
chu srin byis pa gsod pa dang/ mi dang/ ma te dang/ seng ge dang/ glang po dang/ rta la sogs pas dkrugs kyang dkrugs so zhe 'am/[”]ma dokrugs so zhis mi rtog/ rnam bar/
xxx
gi 'phags pa so so rang gi ye shes ni gang+gA'i klung gi stobs dang/ dbang dang/ mdon par shes pa'i khyu ma rnams ni byas pa mu stegs byed pha rol rgol ba'i 'u thams cad kyis dkrugs
kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon smon lamakhatab pa'i phyir/ ma rtog/ rnam par mi rtogaste/ bde ba'i sems par 'jugakha thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas sems
can rnams la ma rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go/ de bas na de bzhin gshag sa pa de dag ni rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba med pa'i phyir gang+gA'i klung gi khyim dang mnyam ste/
bya brag med do// 'di lta ste/ blo gros chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnams n sa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ bskal pa tshig khan/ son bsregs kyang sa'i rang
bzhin mi 'dor ro// blo gros chen po ma'i khams dang 'brel ba'i phyir sa ni ma tshig ste/ gzhan du ni byis khra so so'i skye bo rnams log par lhung ba'i zlos chag mar rtog med kyi
dan mi'i rgyu las byung ba'i ma tshig go/ de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku'ang gad+d+ho'i klung gi bye ma dang maMnyam ste/ mi 'jig go/ 'di
sa @#// lta ste/ blo gros chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnams ni tshad med de/ de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer snang ba tshad me
des nga dang sems can yongs su smin par bskul ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mthud de// 'di lta ste/
blo gros chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnams rang bzhin gzhan du mi rtsom ste/ bya ma rnams ni bye ma'i gnas nyid do// de bzhin du blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni grod pa thams cad du 'jug pa'i chad pa yin pas na/ 'khor bar 'jug pa'i ng med/ ltog kha'adra medado// 'di lta ste/ blo gros chen
pe de gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma rnams ni phra'ad mngon pa med/ bsnan kyang mngon pa med do// de bzhin du blo gros chen po chos la lus med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshags pa'i ye shes
kyang sems can yongs su sman pa bya ba'i sbyor bar mi zad/ ma 'phel lo// blo gros chen pa tshos nalus medadre/ lus dang ldan pa lani'ajig pa yod kyi lus dang cha ldan pa la
ni ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ blo gros chen po gda'i klung gi bye ma rnams ni mar dang 'bru mar 'dod pas rab tukhatsang mang/ mar dang 'bru mar med pa de bzhinadu/ blo gros chen po
d+ha7 de bzhin gshegs pa rnams na sems can gyi sdug bsngal dag gis rab tu gzir kyang/ srid rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can thams
cad mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du du chos kyi dbyings kyi rang gi dadra gi smon lam gyi bde ba mi 'dor ro// 'di lta ste/ blo gros chen po gang+gA'i klung gi khyim rnams ni/ 'bab pa'i
rgyun du 'thun par 'bab ste/ chu med par ni ma yin no// de bzhin du blo gros chen pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa thams cad kyang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i
'bab pa'irgyun du mthun par 'jug ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gda'i klung gi bya ma dang mnyam zhes bya'o// blo gros chen po 'gro ba'i don 'di ni de bzhin gshegrwa
pa rnams la mi 'jig go/ blo gros tshan po 'jig ba ni 'gro ba'i don yin te/ blo gros chen po 'khor ba'i thog ma'i mtha' shes pa'i ng med de/ marashes na ji ltar 'gro ba'i
don du bshad/ blo gros chen pa 'gro ba'i don ni chad pa yin na/ byas pa so sa'i skye bo rnams kyis ni rab tu mi shes so// blo gros chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
nga gal te sems can rnams 'khor ba'i thog ma'i mtha' shes pa'i ng med na de ji ltar srolo chags rnams thar par shes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ blo gros chen po rang
drug sems snang ba'i phyi rol gyi don yongs su shes pas thog ma med pa'i dus kyi sbos pa gnas ngan len rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu rnam par ldog cung
gnas shin tu gyur pa ni thar ba yin te/ blo gros chen po 'jig pa ni ma yin no//de bas na blo gros chen po mtha' med pa'i gtamanicir yang dgos ba ma yin ni// blo gros chen po
mtha 'amed pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par rtoka ba'i rnam grangs te/ 'di la blo gros chen po yongs su brtags na/ rnam par rtog kha las phyi 'amanang gi sems gzhan gang yang
med do// blo gros chen po chos thams cad ni shes pa dang/ shes bar bya ba'i dben pa yin te/ gzhan du na rang gi sems snang ba'i rnam par rtog kha yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir/
rnam par rtog kha 'jug ste/ de khong du ma chudabs ldog par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang gis ka'i bye mnyam du/ 'jig medAtshul gyi mthar thug khar// 'dren
pa rab tu mthong bani// de dag 'dren pa mthong ba'o// gang+gA'i bya ma ji bzhin du// shes pa thams cad rnam spangs te// 'bab phyogs 'thun zhing rtag pa ltar// de bzhin sangs
rgyas sangs rgyas nyid// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos 'di skad ces pa/ sol to// bcom ldan 'das
[4 ]bde bar gshegs pas chos thams cad skad cig tu 'gyur bas 'khrig pa bdag la bshad du gsel/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag/
kha bgrad du ra sel/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nuchos thams cad skad cig tu lag sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ blo gros chen po de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la
zung zhig dang/ ngas khyod la bshad do// legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la
slar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros chen po chos thams cad ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/
'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ khan ma blo ba dang bcas pa dang/ kha na ma tho ba med pa dang/ zag pa dang bcas
pa dang/ brag pa med pa dang/ zin pa dang ma zin pa rnams yin te/ blo gros chen po mdoran len pa'i phung polnga sems dang/ yid dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
bag chags kyi rgyu las byung ba rnams ni sems dang/ yid dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes ba'i bag chags rgyas pa'i phyir/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyis dge ba dang mi dge khar
yongs su brtags so// blo gros chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi badre ba dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'i dngos pos 'phar
ba rnams kyi dge kha'i brag pa med pa zhes bya'o// blo gros chen po dge ba dang mi dge ba ni 'di lta ste/ rnam par shis pa brgyad rnams so/ brgyud gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sAde po kun la zhu rnam bar shes pa zhes bsgrags pa dang/ bde dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ mu stegs can gyis brjod pa'i rnam par shes pa
'dus pa lnga rnams so// blo gros chen po de la rnam par shes pa 'dus pa lnga rnams yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang kha cas pa/ dag ba drang mo dge ba'i skad cig ma gcig nas gcig du dbye
bas tha dad du gyur pa/ rgyud kyi rgyun gyis lus grwa mi dad par 'byung ba 'byung ngo// byung nas kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro// rang gi sems snang ba ma rtogs pa'i de/ 'gagra ma
thug tu rnam par shes pa gzhan 'byung ste/ dbyibs byad kyi bye brag 'dzin pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus pa ldadang ldan khar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ skad cig gi dus su mi gnas
pa dani ska da cig pa'o zhas das bshadeto// blo gros chen po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i da le zhes bsgrags pa/ yid dang lhan cige laskad cig khani/ 'jug pa'i
rnam par shes pa'i bag chags kyis skad cig pa yin te/ zag pa med pa'i bag chags kyis na skad cig ma ma yin no// byis ba so so'i skye bo skad cig mar smra ba la chags pa rnams kyisan
chos thams cad kyi skad cig pa dang/ skad cig pa ma yin pa 'dramo rtogs so// de ma rtogs pa'i phyir chad par lta bas 'dus ma byas pa'i chos rnams kyang 'phrog par byed do// blo gros chen
po rnam par shes pa 'dus pa lha rnams ni/ 'khor ba'ang ma yin/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal spyod pa'i ng ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu yang ma yin no// blo gros chen po de
bzhin gshegs ba'i snying po ni 'di ba dang/ sdug bsngal gyi myong ba'i rgyu dang bcas la/ bag chags bzhi dang ldan pas 'jug cing ldog ste/ byas l skadatsog par lta ba'i rnam par rtog pas
bsgos pa'i blo can dag gis ni mo rtogs so// blo gros chen po gzhon yang gsar dang/ rdo rje dang/ rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dang/ thob pa dang/ khyad par drug ni ma 'jig pa yin to/
blo gros chen po gal te mngon par rtogs pa 'grub pa skadag ma yin na ni/ 'phags pa rnams 'phags bam yin par 'gyur// 'phags pa rnams ni 'phags pa ma yin par mi
'gyur ro// blo gros chen po gsar dang rdo rjen bskal par bzhag kyang de bzhin du 'dug ste/ ma 'bri/ ma skyen/ byis pa ldem po ngag tu bshad pa la mi mkhas pa dag gis phyi nang
gachos thams cad skad cig ma'i don du ji ltar brtag/ yang blo gros chen pos gsol ba/ gang yad bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/pha rol tu phyin pa
[D] drug yodas su rdzogs par byas nas/ sangs rgyas thebakhar 'gyur ro zhes khaka' stsal to// pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gang lags/ jaltar na yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur//
zlobcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa blo gros chen po pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya brag n 'di gsum skye/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las
sgyu 'das pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog go/ blo gros chen po de la 'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pani/ bdag dang/ bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon bar chags shing zhen nas
zla mtha' gnyis su 'dzin pa srid par skye ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi phyir/ gzugs la sogs pa'i yul 'dod pa dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de
khazhin du blo gros tshan po byis pa rnams tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus drang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs bar byed de/
chongs par skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa dag kyang mngon bar sgrub bo// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ba rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis na/ byis pa rnams bdag bde ba mya ngan
las 'das pa 'ded pa bzhinadu/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams mya ngan las 'das bar 'dzin par lhung ba'i bsam ba can rnams sbyin pa la sogs pa la rab tu sbyor ba'o//
gros chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchoga rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor dam pa la rnal 'byor ba rnams rang gi sems snang ba tsam du 'dzin pa dang/
rang gi sems gnyis gnyis su rtog pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa ma 'jug pa dang/ len pa la 'dzin med pa dang/ rang gi sems dang/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par chags pas/
sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang dmigs pa de nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i na 'jug par bsgom pa de ni tshul
khrams te/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ng de'o// gang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yongs su shes pas rnam par rtog pa de nyid mi 'jug par bzod pa de ni/ brjod pa'i snga rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson
'grus gang gis nam gyi cha stod dang/ nam gyi cha smad la brtson par byed cing/ rnal 'byor dang 'thunapar mthong bas/ rnam par rtog pa ldog pa'i phyir/ don brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'o// gang rnam par rtog ba bzlog pa'i phyir/ mu stegs can gyi mya ngan las 'das par 'dzin par mi ltung ba de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
mtha @#/ de la shes rab kyi kha rol tu phyin pa ni/ rnamarang gi sems kyi rnam par rtog ba med dang/ blo rab tu 'byed pa'i bar du rab tu phyin na/ mtha' gnyis su/
[Di ]ma lhung zhing/ gnas 'gyur ba sngon du 'gro ba ma dmigs pas/ bdag gis 'phags ba so sor nga gis rig pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ rab tu sbyor ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o
blo grosaMchen po de dag ni pha rol tukhyen pa rnams yin te/ 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to// de 'di skad ces bya ste// stong pa mi rtag skad cig par// 'dus byas la na byis pa rtog//
'khab chu me mar sa bon dpes/ skad cig pa yi don du rtog/ byed kha mad cing skadacig pa/ dpen pa byed ba yangs ba dang/ chos rnams skye ba med pa dang/ skad cig don du ngas bshad do//
skyes ma thag tu 'jag par ni// byis pa rnams la'ang nga ma 'chad// dngos po rnams kyi rnam rtog pa// bar chad med par 'gro bar g.yago/ sems de 'byung bar khyed kha gro/ rgyu ni ma rig
de yin te// rjesrod gzugs dag mi she sa ra// de srid bar du de nas tsa/ zhig par gyur ma thag tu ni// sems ni gzhan rnams rab 'byung// gzugs ni dus su ma gnas na//
la dmigs te 'byung bar 'gyur// gang sa gang du 'jug pa yi// sems ni log pa'i rgyu las byung// de ni re ba tu ma chub na// ji ltar skad cig 'jig par rig/ rnal 'byor can gyi
[n ]snyoms 'jug dang// gser dang rgyal ba'i rang bsrel dang// 'od snang gnas kyi gzhal med khang// khajig rten rgyu yis 'jig pa med// gnas pa rnams dang thob pa'i chos// sangs
rgyas ye shes phun sum tshogs// dge slong nyid dang shes thub rnams// skad cag mar ni ji ltar mthong// sgyu ma driza'i grong la sogs// gzugs rnams ji ltar skad cig la// 'byung ba
ma yin gzugs rnams dang/ 'byung bo de dag gang du song// skad cig ma'i le'u ste drug pa'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' semar/
dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dgra bcom pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba dang/ sems can
yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can rnams de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bar yang lung bstan// de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu mngon
par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gang gi nub ma yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yig gcig kyang ma gsung/ sbru ma bshad/ de bzhin gshegs pa
ni mnyam par bzhag pa lags twaM/ ma rtog mi spyod par 'phrul pa dag kyang sprul nas/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba mdzad/ rnam par shes pa rnams kyang skad cig ma gcig
nas gcig tu tha pa'i mtshan nyid du bshad/ lagan rdo rje'ang khor mor rtag tu zham ring du 'brang ba thog ma'i mthar mi 'dogs la/ mya ngan las 'das par 'dogs
'badud dang bdud kyi las rnams dud/ las kyi rgyud rnams dang/ bram ze'i tsan tsa dang/ ma nges pa kun tu rgyu dang/ lhung bzed bkrus bzhin pa la segs pa las kyi sgrib pa dag
gda' na/ bcom ldan 'dras de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis nongs pa dag ma sbyangs par rnam kha thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
blo gros chen pa de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ ngas khyod la bshad do// legs so bcom ldan 'das zhas gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po blo gros chen po sa d+hacom ldan 'das la slar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phung pa'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
'das pa'i dbyings la 'ang dgongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad ba rnams kyang rab tu spro bar bya ba'i phyir te/ blo gros chen po sa dus rgyas kyi zhing 'di dang gzhan dag na/
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa rnams gang dag nyan thos kyi thag bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'dod pa yod// de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa las bzlog par bya ba dang//
theg pa chen kho la rab tu spro bar bya ba'i phyir/ sprul pa'i kun thos rnams la sprul pa'i sku dag gis lung bstan gyi/ chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni ma yin no// blo gros chen po de
la dgongs nas nyan thos lung 'astan to// blo gros chen po rnam par grol bar gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams nyon mongs pa'i sgrub paspangs bani/ bye brag med mod kyi/
shes bya'i sgrib pa sadas pan ma yazhino// blo gros chen pa shes bya'i sgrib pa ni chos la bdag med pa mthong ba'i bye brag gis rnam par dag par 'gyur go/ nyon mongs pa'i sgo ba pa ni gang
zag la bdag med ba mthong ba'i bye brag gis rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i sgrub pa na yid kyi rnam par shes pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ gang zag la bdag med pa mthong ba la sgrom
ba sngon du 'gro bas sbyongs bar 'gyur/chos kyi sgrib pa rnam par grol ba de na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i khag chugs bzlog pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// sngon gyi
chos kyis lugs la dgongs te sngon dang phyis med pa mi 'byung ba'i phyir/ sngon bshad pa'i yi ga de dag nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtog mi dpyod bar chos 'chad de/ mkhyen bzhin tu
mdzad pa dang/ dran pa nyams pa med pa dang/ bag chags kyi gzhi sangs pa dang/ shi 'phos nyid dang bral ba dang/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang/ shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis kyang
ba ba'i phyir mi rtag ma dpyad do// blo gros chen po yid dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes ba dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bdun rnams ni dge ba zag pa med
[+ ]pa'i phyogs dang brel ba ma 'khor ba yin te/ bag chags kyi rgyu las byung ba'i phyir skad cig ma'o// blo gros chen po da bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pon 'khor zhing mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ bde

ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i rgyu yin te/ byas pa so so'i skye ba stong pa nyid kyis g.yengs pa'i blo can dag ni rnam par dag pa nyid mi shes sa/ blo gros chen pa lag na rdo rjen 'phrul pas sbrul pa'i bzhin
ra gshegs pa rnams kyi drung na 'dug gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngo bo rnams kyi drung na ni ma yin no// blo grosachen po de bzhin gshegos pa ngo bo ni/
byis ba so so'i skye bo dang/ nyan thos dang/ rad sangs rgyas dang/ mu stegs can thams cad kyi tshad ma dang/ dbang po las rnam par log pa yon tA/ tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa dag mngon
par rtogs pa'i chos shes pa'i bzod pas rtogs par byed de/ de bas na lag na rdo rje de'i zhabs 'bring na mi 'bring ngo// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni las las byung ba ma yin te/ de dag la'ang
de bzhin gshegs pa med/ de dag las gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa med de/ rdza mkhan gyi dmigs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba lta bu s bya ba thams cad byed cing/ mtshan ma dang ldan par yod
00 skyon med kyi/ rang gi tshul so sor gzhag pa'i gtam bdag gi 'phags ba sogs rang gis rig pa'i spyod yulan mi ston to// blo gros chen po gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni rnam par
shes pa 'dus te drug 'gags pas chad par lta ba larten to// kun gzhi ma brtags pa'i phyir rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro// blo gros chen po rang gi blo'i rnam par rtog pa'i thog ma'i mtha'
shes par mi rung ste/ rang gi blo rnam par rtog pa nyid bzlog pas thar par yang shes so// bag chags kyi gzhi sbyangs pa'i phyir nyes pa thams cad spangs bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad
ces bya ste/ theg pa gsum dang theg pa med// sadas rgyas mya ngan 'das med dang// thams cad sangs rgyas lung bstanacing/ gzhas ba dang yang khra la bshad dang/ mgo la
rtog sa mtha'i ye shes dang/ de bzhin len med rtogs pa dag zhum pa'i rnams kyang spro ba'i phyir// de dag dgongs te brashad pa'o// sangs rgyas dag gi yingashes skyed// de dag
nyid kyis lam yang bshad// gzhan ya ngam yin de nas 'gro// de phyir mya ngan de mi 'du'// srid pa 'dod gzugs lta rnams kyi/ khag chags rnam babazhir 'gyur te// 'dakyi
rnam par shes les 'byung// kun gzhi dang ni yang la gnas// yid kyi rnam shes yid la sogs// mi rtag phyir na chad pa ste// thog ma med pas rtag pa dang// mya na
ma @#// 'da' mos lta bar 'gyur// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa blo gros chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad
pa rnams kyis zhusanas/ nang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab la/ gang gis ma 'ongs pa drang da ltar byung ba'i dusan/ ba dag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
ts+tsha chen po gzhan rnams kyis sems can sha zan la so gas pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa/ sha za ba'i bras la chags pa'i sems n+dan rnams kyi rol srid pa spyod pa'i slad du/ ci nas kyang
sems can de dag gi ri'i sred pa bas la te/ chos kyar zas la mos pas sems can thams cad la bu gcig lta bur sdug pa dang ldan zhing phan tshun du byams pa 'thob pa dang/ thob nas kyang
byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams su byung bar byed de/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar dal bas
ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa sman med pa 'thob par 'gyur kha'i chos bshad par sha za ba nyes par khalta ba/ bcom ldan 'dras du ba zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
ba'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la bshad du gsal/ bcom ldan 'das mu stegs can gzhan ngan par bshad pa'i chos can 'jig rten rgyang 'phen gyi lta ba la mngon par zhen pa yod pa dang/
0 med pa'i phyogs dang/ rtag ba dang chad par smra ba rnams kyis kyang sha'atshol ba bkag ste// bdag kyang ma 'tshol na/ 'jig rten gyi mgon kho khyod kyi bstan pa thugs rjesa'od cig tu gyur
la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la/ rang ngasha 'tshal ba dang/ 'tshal ba mi bzlog blta cis 'byung/ cinas kyang bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po gzhan rnams kyis sems can rnams la de bzhin nyid du chos bstan par bgyi ba de bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba thams cad du bu ga cig dang mthun par gzigs pa/
thugs rjechen po can gyis thugs brtsi ba'i slad du/ ga 'chol kha'i nongs pa legs par bshad du gsol/ bam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros chen po de'i phyed shin tu legs par
kon la yid la zung zhig dang/ ngas khyod la bshad do// legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes gsalanas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la
'i nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sang brtsa ba'i bdag nyid can gyis rgyu med med pa'i phyir/ sha thams
cad bza' bar mi bya ste/ dadag las phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o// 'ad blo gros chen po srogachags yun ring po nas 'khor kha'i rnams la/ gang patshong/ ma'am/ stun nam/
sring mo 'am/ bu 'am/ bu mo 'am/ gnyen bshes sam/ gnyen nam/ gnyen lta bu gang yang rung bar ma gyur pa'i sems can de nad par sla ba'i rnam pa/
sa gang yang med do/ gnyen dang gnyen la khur gyur pa de dag tshe gzhan du lus kharjes pa'i ri dgas dang/ phyugs dang/ khya'i skye gnas gang yang rung bar gyural/ byang chub sems dpa'
ts+tsha sems dpa' na po sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa 'byung bo rnams cad bdam dang 'dra bar gyur par 'dod bas/ skye ba srog chags su gyur pa thams cad las byung ba sha ji skad du
khoza' khar du/ blo gros chen po srin po rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs ba rnams kyi chos nyid bzung pa 'di thos nas/ sha za kha las rnam par ldog cing/ srin po'i rang bzhin dang
bral nas/ song rdzican du gyuran 1 chos 'dod pa'i skye bo rnams la lta ci smos/ de ltar na blo gros chen po tshar bas 'phos pa de dang de dag tu sems can thams cad gnyen bshes dang/
gnyen du gyur pa 'i 'du shes kyis sems can thams cad la bu gcig gi 'du shes su bsgom pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying brtse ba'i bdag nyid can gyis sha skams cad mo
khaza' 'o// blo gros chen po sbyong ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas nisha bzar mi rung ba dang/ 'khrul pa'i phyir yang sha thamasacad ma khe za' ste/ blo gros chen po bong bu dang/
rngamo dang/ khyi dang/ glang dang/ mi 'i sha la sogs pa na 'jig rten gyis bza' ba ma yanan/ 'di ltar shan pa dag rin gyi phyir bzar rung ngo zhes zer zhing/ srang gi dbus dag tu
'tshong bar byed pa de'i phyir yang/ blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpas sha thams cad ma bza' 'o// blo gros chen po gtsang bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ gang byang chub sems
dbal sha ni lu chu dang/ khrag las byung ba'i phyir sha ma bza' ko/ 'byung bo rnams dngang bar byed pa'i phyir yang/ blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' byams ba 'dod
pa rnal 'byor can gyis sha thoms cad bza' khar ma khya'o// 'di lta ste/ blo gros chen pa sme sha can dang/ gdol pa dang/ na pa la sogs bcu sha zla ba'i sems can rnams ni
rgyang mnas mthong yang/ khyi rnams 'jigs pas gzugs te/ lal ni bdagacag kyang gsad du 'ong ngo zhes sha la thug par 'gyur/de bzhin du blo gros chen po nam
mkha' dang/ sa dang/ chu la gnas pa'i 'gro ba shin tu phra ba gzhan yod pa de dag kyang shazu ba rnams rgyang ma nas mthong ma thag tu/ sna'i dbang po rnon pos dri tshoranas/ srin po
las ma dga myur dubyol babazhin te/ lal nishare dogs par yang 'gyur ro// blo gros chen po de'i phyir dngang bar 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la gnas pas shamo
bza' 'o// blo gros chen po 'phags pa ma yin ba'i skye bos bsnyadatsang/ dri ma zhim la mi snyan par byed pa dang/ 'phags pa'i skye bas rnam par sangs pa'i
phyir yang byang chub sems dbas sham bza' 'o// blo gros chen po 'thags pa'i skye bo ni drang srong gi zas za ste/ khrag dang sha mi za bas de'i phyir da/ byang chub sems dang sa sha mi
bza' 'o// blo gros chen pa skye bo mang po'i sems rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir bstan pa la skur pa spang bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis sha mi bza' gro/
'di lta ste/ blo gros chen po 'jigartenakhastan pa la skur par smra ba dag yod de/ kyi ma 'di dag gi dag sbyong nyid ni co yod/ 'di dag gi tshangs par 'jug pa'i ng ga la yod/ de ltar 'di
dag ni sngon gyi drang srong gi bras por nas/ sha zan ba zhon du sha' zas kyis lto gang zhing nam mkha' dang dos dang/ chu la gnas pa'i 'gro ba phra mo skrag par byed pa rnams 'jig rten 'di/
dag kun tu rgyu'o// 'di dag gi dge sbyong nyid ni nyams so// 'di dag gi sdig pa spangs pa nyid na zhig go/ 'di dag la na tshos kyang med/ 'dul ba'ang med do zhes da ltar sdang ba'i
ba ma sa 'amang ba rnams rnam pa dums bstan pa la skur to// de'i phyir blo gros chen po skye bo mang pa'i sems rjes su bsrung nga 'i phyir/ bstan pa la skur pa spang bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems
da pa'i snang brtse ba'i bdag nyid can gyis sha zla mas cad mi bza' 'o// blo gros chen po shi ba'i ro dri ma zhim zhing ma 'phrod pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir lad byang chub sems dpas bsha ma bza' 'o/
blo gros chen po ma sha ba'isha bsreg pa dang dem yin pa'i srog chags gzhan gyi sha bsregs par yang dri'i khyad par gang yang med de/ sha de gnyis ka'ang dra mi zhim par mtshungs so//
de'i phyir yang blo gros chen po rnal 'byor can gtsang bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa sha thams cad mi bza' 'o// blo gros chen po dur khrod pa rnams dang/ dgon pa nags 'dab mi ma
yin bar rgyu ba bas mtha'i mal stanal gnas pa'i rnal 'byoral spyod pa/ byams pa la gnas pa rnams dang/ rig sngags 'chang ba'ig sngags bsgrub par 'dod pa rnams kyi rig sngags
sgrub pa dang/ thor pa la gegs byas phyir theg pa chen por zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi rnal 'byor bsgrub pa thams cad bar chad byed par 'gyur ba rjes su
mthong nas/ bdag dang gzhan gyi lus la phan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas shuthams cad mi bza'a'o// gzugs la dmigs pa rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis chags pa skyed pa'i
phyir yang 'byung po thams cad bdag tu gyur pa/ snying brtse ba'i bdag nyid can gyi byang chub sems dpas sha thams cad mi bza'a'o// blo gros chen po de la lha rnams kyang stong ba'i phyir//
// byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i badrag nyid can gyis sha thams cad mi bza' 'o// blo gros chen po che 'di nyid la'ang de'i kha pishin tu mi zhim par 'gyur nga 'a phyi'i nga
chub sems dpas sha thams cad ma bza'a'o// sdug bsngal zhing nyal ba dang/ sdug/ bsngal zhing sad pa dang/ sdig pa'i rma lam smugayo bar byed pa mthong ba dung/ khyim stong pa na 'dug
cing gcig pu dben bar gnas pa'i tshe'ang de la mdangs 'phrog ba dang/ bar bar sdang ba dang/ glo bur du 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur ba dang/ zas kyi tshod mi shes te/ zas pa dang/
'thungs pa dang/ 'chos pa dang/ myangs pa'i bcud legs par 'ju ba'i 'tshag tu mi 'gyur ba dang/ lta srin bu skyed pa dang/ mdzemadaba'i gzhir 'gyur pa dang/ nad mang bar byed pa yin/
zla ma 'phrod pa'i 'dushes kyang mi thob ste/ das kha zas ni bu'i sha dang sman bzhin du bshad la/ blo gros chen po 'phags ba ma yan nga 'i skye bo bstan pa/ 'phags pa'i skye bas rnam par
sbyangs pa/ nas pa du ma tho ba dang khyad pa/ yon tan du mas rnam par spangs pa/ drang song ma yin pa'ikhrus ma bsod pa/ mi rung ba'i zas sha dang khrag rnams de ji ltar slob ma rnams la
gnang bar bya/ blo gros chen po ngas ni 'phags pa'i skye ba thams cad kyis bsnyen pa// 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bos rnam par sangs ra/ yon tan mad po thob par byed pa/ nyes pa ma dbo
rnam par dmangs ba/ sngon gyi drang slar gi zas ba sod pa/ 'bras dang/ nas dang/ gro dang/ sranam sde 'u dang/ bal sran dang/ sran chung la sogs pa dang/ mar dang/ 'bru mar dang/
sbrang rtsi dang/ hrags dang/ bu ram dang/ khan da dang/ shA ka ra la sogs ra'i zas rnams 'ongs shing brtag pa na zhes gnang na/ blo gros chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skyes bu skrun pa
'dul ba la rnam par rtog pa mang por smra ba/ sha zan gyi rigs kyi bag chags kyis bsgos pa/ ro la sred pa la shin tu chags pa/ kha cig ni 'di khasod pa'i kha khrus yin par 'dzin/
blo gros chen po sngon gyi rgyal pa la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa// dad pa can rnam par rtog pa ma mang ba shAkya'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu ma dang/ mi'i rigs kyi bu dang/
dugs kyi bu mo lus dang/ srog dang/ longs spyod la ma chags kha/ ro lam zhen pa/ ro la mkharkam pa/ snying rje can 'byung po thams cad bdag bzhin du rtsol bar 'dod pa//
sems can thams cad la bu gcig bzhin du sdug par lta ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni de snyad du 'dzin par bshad do// blo gros chen po sngon 'das pa'i dus na/
rgyal po seng ge 'bangs bodrang zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ da zas su bi zla shing ma 'os par ston pas/ ro la ser wung chags pa la 'dun pa'i phyir/ mi'i[n '/]ra bya ra nas/ nga'i
mdza' bo dang/ blon po dang/ gnyen dang/ gnyen 'dab kyi skye ba'i tshogs kyis kyang sbyangs par gyur na/ grong khyer ba dang yul gyi 'gro ba rnams kyis lta ci/
smos te/ bdag gi srid dang yul yongs su gtong ba'i phyir rab tu nyon mongs par gyur dro// blo gros chen po dbang pos kyang sngon lha'i dbang po thob par gyur nas sha zla ba'i bag chags
sgyu kyi tes pas khra'i gzugs su byas nas/ las kun bri ba'i gzugs dang cha byad 'chang shin tu gces par gyur te/ rgyal po zhaldan nyes pa med pa/ 'byung bo la snying brtse ba can nyid kyang
srang la btab cing sdug bsngal chen po thob par byas so// blo gros chen po de ltar tshe du mar goms shing/ lha'i dbang po kha na du gyur na/ bdag dang gzhan la nyes pa thob par byed
par gyuran/ gzhan dag lta ci smos/ blo gros chen pa mi'i dbang por gyur pa gzhan rnams kyang rta shugs drag pos khyer nas 'brog dgon ban 'khyam 'khyam pa las/ sreg gi rim gro'i
phyir seng ge mo dang 'tshogs par gyur te/ bu dag kyang skyes par gyur to// seng ge dang 'grogs pa'i rgyus rgyal po'i bu rkang bkra la sogs ba'ang sngon gyi tshe rabs la sha lnga'i nyes ba'i bag
chags kyis mi'i dbang por gyur kyang sha za bar gyur to// blo gros chen po tshe 'di nyid la'ang khyim bdun pa'i nang na sha la shin brkam zhing/ ma 'os par bstan na/ mi shazla ba'i mkha'
ma0/ kha gro ma dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rungs pa dag tu skye 'o// blo gros chen po de dag tshe brjes nas kyang sha ro la chags pa de nyid kyis// seng ge dang/ stag dang/ gzig dang/ spyang ki
dang 'phar ba dang/ gyel dang/ rtswa dang/ 'ug pa sha mang po za ba pa dang/ mang du za ba'i srin po la sogs pa'i na tu gtum pa 'i skye gnas su'ang lhung bar byed do//
der lhung ba rnams ma'i skye gnas kyi 'thob par dka' na/ mya ngalas 'dar ba lta ci smos te/ blo gros chen pe sha za ba'i nyes pa'i ng de dag la sogs pa yin na/ bsnyen pa
rnams lha las kyang skye med/ phyir bzlog pas na man tan shin tu mang na/ blo gros chen pa byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis yon tan rung/ zhes pa 'di dag dang/
gzhan yang khong dus rnyed do// blo gros chen po yon tanadang nyes ba 'di gal sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i bdag nyid can gyis sha thams
cad mi bza' bar bshad do// blo gros chen po gral te ji ltar sha su'ang mi bza'anani/ de'i phyir srog chags rnams kyang gsod par mi 'gyur na/ blo gros chen po srog chags shes
pa med par rin gyi phyir gsod pa ni phal che'i/ de las gzhan gyi phyir ni tung ngo// blo gros chen po ro la sred pa ni shin tume bzad pa yin te/ de la shan tu bsnyen dus mi'i sha dang kyang
uka/ mdag khra bar 'gyur na/ ri dgas dang/ phyogs dang/ bya dang/ srog chags las byung ba'i sha de dag lta ni smos/ blo gros chen po sha'i ri la sred pas gzir ba rnams
kyis rgya dang 'khrul 'khor 'di dag de lta de ltar bsus te/ de dag gis na bye pa dang/ shan pa dang/ 'kha la sogs pas nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang/ sa la 'gro ba dang/ chu largyu ba'i sreg blugs
nyes pa med pa rnams rnam pa du mas gsod par byed do// blo gros chen po'on kyang rngon bar gyur pa'i sems gtum pa can srin po dang/ song na med pa rnams kyi srog chags su 'du shes pas
gsodatsang za'ang snying rje nam yang mi skye bas/ blo gros chen po gang nye bar gzung ste/ nyan thos rnams gnang bar bya ba mkhyag pa dang/ byed du ma bcug nga dang/ ma brtags pa zhes bya
ba'i sha'ang rung ba medan/ blo gros chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung zhing shAkya'i sras yin na zhes khas len da/ dur smrig gi rgyal mtshan thogs ba/ skyes bu
glen pa log pa'i rtog gis sems nyams par gyur pa/ 'dul ba la rnam pa mang por rnam par rtog pa smra ba/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba rgyas pa re'i srid pa la chags pa rnams shababra'akho'i gtan
tshigs su snang ba de dang de dag ston to// nga la'ang yang dag pa ma yin bar skur ba 'debs par sems so// don byung ba'i gleng gzhi de dang de dag la brtags nas smras te/ don byung ba 'di
ni gleng gzhi 'di la sa bcom ldan 'das kyis sha'i brab gnang ste/ rung ba'ang yin/ khazas bsad par yang gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsol ce'o zhes zer ro//
blo gros chen po mdo gang las bsnyen par gnang ba med de/ zas bsod pa'i nang du'ang rung bar bshad do// blo gros chen po gal te ngas gnang bar bya bar 'dod dam/ nga'i nyan thos
rnams kyis bsun khararung ba zhig yin nAni/ byams pas gnang ba'i rnal 'byor can la khrod pa rnam sa dang/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi
bu mo rnams la sems can thams cad du gcig bzhin tu 'du shes bsgom pa'i phyir/ sha thams cad khra ba bcad khar yang byas so// blo gros chen po ngas ni rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu
ma chos 'dod pa theg pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa rnams dang/ dur khrod pa byams pa la nas kha dgon pa brnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams kyis rnal 'byor rnams cad bsgrub pa dang/
sems can thams cad la bu gcig bzhin du 'du shes bsgom pa'i phyir/ sha thams cad bcad par yang byas so// bstan pa'i rjod pa de dang de la bslab pa'i gzhi rim pas bca' ba skas
kyi ga dang khu 'i tshul du rnam gsum bcas nas/ de'i ched du byas ba'i rnams kyang bkag ste/ de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis gab canu'i sha ni ma ba kag mod kyi/ dare ni rnams cad rnam pa thamu
cad du kun thabs med par jil gyis bkag ste/ blo gros chen po ngas sha'i zas ni su la'ang ma gnang mi gnang ngo// gnang par ma 'gyurataM blo gros tshan pa/ dran[53]
zabyung ba rnams la sha'i zas ni mi rung bar bshad do// blo gros chen po gang yang nga la de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gsal to zhes skur pa 'debs kha de'ang blo gros chen po skyes bu blun po rang gi las
kyi nyas pa'i sgrub pa la gnas pa de dag la yun ring po don med pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ mi bde ba sgrub par 'gyur ro// blo gros chen po nga'i 'phags pa nyan thos rnams nikha brasarba mal
khra' nga ma zan/ sha dang khrag gi zas mi rung ba lta ci smos/ blo gros chen po nga'i nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi zlas zaste/ zang zing gi zlas
ni ma yin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ltar smos/ blo gros chen pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams n chos kyi sku/ chos kyi zas kyis gnas pa yin te/ zang zing gi sku ma yin/ zang zing
gi zlas thams cad kyis gnas pa ma yin te/ srid pa dang/ srid pa'i yo byad la sred pas tshol ba'i bag chags thams cad sbyangs shing/ nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa'i bag chags thams
cad med pa/ sems dang shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gazigs pa'i sems can thams cad la bu gcig dong mtshungs par gzigs shid gas rje/
[t]/ chen po dang ldan pa'o// de ltar blo grosachen po ngan sems can la bu gcig bzhin gyi 'du shes dang lnga pa yin na/ ji ltar bdag gi bu sha bzub bar nyan thos rnams la gnang bar bya/ rang gis
bza' ba lta stes te/ 2sa nyan thos rnams la gnang ba dang/ bdag kid kyi zas so zhes bya ba 'don blo gros chen po gnas med do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems chen gyis// tshang dang sha dwang sgog btsong dag/ bza' zhing btung bar mi bgyi ba// rgyal ba khyu mchog bshad du gsol/ dra nga 'phags pa min ngas khasen// mi snyan par yang
byed pa ste// sha ni shazan rnams kyi zas// bzar mi rung bar grub chen gsungs// zos na nyes pa gang yin dang// ma zos pa ma yon tan dag/ shaza de la gang yod pa// blo gros
chen po gas par gyur// 'khrul pa dang niganyan ba shes dang/ khu chu khrag las byung ba'i phyir// 'gyur ba rnams ni dngangs 'gyur las/ rnal 'byor can gyis sha mi bza'// sha rnams dang ni
sgog btsong dang// chang dang rnam pa sna tshogs dang// ki'u dang sgog kya de bzhin te// rnal 'byor can gyi sa rtagatu spangs// bru mar gyisakyang byug pa sbyang// khrilarten rtsa'i sems na
tshams/ bu ga bu gar 'jig 'gyur phyir// spyi la nyal bar mi bya'o// zas la drags ba skur 'grub// rtog pa dregs las byung ba ste// rtog pas 'dod chags btu skyed// de la phyi
[s a {, ]/na bza' mi bya// rtog pa las na 'dod chagasaskye// 'dod chags kyis na sems rmongs byed// rmongs pas 'dul bar rab tu 'gyur// skyes te grol bar mi 'gyur
ro kha yi phyir ni sems can gsod// ga yi phyir ni nor sbyin byed// de dag gnyis ka sdig lasatsan// 'o dod 'bod la sog sa par 'tsho// gang gis thub pa'i tshig 'das te// bsam pa
na pa shazan// 'jig rten gnyis na zhig pa'i phyir// kya'i bstan ba 'artul zhugs blangs// shin tu ma bzad dmyal bar yang// sdig pa'i las can de dag 'dong/ ma rungs 'o dod
'bod sogs so// sha khra de dag 'tsho bar 'gyur// rnam gsum dag pa'i sha rnams ni// ma brtags pa dang ma thangs dang// ma bskul yang yong med pas// des na shan mi bza'
'o rnal 'byor can gyis sha mi bza'/ gang dang sangs rgyas dag gis bshad// sems can gcig la gcig zab// sha zan dag gi rigs suny+tsa/ 'drim zhim zhing smad pa dang//
smon rnams su skye bar 'gyur// gdol ba sha can rigs dang// btso blag mkhan du yang yang skye/ 'phra men mkha' 'gro'i skye gnas dang// shaza'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur// mi yi
tho ma de dgan/ srin dang byi la'i mngal du skye// glang po'i tshul dang sprin chen dang// mya ngan 'das dang sor 'phreng dang// lang+kar gshegs pa'i mdo las kyang// ngas ni ga yang rnam par smad
sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// nyan thos rnams kyang smad pa la/ nga mtsho bar dra ba 2/ rtag tu smin par skye bar 'gyur sha la sogs pa sbyangs ka phyir// bran sde'i
rigs sam rnal 'byor can// shes rab can dang nor ldan par// de dag rnams ni skye bar 'gyur// mthong dang thos dang dogs pa yi// sha rnams thams cad rnam par smad// sha zan
rigs su skyes pa yi// rtog ge pa rnams mi shes so// ji ltar 'dod chags thar ba la//khar chad byed par 'gyur ba bzhin// de ltar sha dang chang la sogs// bar chad byed par
'gyur pa'o// ma 'ongs pa yi dus na ni// sha za gti mug pa ba dag/ shan sdig med rung ba'o zhes// sangs rgyas kyis ni bshad ces zer// zas la sman dang 'dra ba dang//
bu yo shadang mtshungs ba yang/ 'on pa dang ni ma 'phred bar// rnal 'byor can gyis khras la sbed// seng ge dag dang stag rnams dang// ka la sogs pa 'akogs ngos po//
nga na khyams bras gnas pa la// rtag par rnam par kun tu smad// thar ba'i chos dang 'gal ba'i phyir// mi rnams sdang bar 'gyur ba'i sha// de phyir mthu dang bya ste/'di ni
'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan na/ lang+kar gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rab kyi sAng po las bsham bza' ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen pa la bka' stsal la/ gang 'das po dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
[DA/ ] rnams kyis bshad pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ 'chad par 'gyur ba dang/ da ngas kyang chos ba rnams yongs su bzung ba bshad kyis/ lang+kar gshegs ba sngags kyi tshig khyod kyis zung
zhig/ 'di lta ste/ tutatotuta te/ buT tre khunaze/ paN+Di'i phab rje/ kaT tre kaN Ti/ mamale rgya mal/ ba ma 'a ra ma la/ na mnam/ him hi me/ kale ka le/ bya ba mi/
wA ka le ka le/ ata te matra te/ btate buta te/ dzAtAte sUtatre/ kata d+ha/ lan+d+he/ buN+Da rje/ snyim d+hu me/ hUM me zhwa me/ tsa le tsa le/ btsa pa tsa/ ban ng+hi panad+d+haM/ saMtsamaMtse/
khyu cha re/ du d+ha re/ pa rA re/ ag glu ag gi ka kri/ makre// tsakyi/ d+himad+him/ dAsi d+hi/ Tu tu ru zhu/ 'u wu'uzhu/ du du du du/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+hu/ sAhA/ blo gros
chen bo u0f8bng+kar gshegs pa'i mdo/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang 'a tshong ba dang/ klog pa
dang/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur ba de la 'di dag gis kyang skabs mi red do// lha 'am/ lha mo 'am/ ku 'am/ klu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ lham lan nam/
lha ma yin ma ram/ nam mkha 'aldingangam/ nam mkha' ldengam 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ mi 'am ci ma 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ lto 'phye chen me 'am/ 'byung po 'am 'byung po
'am/ grul bum mam/ grul bum me la na/ sha za 'am/ sho za mo 'am/ gnon po'am/ gnon ma'am/ brjod byed tam/ brjod byed me 'am/ srin po 'om/ srin mo 'am/
'phra men nam/ 'phra men mo 'og/ mdangs 'phrog pa 'a ma/ mad des 'brog ma 'am/ lus srul po 'a/ lus rgyal mo 'am/ ma'am/ mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang
de la glags mi red de 2 gal te ba don drag po zhig byung na/ de la brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags pas du 'bod ring/ phyogs gcig tu lta ste 'bros par 'gyur lo blo gros chen po yang sngags
kyi tshig gzhan dag kyang kha shad par bya'o// 'dilta ste/ pad med pad ma do ba/ hin hin hin/ tsu le shulatshu le/ b+hu'i ha lA hu la/ yu lo yu la yul/ b.le ba lA ba la/
mu tse/ na da ba dze/ ma sde pramade/ dan ka ra sAhA/ blo gros chen po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa
dang kun chub par khyed na lha 'am/ lha mo 'am klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma yin ma'am/ nam mkha' khyung ngam/
nam mkha' lding ma 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ 'amachi ma 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ lto 'phye chen mo 'am/ dri za 'am/ dri za ma 'am// 'byung ba 'am/
ka 'byung mo 'am/ grul bum mtsha/ grul bum ma 'am/ sha ba 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ gnon po 'am/ gnon ma 'am/ brjod byed dam/ brjod byed mo 'am/ srin bo 'om/ srin
mo 'am/ 'phra men mo 'am/ 'bra min mo bam/ mdangs 'phrog pa 'am/ mdangs 'phrogam 'a// lus srul po 'am/ lus srul ma'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa de dag tham
cad kyis kyang klags ma rnyed// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag klog par byed pa des/ lang+kar gshegs pa'i med thams cad bklags par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag
ni bcom ldan 'das kyis srin po rnams bzlog pa'i phyir gsungs so//// bam po brgyad pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten 'dun skye 'jig bral/ nam mkha'i me tog rab tu 'dra// khyod kyi shes rab thugs rje yase//
yod dang med par mi dmigs so// 'jig rten rtag dang chad pa spangs// 'khor sdug rmi lam 'dra ba ste// khyod kyi shes rab thugs rje yis// yod dang med par ma dmigs so//
tsa chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin// sems dang rnam par shes pa dpangs// khyod kyi shes rab thugs rje yis// khyod kyis yod dang med ma dge sa// chos dang gang zag
bdag med dang// khyod kyis nyon mongs shes bya'i rnams// khyod kyi shes rab thugs rje dang// mtshan ma med pa'i rtag tu dag/ mya ngan mi 'da' 'da' la min// khyod la
mya ngan 'da' mi gnas// blo dang rig par bgyid dang brag/ yod dang med pa'i phyogs kyang sbyangs// de ltar skye 'jig sbyongs pa yi// thub pa zhi ba sus mgrongal/ de
dag 'di dang slad mar yang// chags med nyer len med par 'gyur// sems sku ba yi smig rgyug/ ji ltar dpyid kar ga yo ba na/ ri dwags rnams ni chur 'dzin te// de la
dngobs bo yod pa min// de bzhin rnam shes sa bon kyang// lta ba'i yul larab tu ga byiso ba rnams ni skye bar 'dzin// rab rib can gyi rang rib bzhin// bsam gtan/
bsam bya bsam gtan pa// stong dang dben pa mthong ba dang/ de dag rtog pa ma yin par// gang gis rtogs ba de 'grol lo// chos 'di dgan snying po med// rlom
sems la sa ni'abyung ba yin// gang gis stong zhes sems pa yi// sems pa de yang sbyong pa'o// phung po rnam par shes pa lnga// chu lashing gi grib ma bzhin// snang
ubya// kha sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra// rnam par rig pas ma rtog cig/ sgyu maro langs 'khrul 'khor dang// rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bur// nam yang rgyud
gsum rnam chad bar// skye bos mthong na rnam par thar// tshul bzhin ma yin rnam rtog pas// sna tshogs rnam pa brgyud dam dgur// rnam par shes pa 'jug 'gyur
tA ji ltar rgya mtsho'i rlabs bzhin no// rtag tu bag chags dag gis bskyed// rtsa ba zug cing gnas kyang khastan// spyod yul drag tu sams 'khyam ste// khab long
gi ni lcags bzhin no// sems can kun la gnas pa ste// rigs kyi sani rtog pa spangs// shes dang shes bya rnam skyongs shing// byed las grol na rnam par ldog
sa bsu lasan rnam 'byung ba/ sbyamalta bu'i ting 'dzin dang// 'du shes rnam shes skyangs pa la// sems kyi rgyal po blta bar bya// sems nanem zhig gyur ba na//
! paNo 'dra ba'i gzhal med khang// sgyu ma'i spyod tshul 'byung ban// de yi tshon ther zug gnas// den gnas bar gyur nas ni// lhun gyis grub pa'i spyod rig pas///
sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu bzhin// sems can kun gyi don byed do// rnam par rtog las gud na ni// 'dus byas 'dus ma byas medon// mo gsham rmi lam bu bzhin du
0 byis ba phyogs bslad 'dzin par byed// rang bzhin med dang mi skye dang// gang zag dang ni phung po'i rgyud// rkyen dang khams dang shes khyu dang// stong ba srid dang ma srid rnamA/
ngas ni thubs su bshad pa ste// nga ni mtshan nyid mi 'chad na/ mtshan gyi gzhu dang mtshan nyid du/ byis ba rnams ni dngos por 'dzin// thams cad mkhyen kyang thams
cad mkhyen pa min// thams cad kyi yang dbus na thamang 4da med// phyis pa 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'di zhes rtog/ shes par ma byed ston par yang mi byed// brtags
pa de ni ming tsam ste/ mtshan nyid kyis named pa'o// gang ga dren rnam brtags pa'i// phung po sku gda'adzings pa 'dra// med las 'byung bcung zad med// duna rnams
kyisan 'gam 'gyur/ nam mkha'i me tog mo gshAm bu// de ltar 'dus byas nam mthong ba// de tshe gzung dang 'dzin pa na// nor bar mogling nas ldog par 'gyur//
mtshan nyid dang ni bya ba dang/ 'dangos pas mya ngan nga mi 'da'// rnam rtog rnam shes bzlog pa na// nga ni mya ngan 'das pa'o// ji ltar chu chen zed pa'i tshe// rlabs
rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin 'gags par 'gyur na ni// rnam shes sna tshogs mi 'byung ngo// stong pa ngo bo nyid med pa/ sgyu ma bzhin du ma skyes rnams
yod dang med pa ma yin te// dngos po 'di dag rmi lam bzhin// ngani rang bzhin gcig 'chad pa// rtog ge mtshan ma rig sa sbyangs pa//
lags pa lha yi spyod yul te// rang bzhin rnam gnyis spangs ba'o/ 'dzin pa med cing gzung ba med/ snar ba med cing 'ang khamed// sgyu ma dngan smig rgyu 'dra//
[“]/ rmi lam rab rib ji bzhin du// gang tshe yang dag don 'dod pa// rnam par ma rtog chags med pas// mthong ba den rnal 'byor zhugs/ dpetsam med par nga yang
mthong/ de la rnam rig gang mang med// ji ltar nam mkha'i smig rgyu bzhin// chos rnams de ltar shes na ni// tsa yang shes pamed pa'o// khamasa rnams rab tu
'khrugs pa'i phyir// srin bu me khyer lta bu dga' mes kyang skyes la sna tshogs snang// de bzhin 'jig rten rang bzhan no// rtswa dang shing dang gyo mo las/ sgyum rnam par
mdzos gyur kyang/ sgyu ma drani med pa ste// chos kyi rang bzhin de bzhin no// rkyen rnams yod dang med pa las// chos rnams 'byung ba med pa ste// khamasagasum/
nananor kho yin// tsade phyirasnatshogs snang bar 'gyur// 'jig rten rmi lam ngobo 'di mtshungs te// de nasna tshogs kyi mang gzugs rnams snang// reg dang longs
bas/ spyod lu sa kyi mthAr 'gro dang// 'jig rten gtso dang byed pa rnams mtshungs so// sems 'di khams gsum skye ba nas gyur pa yin// sems 'khrul 'di dang pha ro la snang
ba'o// 'jig rtenamed phyir de la brtag mi bya// 'jig rten de 'dra'i rang bzhin rtags nas ni// mi gtsang gnas kyi mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur// byis pa rnams nag ti
mug phyir// 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa mthong// shes rab ldan pa rnamu dugani// 'byung dang 'jig pa mthong ba med// lha yi pho brang 'og mni po// sdig pa thams
cad rnam par snang// rtag tu rnam par mi rtog ldan// sems dang sems las byung ba sbyangs// stobs dang mngon shes dbang thob pa// de dang ting 'dzin dbang rang nas
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas// sprul pa rnams n 'dir 'tshang rgya// sangs rgyas rnam ni sbal pa dug/ bye ba dbag med 'byung bar 'gyur// byis pa kun n de dag
las bra ga cha 'dra chos bsam yas nyan/4/thog ma dbus dang mtha' las grol// dngos po dang ni dngos med sangs// khyab pa ma g.ye ngag pa ste// sna tshogs med
las sna tshogs 'byung// rnam par rig pa'i rigs kyis g.yogs// lus can kun la gnas pa ste// sgyu ma nor pa yod med kyi// sgyu ma nor pa'i sgyu ma yin// 'jig/
ba na @#// rten dag na sems bslu ba// cung zad tsam na gang yod pa// rang bzhin gatris dang bral ba ste// kun gzhi rnam par shes bas sprul// rnam rig
ma gyi lta grwa dang// gang zag chos su spyod khor yang// 'jig rten de ltar rnam bshag nas// nam zhig shin tugyur pan/ da cheng yi bu yin te// rdzogs pa'i chos rnams rab
ston la// drodang gsher dang sa g.yo bar// chos rnams byas pas nor bar brtags// yang dag ma yin sgro btags te// mtshan nyid med cing mtshan gzhi med// cuna rnams kyi ni
lus 'a dil// 'dan rdzas brgyad gzugs yin te// lus kyi dbyibs dang dbang mngon// byas pa nor pa rnam rtog go/ rgyu dang rkyen rnams tshogs pa las// byis pa 'byung bar rtog par byed//
tshul 'di dag ni mi shes pas// srid pa gsum gyi gnas na 'khyam// dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med pa ste// rtog pa mi yi tshig yin de yang med// srid pa rmi lam snga'akhazhin
brtag byas nas// 'khor bar mi bya mya ngan 'da' mi bya// sna tshogs sa bon zhes ni bya ba'i sems// sems kyi spyod yul snang ba ste// snang nas rtog pa gnyis dag ste// khyis
b rnams ni skye bar rtog/ mi shes pa dang srid dang las// sems dang sems las byung gnas te// gang phyir de las byung bas na// da ni gzhan gyi dbang du 'dod// de dag gang dngos
rtogs pa ni// sems kyi spyod yul nor ba ste// rtogs bas grub pa ma yin no// log ba nor ba rnam par brtags// rkyen rnams dang ni 'brel ba las// lus can rnam sa kyi sems
'byung ngo// rkyen rnams las ni rnam grol zhing// rang gi mtshan nyid rnam spangs te// nam zhig lus la mi gnas na/ de phyir nga yaspyod yul man/ 'jiltar rgyal ba tshong dpon dang//
de dag sa 'dra ba sna tshogs kyis// khu khrid khyim na rtser bcug nas// nags kyi 'i dgas phrad lnga bstan// de ltar ngas ni chos rnams kyi// gzugs khan mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyis//
so so rang rig yang dag mthug/ khu rnams lan nga 'chad do// jiltar mtsho'i rlabs rnams na// rlung gi rkyen gyis byung ba dag/ gar byed rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// rgyun kyang mad
bar m 'gyur go/ de bzhin kun gzhi chubo yang// rtag tu yulakyi rkyen gyis byung// ma shes dba' rlabs sna tshogs kyis// gar byed rab tu 'dud bar 'gyug/ gzung dang 'dzin
pa'i dngos bor ni// lus can rnams kyi sems 'jug go/ ji ltar byis pas brtags pa ltar// snang ba yi ni mtshan nyid med// kun gzhi rnam shes dam pani// rnam par gu ste
kun gzhi yang// gzung dang 'dzin pamed pa'i sa// de bzhinang du las bshad do// phung po rnams la bdag med de// sog kyang med cing gang zag med// rnam par shas ni skye
khar 'gyur// rnam par shes ni 'gag par 'gyur// ji ltar rim mtho dman du// snang yang yod pa ma yin pa'i// de bzhin dngos bo rnams la yang// dngos
kid snang yang yod pa min jiltar driwa'i grong khyer dang// ji lta bur nosmoge rlu dag/ de ltar snangam rtogamagrod lang grwa/ shes rab kyisan yod pa tshani// chod dbang po rnam bar log

ny+nyo 'bras bu med cid la ngamadra// blo dang rig par khyi dang bral// mtshan dang mtshan gyi gzhi yang sngangs// phung bor rtan cing sangs rgyas ba// gang na'ang sus kyang ma mthong ste// gang na sus
glu kyang ma mthong ba// de la ji ltar rnam par bsgom// rkyen dang gtan tshigs dpe rnams dang// dam bca' ba dang rgyu rnams kyi/ rmi lamatha'i grong khyer drung// gesgyu ki ma zla ba dang//
myu gu 'od sogs dpe rnams kyi// skye ba de ni ngas bzlog go/ 'gro ba rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra// stong pa dang ni brtags pa ste// 'jig rten gsum la ma gnas shing// phyi nang du yang de bzhin te//
srodi ba ma skyes mthong bstan/ mi skyobazod pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang// lus kyang sgyum lta bu dang/ mngon shes dbang dang stobs rnams kyang// de yi sems la
sna tshogs 'gyur// gang gis dngos po ma skyes pa// stong pa shin turang bzhin med// de dag lan skyon rnams kyisago/ no ba skye zhing 'gag par 'gyur// phyi rol snang ba'i gzugs can gyis//
sems dang sems nasnang bar 'gyur// ji ltar byis pas brtags pa ltar// mthong bar bya ba gzhan med do// 'brel ba rnams dang sangs rgyas gzugs// 'byung ba rnams ni 'jig pa dang//
shin tu bslabs pas rnam ga gis// 'gro bsnatshogs byin gyis rlob// lus dang gnas dang longs sbyong rnams// gzung ba rnam rig gsum po// yid dang 'dzin gyi rnam rig dang// rnam par
rtog ni 'dzin bgasum// rnam par rtog dang rnam brtag pa// ji srid yi ge'i spyod yul ba// rtog can rtog ges nos pa'i phyir// desrid yang dag ma mthong ngo// gang gi tshen shes rab kyis//
dngos po rang bzhin med par shes// de yi tshen rnal 'byor can// mtshan nyid gnas shing dal yang bgo bya gag snag chos khaskus pa la// da nyid 'dri bar mi shes 'dzin// ma shes la yi
byas pa dag/ theg pa gsum la'ang [“]zhin no// 'di la nyan thos gang yang med// rang rgyal la dag de bzhin te// kun thos dang ni rang rgyal khagi/ gang gzugs 'di dag snang bani// byang chub

sems dpa'i snying brtse can// de dag sprul ba ston pa'o// srid pa gsum naM rnam rigatsam// rang bzhin nyid na brtags pa ste// chos dang gang zug bzos ba'i phyir// degyur pa ni di bzhin nyid// nyi ma zla
ba mar me 'od// de bzhin 'byung nor Tu rnams// rnam par mi rtog shin tu'abyung// de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid// ji ltar ra'ab can dag gis// skra shad log khar 'dzadIb ltar//
[= ]@#// de bzhin dngos par rtog pa 'di// byis pas log par rnam par brtags// nyon mongs rnam byang dngos po rnams// sbyashad 'dzings pa lta bu ste// gnas dang 'jig dang/
skye dang brag/ rtag dang mi rtag sangos kha'o// ji ltar l las d+hA tur sa// gser lta bur ni 'gro ba mthong// den gser yod ma yin yang// sa dag kyang ni gsar du snang// thogs pa med
sams sems 'gyur bas/ de ltar byis pa nyams par byas// srid pa sgyu ma smig rgyu skyes// yang khrag nyid du 'dzin Da ra byed// sa bon gcig dang sa bon med// mnyam dang shas chen sa
bon can// sa bon kun kyang de yin no/ sna tshogs rgyur kyi sems la ltos// nam dgo pan sa bon gcig/ shin tu gyur pas sa bon med// mi rtog pas na mnyam pa'o/ shas che ba sa na tshe
rabs 'dzeg/ sa bon sna tshogs 'debs pas na// de ni sa bon nas khya'o// 'di larkyen gyis mi skye ste// gang yang 'gag par mi 'gyur ro// brtags pa yin rkyen rnams nyid// skye
ba dang ni 'gag par 'gyug/ srid pa gsum ni btags tsam ste// ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po med/ kha tags pa ngo bo dngos par ni// rtog ge ba dag ga par 'gyur// dngos po'i rang bzhin gso
'dod la// 'o pa dag ni so rtogs so// dngos kho bo'ang bzhin mi skye ba// de ltar mthong nas rnam par grol// sgyu ma med dang chos mtshungs pas// dngos po rnams n yod brjod yin//
log pa glog ltar mgyogs pas na// de phyir sgyu ma lta burig/ med pa med cing skye ba med// rkyen rnams kyang ni gang na yang// gang yang yod pa ma yin te// kha cig gis ni byed par brjod/
rgyun gyi skye 'jig 'brel pan// bzlog par bya bo ma yin te// zung bzhin med cing rnam rig med// rkyen rnams kyis ni byis ba dag/ gang la rtog pa de bzlog go/ rang bzhin med cing rnam gi
med kun gzhi med cing dngos med na// byis pa ngan pa'i rtog ge ba// ro dang 'dra ba'i 'di dag khartags// nam zhig 'jig rtenasems tsamadu// rgyal ba'i sras kyis mthong bas na// de tshe
rigs su gtogs pa'i lus// bya ba'i 'du khyed spangs pa ste// stobs dang mngon par shes pa dang// dbang dang ldan pa rab tu 'ab// thams cad gzugasasu snang ba yis// sems
denam zhigabyung ban// 'di la sems med gzugs med kyi// nor sems thog ma med ces pa// de tshe rnal 'byor can gyin ms// shes pa 'grob snang med mthong// mtshan ma dngos po rnam
ga dang// gang yin nag bar g.yo ba las// nga yi'u rnams 'das nas ni/ nyude dag rnam par mi rtog skyod// zlum Ti'i grong khyer dang// sgrashad 'dzings basmig rgyu dag/ med bzhin dun
yod par snang/ de bzhin dngos pa'i dngos nyid do// dngos po thams cad ma skyes te// nor ba tsam ni snang bar 'gyur// byis pa rtog gzhis dga' ba dag/ nor laniskyes bar rtog/
[。 ]/sna tshogs bag chags 'byung ba yi// skye ba'i char ni gtogs pa'i sems// chu bo rlabs bzhin shin tu 'byung// trechad nas ni mi 'byung ngo// rnam pa sna tshogs/
'a dmigs pa'i sems// sna tshogs la ni 'jug pa bzhin// de bzhin nam mkha' rtsig pa la// ci yi phyir na 'jug mi 'gyur// mtshan ma zhig la dmigs nas ni// gal te sems ni
zla'ajug 'gyuran// sems kyang rkyen gyis bskyod gyur to// sems tsam du ni mi rung ngo// sems kyis sun sems las gzung// rgyu dang bcas pa gang yang med// sems kyi chos nyid
dag pa ste// nam mkha' la ni bag chags med// rang gi sems la mngon chags bas// sems ni shin tu 'byung khor 'gyur// phyi rol snang ba yod med de// de yi phyir na sems tsam
mo sems ni kun gzhi rnam shes te/ ngarasems nyid ni yod lan no/ ]gang/ sa yul rnams 'dzin ban// dan rnam par shes zhes bya// sems ni rtag tu lung ma bstan// yang ni
zla gnyis kar rgyu ras te// rnam par shes pa 'byung ba yang// de na dag dang mi dge 'a// lus dang gnas dang longs skyongan// gzung ba'i rnamaraMgrwa gsum pa'o// yingangang 'dzin pa'i rnam
rig chag/ rnam par rtog pa 'dzin pa gsum// rnam rig gsum po sbas pa ni// dam pa'i don gyi sgo yin te// snang ba med pa 'dug nani// theg pa gsum bzhag ga la yod//
sems com dang ni snang med dang// sangs rgyas ba dang gnas rnams ni// de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// 'chad cing 'chad par 'gyur pa 'o// sa bdun dag na sems yin te/
snang ba med pa brgyad pa 'o// 'dir nis gnyis gnas yin te// sa gzhan nga yi rang bzhin no// dga' dang sa se rang rig pa// sa 'di nga yi rang bzhin te// dbang phyug chen po'i gnas
kyi mchog/ 'og min shin tu rnam par mdzes// mi yi jalta de bzhin du// de yi 'od zer sna tshogs pa// yid 'ong zhi ba rab tu 'byung// de dag srid gsum sprul par byed// srid pa gsum
po kha cig skul// kha cig snga nas skul pa ste// der ni theg pa rnams ston pa// de ni nga yi rang bzhin sa// zhing du 'pho dang rtogs pa lo// sa rnams kyi ni dus mdo de// sems tsam las kyang
'das nas ni// snang med gnas pa'i 'bras bu'o// rnam pa sna tshogs med pa dang// med pa dag kyang snang bar 'gyur// byis pa 'dzan pas rnam slad do// sna tshogs bani phyin ci log/
nam zhig mi rtog ye shes ni// dngos po yod par marung ste// gang phyir sems ni gzugs min pas// de phyir de ni rnam ma rtog/ dbang po rnams ni skya mo bzhin// yul rnams kyang ni rmi lam
'dra byed dang las dang bya ba nyid// rnam pa kun tu yod pa min// bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med dang// gzugs med pa dang ting 'dzan dang/ u0f7c/ 'du shes 'gog pa ma lus par//
@#// sems tsam lan yod pa min// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang//lan cig phyir 'ong 'bras bu dang// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang// dgra bcomanyid sems
[D• ]nor pa'o// byis pa rnams ni 'dus byas la/ mi rtag skad cig stong par rtog/ sa bon 'bab chume mar dpas// skad cig pa yi don du rtog/ byed po med cing skad cig pa//
dben pa bya ba sangs pa dang// chos rnams kyin mi skyel// skad cig don du ngas bshad do/ yod dang med la skye bar ni// khyad par pa dang grangs can shes// lung du ma bstan
thams cad kyang// de dag nyid kyis bshad pa'o// lung bstan pa ni rnam bzhi ste// mgo gcig dngani dra ba dang// rnam par 'byed dang gzhag pa rnams// mu stags sna ba bzlog pa'o/
kun rdzob tu ni thams cad yod// dam pa'i don du yod ma yin// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa la// dam pa'i don du 'dod na ni// dmigs par ng bzhin med pa la// de phyir kun rdzob bstan
kyi pa yin// dngos po brjod pa'i rgyus byung// gal te rang bzhin yod na ni// brjod pa dag las byung ba yin/ dngos pa med ces bya ba med// brjod pa 'di dngos med de// kun rdzob
tu yang yod ma yin// phyin ni log ni bzhi yin pas// dmags ba yod pa ma yin no// kal te phyin ci log yodan// ngo bo nyid med med par gyur// phyin ci log ni bzhi las phyag gangadang
gang dag dmigs 'gyur ga/ den rang bzhin med par 'gyur// thams cad du yang med pa yin// gang 'di snatshogs snang ba ni// gnas ngan len gyis bsgos pa'i sems// gzugs su/
gnang bar 'dzin pa ste// phyi rol dag ni sems 'khrul ba/ rnam par rtog dang mi rtog pas// rnam rtog rab tu skyed 'gyur te// mi rtog rnam par rtog ba yis// stong pa nyid ni yang dag mthong
skya ma glang po sna tshogs ltar// lo ma rnams dang gser bzhin du// mi shes pas ni sems bsgom bas// da ngazhan mi la snang ba mngon// 'phags bas nor pa mi mthong ste// yang
dog nyid kyang skabs der min// gang phyir skabs der yang dag na// nor pa yang dag nyid du 'gyur// nor pa thams cad sangs pas kyang// gal te mtshan ma skyer zer na// de nyid de
yi nor pa ste// rab rib yongs su ma dag bzhin/ rab rab can dgakhaslad pa las// skra shad mthong ba ji bzhin du// de bzhin byis pa rnams kyis yang// 'dzin pa yul la shan tu
'jug/ srid gsum 'don sku shad 'dra// smig rgyu'i chu ltar nor ba ste// rmi lam sgyu ma lta bur ni// gang phyir bshig na grol bar 'gyur// rnam par rtog dang rnam rtag dang// rnam par
rtog ba 'jug pa dang// 'ching dang bcing bya bcings pa dang// drug pa 'di dag thar pa'i rgyu// sa rnams med cing bden pa med// zhing rnams med cing sprul pa med// sangs rgyas rnams dang rang
! u@#// sangs rgyas// nyan thos rnams kyang brtags pa 'o// gang zag rgya dang phung pa rnams/ 'du bzhin rkyen dang rdul phran dang// gtso bo dbang phyug byed pa rnams// sems tsam/
la ni rnam par rtog/ seman thams cad thams cad du// thams cad lus la 'jug pa ste/ rnam par drug gis sna tshogs 'dzin/ gsems kyi rigs ni mtshan nyid med// phung po rnams la
bdag med de// bdag kyang phung po rnams la med// de dag ji ltar khartags bzhin med// de dag med pa'i ng ma yin no// ji ltar byis pas brtags pa bzhin// dngos po thams cad yong ba ste//
de dag mthong bazhin yod na ni// thams cad yang dag mthong bar 'gyur// dngos po thams cad med pa'i phyir// kun nas nyon mchongs dag pa med// ji ltar mthong bzhin de med de// de dag med pa'i ng ma
yin no// kun rtog nor pa'i mtshan ma ste// gzhan gyi dbang gi ma tshon nyid do// mtshan de lan mang btags pa// de ni rnam brtags mtshon ched do// rkyen dang ming gi brda dag las// kun rtog nor ba'i
mtshon ma dag/ nam zhig de la ma 'byungan// yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do// rnam par smin pa'i sangs rgyas dang// sprul pa yi ni rgyal ba dang// byang chub sems dpa' sems can dang// phyogs
phyogs kyi zhing rnams dang// rgyu 'thun thos dang sprul ba dang// rgyal ba gang rnams sprul pa dang// de kun snang ba mtha' yas kyi// bde ba can nas byung ba 'o// gang yang sprul pas bshad pa dang//
rnam smin skyes pas gang bshad bya// mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa'i tshul// de yi ngagongs pa shes par gyis// gang yang rgyal ba'i bus bshad dang// gang yang 'dren pa rnams kyis bshad/ sprul pa dag/
gis gang bshad du// rnam smin rgyal bas ma yin no// chos 'di rnams nim skyes pa// de dag med pa'i ng ma yin te// dri za'i grong khyer skya ma dang// rmi lam sprul pa rnams dang 'dra// sna tshogs sems
na 'jug pa ste// sams ni rnam par grol bar 'gyur// 'gag par 'gyur ba'am sams ted de// sems nyid skye yi gzhan ma yin// ma yas sna tshogs [“]btags pa'i sems// don du snang ba
mngon pa ste// 'don sems tsam don kyang med// rnam par mi rtog grol bar 'gyur// thog ma med dus spros pa yas// gnas ngan lana rnams rab tu bsdus// rnam par rtog pa bsgom pas na/ 'di la 'dog

ba snang ba 'byung// den du snang la rnam shes te// e shes yang dag spyod yul can// shin tu gyur pa snang med de// de ni 'phags pa'i spyod yul lo// don rab 'byed pa'i bsam gtan dang// byis pa nyer sbyong bsam
gtan dang// de bzhin ched dmigs bsam gtan dang// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dag/ kun brtagabs pa yi rang bzhin gyis// thams cad chos ni ma skyes pa// gzhan gyi dbang la gnas nas ni//
mi yi rnam rtog 'khyams pa yin// nam zhig gzhan gyi dbang dag nas// rnam par rtog dang bral ba na// shin tu gyur pa de bzhin nyid// ga pa sbyangs la gnas pa go/ rnam rtog bden par yod min gyis
rnam bas rtog pas ma rtog cig gzung dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid du// nor khar de dag rnam rtog na// phyi rol don mthong brtag pa ni// kun tu brtags pa'i rang bzhin no// de
dag thams cad sbyang sanas niI/ nam zhig snang kha med 'gyur la// de tshe sangs rgyas lha mi phyag/ zhing rnam kun nas 'byung ba yis// de yi mgo la nyug mdzad de// de bzhin nyid kyi rjes 'gro ltas
gang phyir blo yis rab ba'agan// rang bzhin dga' mi dmigs te// de phyir de dag brjod du med// ngo bo nyid kyang med par bshad// rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i don la ni// yod dang med pa yod ma yin/
rkyen du gtogs pa'i dngos bo la// yod dang med par gang rtog pa// mu stegs lta ba can dag ni// bstan las ring du gyur pas shes// dngos po kun gyis sa la lag/ rtag tu cher bas gzhan song ste//
phan tshun rnam khar rtog ba yis// goms shing goms par byed pa 'o// ming ni brjod par ma byas na// 'jig rten thams cad rmongs par 'gyur// de bas rmongs pa bsal ba'i phyir//
ming du brtags pa bya ba yin// ming dang nor pa'i rnam rtog dang// rkyen rnams kyis ni bskyed pa yi// rnam par rtog pa gsum dag gis// myos pa rnams ni dngos par rtog/ 'gags pa med
cing ma skyes te// rang bzhin gyis nam mkha' 'dra// dngos pa med pa'irang bzhin gang// de dag rnam brtags mtshan nyid de// mige yor 'du zhing sgyu ma bzhin// smig rgyu rmi lam mgal me bskor/
dri bra'i grong khyer brag cha 'dra// chos de rkyen lasabyung ba yin// de bzhin nyid dang gnyis su med// stong pa chos nyid yang dag ma grub// rnam par mi rtog bshad pa ni/ 'grang de grub pa'i mdzod/
nyid do// lus dang ngag gi spyod yul pardzun// shes rab mi rtag bden pa ste// sems ni gnyis kyi mthar lhung bas// de phyir shes rab rnam mi rtog/ ji srid sems kyi spyod yul la// yod
dang med pa'i maN+Dal gnyis yin// spyod yul spangs par gyur nani// de tshesems kyang yang dag 'gag na las skye bo'i rang bzhin la// rtog pa gang gis rtog byed pa// rje del dem thong leg pa ste//
named sems ni 'ba' zhig go/ rig pas rnam par gzhig nan// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa 'gag/ ji ltar khyis ngas brtags pa ltar// phyi rol gyi ni den med do// bag chags kyis ni dkrugs pa'i sems//
don du snang ba shin tu 'byung// rtog pa'i rnam pa gnyis 'gags na// yang dag spyod yul ye shes te// 'phags pa'i spyod yul bsam mi khyab/ snang ba med pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ ming dang mtshan ma kun

rtog pa// rang bzhin gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do// yang dag ye shes de bzhin chod// yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do// pha ma phrad par 'gyur ba'i phyir// kun gzhi yod ring ldan par ni// mar gyi bum pa'i

bya ba'i bzhin// khu chu dang nalhan cig skyes// sku gar sbyin du 'bras mo sdug/ las kyis rnam pa snatshogs byas// las rlung 'byung brten pa yis// shing thog bzhin du smin par 'gyur// lnga dang lnga dang
@#// lnga nyid dang// rma yang dgu ba nyida rnams dang// sa dang sen mo sa g.yogs nas// 'gul zhing rab tu skye bar 'gyun// mi gtsang srin bu skyes ma thag/ mi dag tal las sad pa/
bzhin// mig ni gzugs la mched par byed// rtog pa dag kyang rnam par 'phel// mchu gnyis dnganadakan tshogs las// rnam par rtog nas rig nas kyang// mi yi tshig gis rnam btags pas// ne tso
bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur// mu stegs sa brtan pa dang// theg pa chen pa mi gnas pa// de na sems can bsam bzhin bzhugs// ngan par lta ba'i gnas med de// so so rangarig theg pa ni/
rtog ge ba la spyod yul min// mgon po 'dus pa'i 'og dun// 'dzin par su 'gyur bshad du gsol// bder gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og/ tshul rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ba de// dus dag 'das/
nas 'byung ba ni/blo gros chen po khyod shes byos// lho phyogs ba da'i yul du ni// dge slong dbal ldan cher grags ba// de ming klu zhes bod pa ste// yod drang med pa'i phyogs 'jig pa//
nga yi theg pa 'jig rten du// bla med theg chen rab bshad nas// rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs te// bde ba can du de 'gro 'o// 'gro ba kun tu rab 'khor bas// srid pa lasani skyo ba'i yid// zhi ba

zhi'am song nas nii// rnal 'khyer sna tshogs dag la rtsom// rnal 'byor can gyis brtson byas na// nyi ma zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra dang// 'od dang pad+mo lta bu dang// ri mo nam mkha'i me 'dra mthong// mtshan
mo sna tshogs de dag ni// mu stegs can lam khrid par byed// nyanathos dag dang rang rgyal gyi// spyod yul du yang ltung bar byed// yul ma 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir// 'gag pa med pa ma yin te//
'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul ltar// de bzhin nyid kyi dngos por yod// mkhas pa rnams la snang ba ltar// byis pa rnams la mi snang ste// ji ltar chos kun m skyes shing/ mtshan nyid med par snang
ba go/ gser min gser ltar snang ba yi// ra gan sa la byis ba rnams// gser du ji ltar rtog pa bzhin// ngan pa'i rtogazhes chos de bzhin// rkyen gyis yod dang med palas// gang
gi ma byung skyeb dang// khyung nas kyang ni 'jig nus pa// nga yi bstan la rimi gnas// yongs su 'gyur dang dus dang dbyings// 'byung ba'i dngos dang dbang ba dang// srid pa'i bar ma bsdu ba
ni gang rtog de dag mkhas ma yin// 'jig rten rten cing 'brel 'byung ba// rgyal ba dag ni mi gsung gi/ 'jig rten 'di ltarkyen nyid de// driza ya ni grong khyer 'dra// 'di yod na ni 'di
zhes bya// 'don chos kyi kha rdzayin te/ 'bardal s tha dad gyur pa ni// ma skyes 'gag par mi 'gyur ro// mag dang chu dang me long dang// snada rnams dang ni nar bul// de dag la ni gzugs brnyan snang
gzugs bar nagangan gang yod pa min// ji ltar nam mkha'i snyaka chab// dngos por sbyang sems de bzhin te/ mi ma mo gsham bu bzhin du// rnam pa snatshogs gzugs su steng// thegachan
u@#// nga yi theg pa min// yi ge med cing sgra yang med// bden pa ma yin thar pa min// snang med spyod yul ma yanan// ba kyang thug chen theg pa ste// ting 'dzin la yang dbang
[• ]byed pa// yid kyi lus n sna tshogs pa// bang game tog rnams kyis brgyan// dngos po dag ni skyon rnams dang/ gcig dang tha dad ma yin te// skye ba dag ni mdor bshad de// 'gog pa nyung ni
rgyas par ro// ma skyes stong pa gcig yin te// skyes pa'i stong pa nyid kyang gcig/ ma skyes stong pa mchog yin te// skyes pa'i stong pa 'jig par 'gyur// stong pa de bzhin nyid dang mtha'
mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings// yid kyi lus na sna tshogs pa// rnam grangs dag gis ngas bshad do// mdo sde 'dul ba chos mngon pas// don gyis ma yin tshig rnams kyis
rnam par dag par gang rtogs pa// bdag med pa la de ma gnas// nga dang sangs rgyas rnams dang ni// mu stegs can dag gang spyi kyang// rkyenagyi yod bar ma ba sgrubs na// ji lta bur na med
[$ ]par 'gyur// rkyen rnams kyisan yod par yang// su yis bsgrubs na gang med sgrub// skyebar smra ba ngan ltakhas// yod dang med par rnam par rtog/ gang gi tso yang ma skye la// ci yang
'gag par mi 'gyur ba// 'gro ba dben par mthong ba san// de la yod med nyer mi 'gro// saN ge ni khong ra bzhin te// ma rnams kyi ni rnam rtog yod// smig rgyu lan ri dgas khazhin///
gang rnams rtog pa de dag nor// rnam rtog mngon par byas pa yis/ rnam par rtog pa nyin tu 'byung// skye ba dang ni 'jig la dral/ snang ba med ba ma btu spyod// thub yangs rgya che ye shes
dang phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing rnams ni// rgyal ba'i sras po rnams la bshad// nyan thos rnams la mi rtag pa/ srid gsum mi rtag stong pa ste// bdag dang bdag gi rnam spangs dang//
rgya med pa yi rnam rtog ni// rnam par rtog ces byar mi rung/ 'ji ltar bu med ka rgyu la// nu med par ni chur 'dzin 'gyur// de bzhin snang la byis pa rnams// 'phags pa rnams ni bye brag tu//
'phags pa'i lta ba dag ba ste// rnam par thar pa gsum las byung// rang dang spyi yi mtshan nyid rnams// nyan thos rnams la rngub tu bshad// thams cad chos lamachags dang// gcig pu
dban par spyod pa dang// ma brtags pa yi 'bras bu ni// rang rgyal sras bo dag la khyashad// phyi rol brtags pa'i rang bzhin tu// gzhan dbang rang gi gzhi la skyes// bdag las skyes
