las byung// banen namtshan rnams sun sumatshogs/ lhar skyes pa yi 'groba'i dbang// mtho rtas na byed chos ston b// gling bzhinams la rab tu spyod// shani khyo yunanang gang spyad nas// spyod
bas rnam par 'jig pa sogs 'gyur// byas btus dang skyabs 'byung dus// gnyis po gzhan dang gcod pa ste// nga dang gzhan ni byis dus la// shAkya seng gi rtsod pa'i dus// don grub bod shAkya'i
sras/ 'jug sel rgyas dang dbang phyag dang// de la sogs pa'i mu stags can/ mya nganang 'das 'byung bar gyug/ 'di skad bdag gis blosal sogs// shAkya song gis bshad pa yin//
sgrung dang sngon chad byung ba dgra/ de dag rgyas pa yin par 'gyur// 'jug sa dang nadabang phyug kyang// 'dunabs byed pa 'chad par gyug/ mya na ngas nyin nd ni/ de'abu la sogs pa du ba
nga yi sazhi'o ldan to// ban bum bskye dgu'i bdag/ nga nika t+yayana' bogis// ming ni rdu lamed rgyal ba yi ]ya ba dang chos dang nga ba dag kyang/ yul na tsog par skyes pa ste/ mtshan n zla ba
skyabs zhes g zla ba'igs las de skyes so// khar po la zhugs shing brtul zhugs spyod// tshul yang rnam pa stod bshad nas// blo gros chen po dbang bskur te// lung bstan byas nA
mya ngan sdud// chos blon sbyin par bya// chos kyi me ba'agal sbyig/ ma kha' slob gan ngas na// bskal pa'i khral ni 'jig par 'gyur// 'od srungs dang na log dad
sasal 'dren pa gsang grub rnam dag dang// rdul med nga dang gzhan dag dang// de dag hrims rud byas dus rgyal// de yi 'og tu byas dusal// 'dren pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba// shes bya rnamA
ston pa po// dpa' bo na go 'byung bar 'gyur gatrig zhan la man skyob byung min// rtsod dus phyi ma ni min yang// 'jig rtenamagon po 'byung mi 'gyur byas dus lan rdzogs 'tshang rgya// mi
'phrogs pa dang ngo shes bya/ ma dros kha tshar bcas ba ste// rma bya'i mdedzes bu 'dra ba yis///stod g.yogs ri mo bri bar bya/ ma dngos dang mdongs rgyu bedu bu// sor gnyis go gsum tsam
du bya/ de las gzhan du bros nas ni// byis pa rnams kyang nags par bgyur/ rtag brtan dod chagasam zhes bya// ye shes chus khrus kyang bya// rnal 'byor gyisazhinan tan bya// dus
'tshams gsum dang rtsom gsum bya/ tshad kha dang rdod nga shing la sogs/ 'phan la sogs pa sa bskyod ba dang// gcig 'phagasazhas ni gcig lhung 'gyur// dge dang mi/gog de bzhin no//
gcig du mang po ma yin te// mi 'dra'i mtshan nyid gang na'ang med// len pa gzhan rlung dang 'dra// sbyin pa byed bzhing bzhon no// gal te gcig bu mang 'gyur na// thams cad ma byas ba'
gyur go byas na rnam par 'jig par 'gyug 'anirtog go can gyi tshul// den mo mar sa bon 'dra// 'du phyir mang du ga la 'gyur// de lta bur namang du rgyug/ de rtog ga ba yi tshul//
til las bal sran skyo mi 'gyur// khrus ne nes kyi rgyu las min// bro dang 'bru yi rnam pa dag/ gcig rdzoltamang bo 'gyur// sgra byed pan pa ni// rkang pa'i ming dang ma dbang dang/
tshangs po dang ni gan yang// 'jig rten rgyang 'phen byed pa 'byung/ ka t+yA yan mdebyed ba/ mdzod sbyin bal kade bzhinato// bud d+ha ka dang skar mkhan dag/ rtsod pa 'dus na 'byung bar
'gyur (bsod nams byas pa'i 'jig rten gyis// skye dgu'i dpal gyis stongs can 'byung// chos kun lan srung byed pa/ rgyal po stobs can ga gtong pago/ grogama'omibar/
dngasananung yig gya gyu can dang lta 'dzin du// khya mchog dpa' chen rnam dag kyang// ma 'ongs dus na 'byung bar gyur// don grub pa dang klu'i bu/ yang dag ma 'a dang dud pa lnga
tshogs stobs can dang yid gzhungs pa// phyi ma'i dusaMn 'byung bar gyur// nags kyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe// dbyug gu shing dang pags pa dang/ skad bcings dpaN le ba rnams// nga la
tshangs ba sbyin bar byed// rnal 'byor ldan pa chen po ste// thub pa rtul mod ces bya bgi/ thal ba chad pa'i ston par 'gyur// 'disoN+Dib 'argyalatshanazhes/ tshangs pa tshangs pa brgya
gru/ rnams dang/ lha rnams mang po bcas pa yis// sa lam/ bas las 'bag bor gnas// dbang ldan de nyid mi snar 'gyur// dbang po lha dang bcas pa dang/ 'phags
sa skyes po la sogs pa yis// sna tshogs gos dang slongs stod kun/ nags kyi ngad ma dkawa ma sa bcad/ ma yag rgyun dong ba// sus sam sku bal gyur yang rung// ma skyas bsgrub par 'gyur//

gzhan s gang byung ste// gzugs dus sum gsan// du lo dmigs te byang bar 'gyur// gang sa gang du 'jug pa yi/sems n 'tshog pa'i sems byung ste/ de'i btum grub ma//
ji ltar skad cig tsAdza?g par dge/ rnal 'byor can gyi sdom ra ju pa dang// gang da pa spyad dpe pa dang// 'od snang gnas kyi gzhal med khang// 'jig rten rgya yis 'jig pa med// gnang ba
tsho rnams dang slob pa'i chos// sangs rgyus yongashes phun sum tshogs// dge slong nyid dngashes thob dang// skad cigagar na ltar mthong// sgyumadri za'i grong sogs kyis// gzugs rnams ji ltag
skad cig pa// babyung ba rnams ni 'byung 'gyur mni/ 'gro ba 'byung pa cang mi byed so sa ni ma rig rgyu las byung/ thog mgang nas bsogs pa yin// skye dang 'jig pa kun bralabar// rtog
ga ba dag rab tu rtog/ grangs can smra ba rnam gnyis te// gtso bo'osaning gyur ba dang// gtso bo yod na 'bras bu yod/ 'bras bu bdag nyid rab tu sgrub// gtso bo dang na dngos 'jug pa la// yon tan bye
brag rab tu bsgrags// rgyu dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa// 'gyur ba la namad pa yin// ja lta dngul chu dag pa la// ma rnams kyis ma rig pa// de bzhin lus can Thams cad kyis// kun gzhi
gnas kyang dag pago/ shing kun dri dang sgog pa dang// sbrum ma'i bul na mthong ba dang/ lan la sogs ro yod dang// cir sa bon bzhin mi 'gyug/ de nyid dang na bla dad dang// de bzhinaganyi/
ka gtis ma yin// yod nga yin med de// 'dus byas la med mad ma yin// bdag ni rta dang 'dra bar yod// phung po ba'ang ngo bo skrangs// 'dus byas 'dus ma byas ba la// smag mad brjod/
mdarang bzhin no// lung dang rig pas ngan bar mthong// rtog ge lta bas dri mar byas// phyi ma med pa co bdag tu smra// rgyumed ma yin gzhan n mad// de dag gi ni'os bsags pa// thung pos bdag
tu mi bsgom ste/ gcig pa dang ni de las zhan// rtog go can gyis shes so// mthong nudang mig rnams dang// dzaltar gzugs ban snang 'gyur ba// gcig dang tha dad bral ba bzhin//
ji bzhin gang zag phung bolago/ bsgom dang rnam bsgom bsam gtan ba// lam dang bden dang mthong ba ste// de rnams gsum ni rnam bsgom na// lta ba ngan spangs grol bar gyur
da @#// ji ltar mthong na zhig pa'i zlog/ khyim gyi bu gda' kho'altar// de bzhin mos kun bstsal ba la// byis pa gzhan du ma rtog cig/ dngos po med pas mya ngan 'das/
zabyis nga'i sems rmongs par byed// ji ltar 'dug bzhin mthong ba dang// 'phags bas mthong pa yod pa'i phyi'i// skye ba dang ni 'jig bral zhing/ dngos po yod dang med spangs pa/ mtshan
nyid mtshan gzhi bral yagi/ 'gyur ba rnam par bsgom par bya// mu stegs can gyi smra dang grol// ming dang dbyibs sbyangs rgyu ba// nang gi lta ba'i gnas rnams kyi/ 'gyur ba rnam par
zla bsgom par gyis// reg pa dang ni gzer ba yis/ lha dang sems can dma' ba'i lus// bar m ya srid med de// rnam ba8shes pas bskyod pa yin/ mngal sgong drod gsher la sog
(pa'i/ srid pa bar mar 'byung ba dag/ sems can mang po sna tshogs bzhin// 'gro dang 'gro ba rnam par bsgom// dus dang rigo nga 'bral 'gyur ba// nyon mongs phyogs
dang zad 'thob byed// mu stags lta ba'i smra ba la// blo gros can gyis mi spyod do// thog mar nya ba lenab las// bdagan phyi bas bye brag phyed// ma phye bye brag byed bzhi// mo gan
la bye brag khyod// 'phrul gyis mthong ba'isems can rnams// shing dang sa ra ba rnam par spangs/ lus can kun gyi gzugs yodapa// du byod phung po spongs rgyu ba// kha dog
bzang dang ngan gyur cing// gro' dang ma grol khyad gyur pa/ wardza sa 'du byed gtogs pa yi// dubyed gnas pas rab tu mthong// 'groba mtshams su gzugs ldan rnams// rtogag can
gyi spyod yu'amin// mi yi yul lasang 'das te// ngon ba'i rtogazhig can gazhan min// bdag med yid las soms 'byung na// 'os de ni 'byung bar 'gyug/ bab mum ma sa bon bzhin// ci
de yi 'byung mi bshad// rnam par shes pa ma skyes nga// reshes la sogs med pa ste// de yod pa na rnam shes la/ rgyud kyis skya bar ji ltago'agyu// dus gsum dang ni dus med dang/ brjod pa
med dang rnam pa lnga// dan sangs rgyas yi ge par bya// rtog can rnams rab tu brjod// shes pa 'du byed ts+tshas 'byung ba// 'du byed rnams kyis mi brjod de// dus byed bslabs pa sa pa su
'du byed du ni gtogs pa dang/ zhi// 'di yod bsana'adabyung ste// rkyen rnams lan rnyemad pa// bsal bo byed po 'ab tu ston// dethad bsan byed pa med// rlung ni mo dang sprin dog la// bskyod kha yi
'byin ng mni// bskyod nas des nizhi'i 'gyur ba// ji ltar sams rab tu bsgrubs// dusacus dusam byas pa ni/ rkyeleganam bar spangs pa brjod/ min de la bsgrubs par yang//

ji ltar byase ba rtog par byed// phan tshun stobs dang mkhru yi phyig/ mi rnams kyi mi 'byung// gang phyi ma bzhin brtags bya ba'i bams tsam gang gis rab tu byung/ phung po skye mched tshogs rnams kyi// rgyani

po bsgrub pa med pa'i yin// rtog gcan gyis mdes ba// sems dang sems can m ngan 'das// stang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal to// yid la sogs pa tis po yis// nyon mong mkha' bzhin/
tshodad min// glang po'amel sogs ngan sngon yod// mu stegs lta bas drag byas// yid kyi rnam pa na shes pa/ri g.yogs// ga yogs pa sa rnam nga ba sbyangs// da yis yang dag ji bzhin mkhreng/
mthong nas nyon mongs rnams kyang gzhig/ glinges po dpa rnams rab sbyangs te// de dag 'phags pa'i spyod yul dang/ shes dang shes bya'i bye brag gis// de gnyis gzhan du mi rtog pa// blo ngan

rnams kyis mi rtogs te// brjod du med pa smra bar byed// ji ltar tsan don byas pa 'a driT// byis pa dag nagazhanadu byed// de bzhin tsan dan la ka'adragi/ shes pa rtog ge ngan pas so// langs nas kha bru
gyis mi len// lhung bzed gnas dang phying pa can// gdong rgyud la sogasab rnams// dag pas brag la spyod par bya// su zhig tshul 'di rdzogs pas dpo ga byed pa// dad ldan rnal 'byor brtson zhing mi
rtog pa/ mi gnas don la ston par gyur pa de// chos kyi rnam po gsar bzhin bshad par bya// blun pas srid dang mi srid can rtog pa// de lta ngan dra ba drir bcas// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtimug bcas/
[4, ]pa'i dzeg/ chags med sangs rgyas phyag gis dbang bskur gyur// mu stegs ya phyogs kyis bslad// gzhan yang rgyan gyis rnam par rmongs// gzhan dag rgyamed de 'byung ba// don med pa'i chad pa'o//
yide dang rnam par shes pa dang// rnam par smin pa'i gyur pa ste// yid ni kun gzhwa las byung ba// rnam par shes pa yid las byung// kun gzhi zho las sems kun yong// dba' rlabs bzhin du/
'byung bar 'gyur// thams cad bag chags rgyu las byung// rgyun bzhin du no'abyung ba'o/ skad cige zla dad 'brel pas 'brel// rang gi sems ni don la 'dzin// dbyings kyi mtshan nyid rnam par
dag/ yid dang mig la sogs las byung// thog me mad nas tas pas 'brol// don snang bag chags rnams las byung// phyi 'du ni sems snang te// mu stogs lta ba bzlog pa yi//
de yargyus byung gzhan da kyang/ de dmigs nas 'jug par 'gyur// de las lta bshes pa dang// 'khor lo rab tu 'jug par 'gyur (dngos po lam sgyu ma 'dra// dri za'i
grong 'byor rnams bzhin te// smig rgyu ba dang chu zla ltar// rang gi rnam rtog rnam par bsgoms// 'jug pa'i rnam pas de bzhin nyid// yang dag ye shes de yi gnas// sgyu ma dang la
bar 'gro la sogs// ting nge 'dzin no gzhan rnams dang// mngon banyashes dang dbang rnams dang// de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba// sa la zhugs nas thob par 'gyur/ gang
cho gro ma rtogs// de tshesams ni ldog par 'gyur// sazhib tu dga' ba dang// sangs rgyas da dang sa rnams la thob// gnas na re ba tugyur ba'i phyir// ji ltar sna
[+ ]tshogs nor bu bzhin// sems can rnams kyi don byed de// tshul gzugs bar n ji bzhinano// yod dang med pa'i phyogs rnams dang// gnyis dang gnyis yod pa dang bral// nyana'o/
rang rgyal 'das gyur na// sa bdun por 'gyur bayin// so sor chos thengang na// yang dag pa yis sbyangs te// phyi'i lo mu stags rnams spangs pagi/ theg pa chen pos bar
par bya rnam par rtog pa rab gyug/ sha 'pho 'jig pa rnam spangs pa// ri bong sku yinor bu bzhin// grol ba rnams 'tshul yang bshad// ji ltar tshig la tshig rnams pa// gal te
gsal rigs de bzhin// de phyir rigs pa rigs pa yin// de bas gzhan du ma rtog cig mig dang lus dang srid pa dang// mar ga de bzhin tshul bzhin min// mi
rgyu dbang gzugs dang yid rnams dang// rtog pa'i yid kyang de bzhin no// 'phags pa lang+kar gshegs pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo ji snyed pa rdzogs so//
